To avenge their deaths, the last of the Fuuma brothers vowed to slay the Dragon Master, and take back the Hadoukens.
Getsufuma Den is an action game with slight RPG elements. You travel through the overworld on pre-determined paths, which branch most of the time, leading you to shops, places where you can encounter other characters, and dungeons. Once you descend into a dungeon, you navigate your character on a platform, jumping and fighting enemies with your sword or other weapons. There are also a few first-person dungeons later in the game. In the dungeons you can collect money and then use it to buy weapons and other accessories on the overworld.

game.name: Ghostbusters
game.desc: Baseado no filme com o mesmo nome, os Caça-Fantasmas são os que chamam de "detonadores" de qualquer assombração de fantasmas. Isso é feito através do uso de "pacotes de prótons" e armadilhas nucleares aceleradas, nas quais os fantasmas podem ser capturados e transferidos para um local de armazenamento seguro. No entanto, a cidade de Nova York de repente se tornou um lugar muito assombrado, e o número de fantasmas aumentou repentinamente. Os Caça-Fantasmas devem reduzir o nível paranormal (PK) na cidade, representando o poder dos fantasmas, antes que o Templo de Zuul desperte e ressuscite uma deusa do mal, Gozer.

game.path: ./Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen 2 (J).7z
game.name: Gimmi a Break : Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen 2
game.desc: Gimme A Break: Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen é um jogo de perguntas lançado para a Famicom (NES) no Japão, e é baseado em um programa japonês real que foi ao ar entre 1989 e 1992. Os jogadores podem responder a perguntas triviais contra AI ou oponentes humanos, com o objetivo final de desafiar o Quiz King do jogo.
game.image: ./media/images/Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen 2 (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen 2 (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen 2 (J).mp4

game.path: ./Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen (J).7z
game.name: Gimmi a Break : Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen
game.desc: El juego Gimme a Break - Shijou Saikyou no quiz Ou Ketteisen fue desarrollado por Yonezawa PR21 y publicado Yonezawa PR21 en 1991. El juego se basa en un programa asiático y es un cuestionario en el que debes responder las preguntas del anfitrión. La peculiaridad del producto es que se podían conectar seis controladores adicionales en forma de un botón con una campana, con el cual seis personas podían competir simultáneamente entre sí en erudición y reacción.
game.image: ./media/images/Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Gimmi a Break - Shijou Saikyou no Quiz Ou Ketteisen (J).mp4

game.name: Gimmick!
game.desc:
Prepare-se para conhecer o seu destino. E teste todas as suas habilidades de jogo. O Sr. Gimmick é uma aventura mística, emocionante e muito perigosa que começa onde todos os outros jogos terminaram. Inimigos violentos que de repente se tornam seus aliados, se você souber o segredo. Itens mágicos escondidos em lugares secretos que garantem sua sobrevivência se você os encontrar e impedem que você termine o jogo, se não encontrar.
A única arma do Sr. Gimmick é uma estrela cósmica com uma forma potente de energia que você deve aproveitar. Domine, e a estrela pode derrubar seus inimigos, levá-lo por um território perigoso e permitir que você atinja níveis - e lugares ocultos - que são inatingíveis para qualquer pessoa, exceto um especialista.

game.name: Ginga Eiyuu Densetsu
game.desc: El objetivo del juego es ganar la supremacía en el espacio entre una gran cantidad de mundos que deben ser conquistados por el enemigo, avanzando hacia su planeta principal. La mayor parte del juego se desarrolla no tanto en batallas sino como en vídeos animados bellamente dibujados. Hay conversaciones sobre el comando en las bases al estilo anime, y vuelos con batallas de flotas espaciales enteras, y mucho, mucho más. La batalla se reduce a la elección de construir barcos, que se muestran por cuadrados en una perspectiva isométrica.

game.name: Ginga no Sannin
game.desc: Official port of "The Earth Fighter Rayiezax" originally published on NEC PC-8801. In the year 2300, the human race created an Earth federation government and spread out into space to begin colonizing the surrounding planets. However, an alien species from the far reaches of outer space began attacking the human forces, putting the very survival of the human race at stake. Though it was only a matter of time before Earth fell to the enormous power of the enemy forces, the Earth's army commander issued an order calling all of the units dispersed around the colonized planets to return to Earth. The player takes the role of a young soldier who was stationed with the Rayieza unit on the planet Mars. The journey begins as he makes his way back to Earth along with the other members of his unit.

game.name: Goal!!
game.desc: Objetivo! é um jogo de futebol para um jogador contra o computador, dois jogadores um contra o outro ou dois jogadores contra o computador. A jogabilidade é do ponto de vista aéreo angular, com a tela rolando para seguir a ação. Várias opções de jogo estão disponíveis, incluindo o modo torneio, modo copa do mundo e uma competição de tiro ao alvo.

game.name: Goal!!
game.desc: Objetivo! é um jogo de futebol para um jogador contra o computador, dois jogadores um contra o outro ou dois jogadores contra o computador. A jogabilidade é do ponto de vista aéreo angular, com a tela rolando para seguir a ação. Várias opções de jogo estão disponíveis, incluindo o modo torneio, modo copa do mundo e uma competição de tiro ao alvo.

game.name: God Slayer : Haruka Tenkuu no Sonata
game.desc: Crystalis é um RPG de ação de cima para baixo. A partir da câmara criogênica, o jogador assume o papel de um herói misterioso que deve descobrir o mistério da torre. O personagem pode equipar armas, armaduras, escudos e globos / pulseiras em seu corpo e um único item de seu inventário para uso em campo. Para ajudar no objetivo do herói. ele se encontrará com as quatro pessoas sábias e aprenderá sua magia, além de obter as quatro espadas elementares que o ajudarão a progredir. Os jogadores ganham experiência e ouro ao derrotar monstros. A experiência é usada para obter níveis e melhorar estatísticas, no entanto, é necessário um nível mínimo antes que se possa causar dano a chefes específicos. O ouro é usado para comprar itens nas lojas.

game.name: Gojira
game.desc: No ano 2XXX DC, a Terra está sob ataque dos alienígenas do Planeta X. Armado com monstros de terrível força destrutiva, os invasores estabelecem bases em todos os planetas do sistema solar. Esses monstros incluem os inimigos Gezora, Moguera, Baragon, Varan

game.name: Golf Club : Birdy Rush
game.desc: Golf Club: Birdie Rush is a golf game developed by Data East and published for the Famicom towards the end of 1987. It employs a far off bird's eye view throughout the game. It features 18 holes and allows players to play in a stroke game, or a tournament, and allows players to play alone, or head to head. It was only released in Japan, and it was followed up with a sequel for the Super Famicom called Super Birdie Rush in 1992.

game.name: Golf Grand Slam
game.desc:
Este jogo foi feito com a intenção de ajudar o jogador a melhorar seu jogo de golfe. Você pode praticar a configuração de tacadas, lidar com a resistência do vento, escolher um ponto de ataque na bola de golfe e outros aspectos técnicos do golfe nos dois modos de treinamento que o jogo oferece. Quando sentir que tem experiência suficiente, você pode entrar no Golf Grand Slam, um torneio contra outros 29 jogadores profissionais fictícios.
O jogo apresenta 4 conjuntos de 14 tacos diferentes que você pode levar para o campo. O golfe é feito alinhando um cursor no local em que você deseja que a bola caia e, em seguida, escolhendo o taco, a postura e a aderência adequados. O último passo antes de dar a tacada é encontrar o ponto de contato correto na bola de golfe. O ponto de contato é representado como um ponto que se espalha por cima de um ícone de bola de golfe e você deve tentar pará-lo na parte da bola em que deseja que seu taco entre em contato com a bola.

game.name: Golfkko Open
game.desc: Este juego es bastante profesional y reproduce fielmente el proceso de golf original en Famicom. Tiene un sistema de puntería muy complejo y detallado, es posible girar la pelota, etc. Un poco decepcionante es el hecho de que antes de pasar directamente a la jugabilidad debes "desplazarte" por toneladas de textos japoneses innecesarios. Creo que si este texto estuviera en inglés, o incluso en ruso, leer de 20 a 30 frases de introducción sería una tarea muy tediosa.

game.name: Golgo 13 : Daiisshou, Kamigami no Tasogare
game.desc:
Você joga como Golgo 13, o maior assassino de aluguel do mundo. Um frasco da arma biológica mais mortal conhecida pelo homem, codinome "Cassandra G.", foi roubado e você precisa recuperá-lo antes que alguém o use no mundo inocente.
Este é um jogo tradicional de rolagem lateral que usa uma visão de terceira pessoa em cenas.

game.name: Golgo 13 : Dainishou, Icarus no Nazo
game.desc:
Você joga como Golgo 13, também conhecido como Duke Togo, atirador de elite e assassino. Baseado em um personagem de várias histórias em quadrinhos de mangá, Golgo é um homem de negócios no final de uma arma. Preso no mundo da espionagem entre grupos como o FBI e a CIA, Golgo está constantemente em perigo mortal, e uma arma letal por si só.
The Mafat Conspiracy é a sequencia do jogo Top Secret Episode do NES. Neste capítulo, Golgo deve rastrear um satélite ausente do sistema de defesa a laser SDI, além de resgatar um cientista de ponta e impedir aqueles que usariam o satélite para chantagem e terror nas nações do mundo.
Enquanto Golgo está ao ar livre, o jogo é uma brincadeira de rolagem lateral onde o jogador pode disparar e pular. Isso muda quando Golgo entra em um prédio, quando o jogo muda para um labirinto em 3D em primeira pessoa. Navegando pelos soldados passados ​​e entre os andares, Golgo coleta várias pistas para avançar no enredo. Há também uma sequência de direção e várias seqüências de atiradores, nas quais é necessária uma mira de precisão.

game.name: Gomoku Narabe
game.desc: In Gomoku Narabe Renju, players take turns attempting to connect 5 of their pieces in a straight or diagonal line without being blocked by their opponent. Each individual game won gives the player a point. The player with the most amount of points after a set number of games wins the overall game. The game offers three difficulty modes. On the hardest difficulty, the player has to win the game before a time counter counts down to zero.

game.name: Goonies 2 : Fratelli Saigo no Chousen
game.desc:
Filme lançado na década de 1980, um grupo de jovens formou uma gangue especial que se chamou "The Goonies". A Nintendo aproveitou a popularidade do filme, lançando vários jogos com personagens e músicas, incluindo a música-tema de Cyndi Lauper.
Você joga com Mikie, um dos membros da gangue, cujo os amigos foram seqüestrados pela família Fratelli. Seus amigos e Annie devem ser resgatados, mas não vai ser fácil de esgueirar-se pelo esconderijo subterrâneo escuro e assustador, onde são mantidos. Você deve encontrar uma maneira de destruir seu computador principal e manter seus amigos vivos.
Ma Fratelli ou o primo louco Pipsqueak tentaram pará-lo! Ao iniciar o jogo, Mikie está armado apenas com um ioiô e a capacidade de saltar. À medida que o jogo avança, você encontrará um boomerang, uma arma de fogo, bombas, cocktails molotov e até mesmo um equipamento de mergulho para ajudá-lo.
Você vai lutar com cobras, aranhas, esqueletos, peixes comedores de homem, ao explorar um mundo enorme cheio de adegas, cavernas secretas e labirintos elaborados. Quando Mikie entra em uma sala, ele pode falar com o NPC e tentar encontrar itens escondidos, e portas batendo nas paredes. Uma senha permite que você mantenha suas posses para o próximo jogo.

game.name: Goonies
game.desc: Os Goonies é baseado em um filme com o mesmo nome de 1985. Um grupo de jovens de um bairro chamado "Docas Goon" estão tentando encontrar o tesouro perdido de One-Eyed Willie para impedir a execução duma hipoteca de suas casas. Infelizmente, o tesouro está enterrado sob o esconderijo da infame gangue Fratelli, uma família de criminosos cruéis que fogem da lei. Você joga como o asmático Mikey, que deve encontrar o tesouro e salvar os outros Goonies antes que o tempo acabe.

game.name: Gorby no Pipeline Daisakusen
game.desc:
Gorby's Pipeline is a variation on the classic Tetris game, with elements of Pipe Dream / Pipe Mania and its bonus game..
While in the classic Tetris game you 'll have to fit the falling geometric shaped pieces together to make a row disappear in Gorby's Pipeline the geometric shapes are replaced with pieces that contain different forms and shapes of pipelines.
The game starts with a water leak at the bottom right of the screen and it's you goal to put the various pipeline pieces together in such a way that the water runs from the bottom-right to the left and disappears in one of the pipelines on the left side of the screen. If you succeed a row will disappear.

game.name: Gozonji : Yaji Kita Chin Douchuu
game.desc: Juego que en términos de jugabilidad es similar a una aventura de texto. La pantalla del juego se divide en dos partes. La parte superior es la parte gráfica, donde se muestra todo lo que sucede a su alrededor, y la parte inferior es la parte del diálogo, muestra no solo textos, sino también las caras de las personas que los pronuncian. El juego es muy difícil de percibir, ya que está completamente en japonés, y no se espera una traducción al inglés (¡sin mencionar el ruso!) en el futuro cercano.

game.name: Gradius
game.desc: O povo de Gradius está com problemas. As bactérias ameobóides lançaram um ataque total contra o planeta, e cabe a você voar para a batalha e salvá-las. Ao longo do caminho, você poderá alimentar sua nave com alta velocidade, campos de força, lasers, mísseis, canhões de feixe duplo e muito mais para ajudá-lo na batalha. Baseado no jogo de arcade, Gradius é um atirador de rolagem lateral. Atirar em certos inimigos deixará um pod de power-up para trás, que pode ser coletado para adicionar mais poder ao seu navio. Cada nível apresenta uma grande variedade de inimigos tentando impedi-lo, com um grande chefe no final. A jogabilidade é para um ou dois jogadores alternados.

game.name: Gradius
game.desc: O povo de Gradius está com problemas. As bactérias ameobóides lançaram um ataque total contra o planeta, e cabe a você voar para a batalha e salvá-las. Ao longo do caminho, você poderá alimentar sua nave com alta velocidade, campos de força, lasers, mísseis, canhões de feixe duplo e muito mais para ajudá-lo na batalha. Baseado no jogo de arcade, Gradius é um atirador de rolagem lateral. Atirar em certos inimigos deixará um pod de power-up para trás, que pode ser coletado para adicionar mais poder ao seu navio. Cada nível apresenta uma grande variedade de inimigos tentando impedi-lo, com um grande chefe no final. A jogabilidade é para um ou dois jogadores alternados.

game.name: Grand Master
game.desc: Grand Master is an action RPG, featuring a cool intro, neat music, and most importantly: a hero with a sword so high you can't get over it, so low you can't get under it, and so wide you can't get around it. The game itself plays from a top-down perspective, a bit like The Legend of Zelda, but with some extra RPG elements added in. It features a basic leveling system that maxes out at 10 and basic HP and MP stats that increase by 10 each level up until they reach 99. The stages are also in the same vein as The Legend of Zelda in regards to the dungeons, albeit in a much simpler form. Instead of an overworld, you instead pick from five stages on a world map and each stage follows the same basic formula that consists of finding the key to open the door to the boss. Each stage contains various enemies that respawn, the occasional warp point, and a handful of chests that contain a new weapon, accessory and healing items. The final stage also follows the same pattern, but it's about five stages combined into one and borders on torture/redundancy with a series of mazes and long passageways that take forever to pass. It is at odds with the first five stages. The game makes use of a branching path system that's based on the order in which you clear all the stages. If certain events are not triggered, you will get a bad ending. The optimal order is as follows:Castle, Ice Temple, Cave, Pyramid, Tower. If you enter the Tower before the Cave level, you will get the bad ending.If you enter the Pyramid before the Cave level, you will get an alternate story branch.

game.name: Great Battle Cyber
game.desc: Great Battle Cyber is an action game based on SD Gundam universe. The playable roster consists of Kamen Rider Black, Victory Gundam, and Ultraman Taro. The differences between each character aren't as pronounced as you would think: Kamen Rider actually has the longest reach despite fighting with his bare hands. The Victory Gundam's sword attacks in an arc which allows it to deflect airborne attacks and hit flying enemies from the ground. Ultraman?..you know what there's nothing unique about him. To some extent he occupies a middle ground between the others but that leaves little reason to ever use him.

game.name: Great Boxing : Rush Up
game.desc: World Champ é um jogo de boxe que tem muitas semelhanças com o Ring King do Data East. Você pode jogar no modo "Ranking" de um jogador, onde você pode aumentar as estatísticas do seu boxeador enquanto sobe a escada para, eventualmente, disputar um campeonato em uma das quatro classes de peso. Há também um modo para dois jogadores em que você e um amigo podem disputar. Um modo de torneio permite que até 8 jogadores participem de um torneio com colchetes. A jogabilidade consiste em cada boxeador se movendo pelo ringue tentando acertar golpes, ganchos e upper cuts. O objetivo é nocautear seu oponente por uma contagem de 10 ou ter o maior número de pontos no placar no final da quantidade prevista de rodadas.

game.name: Great Deal
game.desc: Great Deal combines a pack of cards and Tetris. You must dispose of a 52-card pack(with joker) into a 5x5 well. At the end of the round, you get a bonus if all cards are cleared, and you lose points for each card not cleared. You also get a bonus for stoppage time remaining. Pushing one button shuffles you between four cards, and pushing the other lets you eat up any part of the two minutes' grace period the game awards you per level. You can use it to make sure you drop something in the right place, or to get an idea of what to move next. It's an innovative concept among early Tetris games, trading time for points, and given the potential complexity of the game, it offers a fair amount of relief without spoon feeding the player. Great deal gives you points for 3 suits in a row, or any straight, or 3 of a kind in a row or on a diagonal. You get big points for 4 or 5.

game.name: Great Tank
game.desc: Em 1944, as Forças Unidas estão preparando seu ataque final na costa da Normandia. A missão é romper as linhas de frente e destruir a sede do inimigo. Para liderar a invasão, eles escolheram Paul da Unidade de Comando 88, também conhecida como Serpente de Ferro. Para ter sucesso em sua missão, Paul precisará de todo o poder de fogo do mais poderoso veículo de combate, o Iron Tank. O tanque de ferro é jogado de uma visão aérea com uma tela de rolagem. Você precisa controlar o Iron Tank e suas armas e power-ups variados para resgatar reféns e derrotar as forças inimigas.

game.name: Gremlin 2 : Shinshu Tanjou
game.desc: Como Gizmo, você deve chegar ao Gremlin Control Center para acabar com eles. Este é um jogo de ação isométrico diferente do título Elite. Você pode ganhar itens como arco e flecha e fósforos após cada nível para ajudar. A loja do Sr. Wing também contém muitas guloseimas, então cuidado com a porta que aparece magicamente. Os riscos incluem aranhas, fios eletrificados, riscos montados no solo e um chefe no final de cada nível.

game.name: Guevara
game.desc:
Seu pequeno país insular está lutando contra a dominação cruel de um ditador maligno. Dois jogadores podem unir forças como guerrilheiros para lutar contra o exército do ditador, resgatar os prisioneiros e trazer a libertação!
Guerrilla War segue as aventuras de dois soldados rebeldes enquanto eles atacam uma ilha caribenha para libertá-la do governo de um ditador tirânico. Ao longo do caminho, os jogadores derrotam hordas de soldados inimigos sem nome enquanto tentam resgatar reféns (com grandes deduções de pontuação para qualquer refém morto no fogo cruzado).

game.name: Gun Nac
game.desc: Um caça estelar da Federação Galáctica é enviado para destruir uma armada alienígena (liderada por coelhos robóticos gigantes desta vez - um tema incomumente caprichoso, de acordo com o Parodius contemporâneo) que ameaça colapsar o sol do seu sistema em uma supernova.nnnnGun-Nac é um atirador de cima para baixo no qual o jogador controla o caça estelar da Federação. Poderes e mecânica de gênero são como se poderia esperar de um "shmup". agora com dinheiro colecionável que permite comprar armas e bombas diferentes para complementar sua arma principal padrão no mercado de armas entre níveis. Armas direcionais, acessórios e até quatro tipos de bombas também podem ser compradas para aumentar suas chances de sobrevivência, auxiliadas pelo controle do jogador sobre a velocidade com que sua nave se move pelos níveis. Apenas um jogador.

game.name: Gun Sight
game.desc:
Em Laser Invasion, você está tentando impedir o inimigo de implantar um novo tipo de super arma enquanto salva um agente secreto capturado.
O jogo é uma compilação de tipos de jogabilidade familiares. O primeiro estágio é uma batalha aérea de helicópteros semelhante ao Top Gun. O segundo estágio é um atirador de rolagem lateral em primeira pessoa como a Operação Wolf. O terceiro estágio é uma caça ao labirinto com influências de Golgo 13.
O jogo se desenrola em quatro níveis.

game.name: Gun-Dec
game.desc: Quinn Hart e seu parceiro, o detetive Reese, da equipe VICE, trabalham para impedir o tráfico de substâncias ilegais. Mas algo novo apareceu em cena, um gel de neon com grandes propriedades viciantes. Durante as investigações sobre a origem do gel, Reese desaparece misteriosamente e deixa Hart sem liderança. O tempo passa e Hart se envolve romanticamente com seu novo parceiro, Christy, enquanto ele continua tentando rastrear o gel. Mas Hart está prestes a obter uma nova liderança ...

game.name: Gunhed : Aratanaru Tatakai
game.desc:
Gunhed: The New Battle is a strategy game based on the manga by Kia Asamiya and the live-action film of the same name. The game is set on an island which has been taken over by a fully autonomous super-computer called “Kyron”. Lured by the prospect of an energy resource located on the island you race against competing forces to defeat the computer and secure this “super-energy”.
A previous war zone, the island is littered with the wreckage of past battles. You're able to search the island for parts to upgrade your forces, and usable items which can give you an advantage. According to the readme you “assemble about 30 mechs in order to be able to assault Kyron's hideout” once you have a mech of a high enough level.

game.name: Gyrodine
game.desc: Gyrodine é um jogo de tiro vertical básico baseado no jogo de arcade da Taito com o mesmo nome. Você pilota um helicóptero e tem que atirar em quantos inimigos puder. Você lutará contra helicópteros, bunkers, tanques e caças inimigos em diferentes terrenos como água, sobremesas e acampamentos militares. Não há história de fundo e não há níveis.

game.name: Haja no Fuuin
game.desc: The seal of the Dark Lord Terarin has been broken and Terarin has been unleashed into the world again. She has stolen the Golden Seal and opened pandora's box, unleashing evil creatures into the world. A young hero is tasked by a king to stop Terarin. He must step into footsteps of Iason, a shepherd that once accidentally unleashed Terarin and fought to seal the Dark Lord again. The hero must enlist the aid of three companions, Guy the warrior, Medi the amazon and Treo the pirate (called Turo in the manual) and find the three keys to Terarin's lair. To face the Dark Lord, they must find the mystical weapons and armor of old and then defeat Terarin and seal the Dark Lord from the world.

game.name: Hana no Star Kaidou
game.desc: Hana no Star Kaidou (which can be loosely translated as "Blossoming Star Highway") is an action game for the Famicom that was developed and published by Victor Musical Industries in 1987. It is about two musicians who dream of obtaining a recording contract and becoming big stars. The player must control both Moero and Goro on the screen at one time. They run, jump, and attack simultaneously. Each one has their own life count, and the game is over as soon as one of them loses all of their lives. Because of the unituitive controls, and unforgiving game mechanics, this game is considered quite difficult and generally not fun to play.

game.name: Hanafuda Yuukyou Den : Nagarebana Oryuu
game.desc: Hanafuda Yuukyou Den - Nagarebana Oryuu was developed and published by Hacker International in 1991. It is a logical game with elements of erotic images. Naturally, you will see them only after victory. Hanafuda is a style of Japanese playing cards used to play a variety of games. Hanafuda translates to 'flower cards'. The name also refers to some games played with the cards.

game.name: Hanjuku Hero
game.desc: Hanjuku Hero is a real-time strategy RPG game. A king used the power of a mysterious egg to unify a continent. However, he suddenly died a day after the unification, and the countries subjected to his rule revolted. The king's heir, the young prince must

game.name: Happy Birthday Bugs
game.desc:
The Bugs Bunny Birthday Blowout takes place as Bugs is invited to his 50th birthday. Because some of the other Warner Bros. toons weren't invited (including Wile E. Coyote), they decided to stop Bugs from going to this party.
A Warner Bros licensed game, The Bugs Bunny Birthday Blowout is a 2d side-scrolling platform game. Bugs can jump over and on some enemies and try to collect as many carrots as possible. Bugs can use his hammer in order to smash enemies as well as to find some secrets.

game.name: Hatris
game.desc: In Hatris, the falling blocks of Tetris are replaced by falling hats which are top hats, cowboy hats, baseball caps, derbys, party hats and crowns. The setting is a hat factory, where hats are dropped down from a conveyor belt two at a time and must be stacked on one of six mannequin heads. Once five hats of the same kind have been stacked on top of each other, they fall down onto another conveyor belt below and are shipped out of the factory, rewarding the player with a cash bonus. (The game keeps track of score as money, not simply points.) Once you ship out enough hats out of the shop, you go up a level to the next shop. The higher shop number you get to, the more types of hats start appearing to make it more difficult for you to accomplish your task. The game ends when one of your stacks of hats reaches the top of the screen.

game.name: Hayauchi Super Igo
game.desc: Hayauchi Super Igo (Quick-play Super Go) is a board game simulation developed by Home Data for the Famicom, and published by Namco in Japan in 1989. It is based on the board game known as Go. The game has three modes. Honinbo Battle is for standard players, where players start at the lowest rank and work their way up to the Champion rank. The Rank Game is for beginner players, and see's them start in the middle rank, moving up and down according to their performance. The Dojo mode is a custom mode that allows you to tailor many aspects of the game, including the grid size, number of players, who starts, and whether there's a handicap.

game.name: Heavy Barrel
game.desc: Heavy Barrel é um shooter com uma visão de cima para baixo semelhante aos guerreiros de comando e ikari. Terroristas tomaram o complexo de controle subterrâneo de um local de mísseis nucleares. Cabe ao jogador se infiltrar na instalação e eliminar o líder do exército terrorista antes que eles possam lançar os mísseis. Para parar os terroristas, você precisará da poderosa arma Heavy Barrel. O problema é que a arma ainda está na instalação. Antes da queda da fortaleza, a arma foi desmontada e trancada em seis armários diferentes. Para derrotar os terroristas, você deve coletar todas as chaves e remontar a arma. O jogo suporta modo coperativo para dois jogadores.

game.name: Hebereke
game.desc: Ufouria é um videogame de aventura de plataforma (rolagem lateral). Você começa a jogar como Hebereke (Bop Louie nas regiões PAL), um pinguim (embora na versão PAL ele seja mais humanóide e se pareça com o Marshmallow Stay-Puft), e deve explorar o mundo em que você e três outros amigos caíram. Ao encontrar os novos personagens, você deve combatê-los para recuperá-los. Depois de recuperar todos os outros três personagens, você estará procurando por Temple Keys, que o levará de volta ao seu mundo natal, Ufouria.

game.name: Hector '87
game.desc:
A top-down/side-scrolling sci-fi shooter in which you take control of a small starfighter as you make your way through an alien planet with your objective being to destroy all enemy forces.
Your ship is equipped with both a standard laser and an independently fired ground weapon, which you must coordinate to defeat ground and aerial enemies. A shield bar keeps track of your damage and you can replenish it by defeating certain enemies, but otherwise its just you, your ship and several stages of alien enemies that alternate between top-down and side-scrolling perspectives.

game.name: Heisei Tensai Bakabon
game.desc:
Heisei Tensai Bakabon is an Action game, developed and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 1991.
The Genius Bakabon is based on the anime and manga ?Heisei Tensai Bakabon?. The game is a platform game vaguely of the classic Prince of Persia variety. You move carefully to avoid dangers, taking care not to make huge falls. Each world of the game is four levels, plus a minigame-style boss round

game.name: Hello Kitty no Hanabatake
game.desc: During the course of this video game, Hello Kitty must water all the flowers in each stage while avoiding the many animals and insects. Kitty's ribbon always stays on the left side of her ear; even if the player changes the orientation of the character. She can defend herself with the use of a large mallet. Running into enemies will make her cry, which causes Kitty to get angry and lose a life. Points in the game are collected as money for the cash register. Allowing the time limit to expire will also cause the player to lose a life. However, there are infinite continues and losing the game score is the only penalty for "game overs." There are 18 stages in the game and the game does not repeat itself after the 18th stage. While the second half of the game is more difficult then the first nine levels, they can be cleared once the player is accustomed to the game controls.

game.name: Hello Kitty World
game.desc:
The little kitten Kitty, her kitten friend Mimi and their bear friend Tippy love playing with balloons. One day, Tippy has inflated a whole bunch of balloons when suddenly a strong wind blows. Tippy is blown away! The only way for Kitty and Mimi to find their friend again is to pick some balloons and fly to her rescue.
Hello Kitty World is quite similar to Balloon Kid – a forced side-scrolling platform adventure where you control a character floating around with a balloon in the hand. Kitty (or Mimi) starts out on each level with two balloons, and by pushing the A button, she moves upward before sinking again if the button is not pushed again. When Kitty comes in contact with an enemy, she will just rebound, but she will fall to the ground if both balloons are hit. By pushing the B button, Kitty can also choose to let go in order to walk around like a normal platform character. This is necessary in order to reach power-ups and hidden areas. Since the scrolling is forced, it is easy to go get stuck and pushed off the screen.
Throughout the levels, Tippy has dropped balloons that can be picked up for points. If twenty balloons are picked up in succession, they turn into double balloons worth more points. Enemies come both in the airbourne and ground-based varieties, along with some fish that can surprisingly jump out of the water. Some enemies can only fly by holding balloons, and just like in Balloon Fight, these can be disposed of by touching their balloons.

game.name: Heracles no Eikou : Toujin Makyou Den
game.desc:
In this game, you play the role of Herakles (or Hercules, in Latin pronunciation), the famous legendary Greek hero. Starting in Athens and wandering all over ancient Greece (and even the mythical land of the dead), you'll have to fight many monsters, including popular figures from Greek mythology like Talos or Hades, and prove yourself worthy of a hero's fame.
The game is very similar to Dragon Warrior series: you fight random enemies in turn-based battles viewed from first-person perspective, collect experience and money, and in towns talk to people and buy weapons, armor, and items. There is no world map in the game, but a continuous location complete with towns and dungeon-like areas.

game.name: Heracles no Eikou II : Titan no Metsubou
game.desc:
Nesta segunda parte da série de RPG de "mitologia grega", o herói principal não é o lendário herói Herakles (Hercules), mas um jovem de uma cidade de Nana, onde vive com sua avó. A rainha diz-lhe que as pessoas estão sendo torturadas por Titãs - uma raça antiga semelhante a deuses controlada pelo Senhor das trevas. Você deve ajudar a libertar as pessoas da ira dos Titãs. Sua primeira tarefa é ir a Atenas e encontrar o famoso poeta Homero que pode falar sobre o caminho para derrotar os titãs. Durante a sua jornada, você conhece muitos personagens da mitologia grega, incluindo Dédalo, Cérbero e Hefesto, e recruta criaturas interessantes para lutar ao seu lado, como o Centauro, um ser metade homem metade cavalo, ou a Mulher Sem Alma. Você também encontrará pessoas reais da história grega, como Homero, o poeta ou Hipócrates, o médico.
A jogabilidade é semelhante ao estilo Dragon Warrior: você viaja no mapa do mundo, visitando cidades e masmorras, conversando com pessoas e lutando contra inimigos e chefes em combates vistos sob a perspectiva de primeira pessoa. Uma inovação interessante é um ciclo de dia / noite completo. Os locais parecem diferentes à noite, e às vezes é necessário visitá-los em horários diferentes.

game.path: ./Higemaru Makaijima - Nanatsu no Shima Dai Bouken (J).7z
game.name: Higemaru : Makai-jima, Nanatsu no Shima Daibouken
game.desc: Higemaru Makaijima (Makaijima Nanatsu no Shima Daibouken, lit. Hell Island: Great Adventure of 7 Islands) is an action-adventure game developed for the Famicom and MSX home computer, and released by Capcom in 1987. It is a sequel to a 1984 arcade game developed by Capcom known as Pirate Ship Higemaru. Neither the arcade game, nor this adventure adaptation were released outside Japan, although a prototype exists for a canceled North American NES release, where it was to be renamed "Makai Island". In Higemaru Makaijima, the hero from Pirate Ship Higemaru named Momotaru must now pilot his own sailing vessel around the ocean surrounding seven islands. His goal is to find the greatest treasure. To do this, he must collect the keys which open the dock gates to each of the islands by invading several pirate ships and defeating the captain on board in combat. The gameplay on these pirate ships are taken directly from the arcade predecessor, with some small modifications. Once Momotaru has collected a key from a pirate ship, he must then sail around the islands in search of the correct dock gate which the key corresponds to. Once there, the player embarks on an exploration of the island to find items, defeat a boss, and collect treasures before heading off in search of another island key. The island exploration sections are extremely reminiscent of dungeon exploration aspects of The Legend of Zelda, to which the game is often compared to.
game.image: ./media/images/Higemaru Makaijima - Nanatsu no Shima Dai Bouken (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Higemaru Makaijima - Nanatsu no Shima Dai Bouken (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Higemaru Makaijima - Nanatsu no Shima Dai Bouken (J).mp4

game.name: Highway Star
game.desc: Rad Racer é um jogo de corrida 3D estilo arcade. O objetivo do jogo é correr para a meta dentro do prazo determinado. Ao longo de cada curso, existem vários pontos de verificação que aumentarão a quantidade de tempo que você tem para chegar ao destino final. Existem oito estágios diferentes, com estradas cada vez mais difíceis, mudanças nas condições climáticas e uma variedade de oponentes que tendem a atrapalhar. Incluído no jogo está um par opcional de óculos 3D vermelho-azul, que pode ser usado para dar ao jogo uma aparência ainda mais 3D.

game.path: ./Foton - The Ultimate Game on Planet Earth (J).7z
game.name: Hikari no Senshi Photon: The Ultimate Game on Planet Earth
game.desc: In the video game, you play a soldier who must navigate through several different floors of a dungeon which contains items and traps. The player must figure out how to maneuver through the dungeon in an effort to collect various items that will expand his ability to search, and find various disks which contain hints and messages to further aid the player. The game is played from a third-person behind-the-shoulder perspective and contains pseudo-3D visuals.
game.image: ./media/images/Foton - The Ultimate Game on Planet Earth (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Foton - The Ultimate Game on Planet Earth (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Foton - The Ultimate Game on Planet Earth (J).mp4

game.path: ./Hi no Tori - Houou Hen - Gaou no Bouken (J).7z
game.name: Hinotori : Houou Hen, Gaou no Bouken
game.desc: Based on the Osamu Tezuka's manga "Phoenix", this platformer is mostly based on the fifth volume, "Hō-ō" (later called "Karma" when it reached North America in May 2004). Here you play as the bandit Gaou, who lost an arm and eye as a baby and as such was scorned by his peers. Since then he has resorted to various tactics, not least murder, to survive. However, one day he fought a monk who encouraged him to change his ways and follow his unfound natural talent to sculpt, which is thus put to good use in a variety of sculptures unique in their raw emotion. And then, he meets a fellow sculptor, Akanemaru, who once was attacked by him, and the two engage in encounters with a phoenix, who, it is said, will grant to those who drink its blood eternal life - and the rest is history.
game.image: ./media/images/Hi no Tori - Houou Hen - Gaou no Bouken (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Hi no Tori - Houou Hen - Gaou no Bouken (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Hi no Tori - Houou Hen - Gaou no Bouken (J).mp4

game.name: Hirake! Ponkikki
game.desc: Hirake! Ponkikki was a long-running Japanese children's program similar to Sesame Street; this game features the show's two main characters, Gachapin the dinosaur and Mukku the yeti, in a little friendly competition. Five mini-games repeat over the course of five islands, and each island must be cleared of all five games before proceeding to the next. The set-up is mainly intended for two players, with one player controlling Gachapin and the other Mukku. In one-player mode, either character may be selected, but the CPU will not compete at any game other than rock-paper-scissors. Players begin with a limited number of lives which may be lost by colliding with enemies or performing poorly at minigames; one extra life is also awarded at the end of each island. However, there is also a password system which allows the game to be resumed from any island.

game.name: Hiryuu no Ken : Ougi no Sho
game.desc: O grande mestre Juan foi roubado dos pergaminhos secretos de Hiryu-no-Ken, que é a postura definitiva de kung-fu que dá a impressão de um dragão voador quando em efeito. Felizmente, Juan confiou o restante do pergaminho ao seu digno aluno, Ryohi. O último pedido de Juan foi para Ryohi visitar Shorinji. Gengai, o bispo de Shorinji, colocou o jovem Ryohi sob suas asas. Seis anos depois, uma carta de desafio é enviada pelos soldados da presa, que são os inimigos de Shorinji. A carta menciona o próximo "Torneio Mundial de Esportes de Contato". Ryuhi decide participar do torneio como representante de Shorinji. Ryuhi também ouve de Gengai que foram os Soldados Tusk que roubaram o mestre de Ryuhi de seus pergaminhos e agora Ryuhi planeja recuperá-los.

game.name: Hiryuu no Ken II : Dragon no Tsubasa
game.desc: Os soldados Tusk novamente ameaçam a paz e a estabilidade, e o mundo precisa do poder do pergaminho do dragão voador e de Ryuhi para derrotá-los.

game.path: ./Hiryuu no Ken 3 - 5 Nin no Ryuu Senshi (J).7z
game.name: Hiryuu no Ken III : 5 Nin no Dragon
game.desc: This game in the series focuses on five warriors who set out on their quest to defeat an evil force. The fighting system in the Hiryu no Ken games is unique since it involves hitting/defending targets on your enemy or yourself, and that is the only way to carry out many of the battles.
game.image: ./media/images/Hiryuu no Ken 3 - 5 Nin no Ryuu Senshi (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Hiryuu no Ken 3 - 5 Nin no Ryuu Senshi (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Hiryuu no Ken 3 - 5 Nin no Ryuu Senshi (J).mp4

game.name: Hiryuu no Ken Special : Fighting Wars
game.desc: Hiryu no Ken Special: Fighting Wars is a mixed fighting game for the Famicom. It focuses on tournament-style fighting, with characters from a wide variety of technical fighting backgrounds. This gives you the option of going with a fighting style that you prefer or find interesting. Japanese wrestling superstar Jushin Thunder Liger appears as a guest character.

game.name: Hissatsu Doujou Yaburi
game.desc:
Hissatsu Doujou Yaburi is an RPG - beat-'em-up hybrid that casts you as a novice martial artist that sets out to roam the ancient Chinese countryside in order to hone his skills and earn fame and fortune.
Starting from your village, you must explore your surroundings by walking and jumping across the land in simple side-scrolling fashion, that is until you run across an enemy (fellow martial artists, bandits, ghouls, etc.) and enter combat mode, which allows you to unleash attacks based on your skill level to try and defeat your opponent (always using the 2D side-scrolling engine).
Victory will earn you money and other bonuses which can be used back in town to upgrade your skills and regain health. You can also enter special tournaments found as special buildings across the land in which you must defeat a series of opponents in succession before facing off against the reigning champion. Victory here will reward you with even more money and will mean more people will recognize you in your travels.

game.name: Hissatsu Shigoto Nin
game.desc: Hissatsu Shigotonin roughly translates to Deadly Work People. I found this name to be pretty strange, but once I started understanding what this game was all about, it made sense. It was released December 15, 1990 exclusively in Japan for the Famicom. It turns out Hissatsu Shigotonin is actually biased off of the popular Japanese historical drama TV series of the same name. The story of both focus on a group of ordinary "work people" who live double lives as assassins. It is an alternate Feudal Japan history (1603-1863) featuring fictional characters with elements of a parallel world. You must uncover a mystery though out the game, which comes though the story in episodes like the TV show. The player controls Nakamura Mondo, a fictional character who is also the star of the TV show. The game is biased on the original 84 episode run/first season of the TV series from 1979-1981 but features characters all the way up to the gameâ€™s release date. The show continues to this day with Assassins as a subtitle. This seems like a really cool concept for a weekly episodic series. The story has an almost assassins creed feel. Iâ€™m sure the idea of everyday people turned into warriors has been around in stories forever, but the setting and time period makes it stand out. Japanâ€™s feudal era is one of the most intense of all the time periods in earthâ€™s history. It was a time of Samurai, Ninja and technology that eventually killed off said Samurai and Ninja. One of the biggest draws of the era is the is the fantastic culture that knew of the outside world, but worked hard in maintaining isolation making them truly unique. The main character, Nakamura Mondo, is a corrupt cop known for accepting bribes who is disrespected by his superiors, and mother-in-law. He ends up bringing together a group of people that have all been wronged in some way, formed to solve mysteries and assassinate targets. The heroes play by the same rules as the villains, as they are not afraid to use underhanded tactics to get the job done. Each episode of the show usually climaxes with the killing of the target, sometimes in an almost humorous manner such as a flower through the skull. I was able to find a random episode but no dubs or subs, which is a bummer since I wanted to learn more of the story. It seems to hold up well to time, has a campy feel to it and comes off like a live action anime. Check out this trailer for one of their many movies to get a better idea of the style, think Al Bundy the Samuri and his gang of misfits.

game.name: Hitler no Fukkatsu : Top Secret
game.desc: Por dois anos, seu povo lutou contra o ataque implacável das forças invasoras. Com seu exército reduzido a um punhado e sua artilharia esgotada, manter a resistência parecia impossível. Mas em um laboratório subterrâneo oculto, uma equipe de cientistas finalmente aperfeiçoou um novo tipo de mecanismo de combate: um braço biônico que se estende e contrai, fornecendo força e manobrabilidade sem precedentes. Combinado com um arsenal de armas de fogo rápido, perfuradoras de armaduras e de busca de calor, isso colocará o poder de um exército inteiro nas mãos de um homem ... um soldado cuidadosamente escolhido, que tem o que é preciso para se tornar uma nova raça de combatente imparável ... um comando biônico. E você é esse soldado! Sua missão o levará através do deserto fortemente patrulhado em torno do quartel-general inimigo e até o coração da própria fortaleza. Mesmo para o soldado mais corajoso, isso pareceria um desafio impossível. Mas nunca houve um soldado como o Comando Biônico!

game.name: Hokkaidou Rensa Satsujin : Okhotsk ni Kiyu
game.desc: This time, your initial investigation of a dead body found floating in Tokyo B

game.name: Hokuto no Ken 2
game.desc:
Este é um jogo de plataforma "beat -'em-up" baseado na série animé Hokuto no Ken. Kenshirou, o personagem principal, tem que salvar as pessoas do maligno Imperador Céu. O jogo em si, no entanto, não apresenta nenhuma história, mas muita ação de plataforma. Você tem que correr rapidamente pelos níveis (há um limite de tempo), socando e chutando seus inimigos, fazendo com que eles voem ou explodam, ocasionalmente encontrando um chefe, visitando áreas secretas atrás de portas e coletando vários power-ups.
Este é de fato o segundo jogo da série; o primeiro nunca foi lançado fora do Japão.

game.path: ./Hokuto no Ken 3 - Shin Seiki Souzou Seiken Restuden (J).7z
game.name: Hokuto no Ken 3 : Shin Seiki Souzou Seiken Restuden
game.desc:
This RPG is based on the animé series Hokuto no Ken, a.k.a. Fist of the North Star. In 1999, a demonic attack caused devastated the human population. In order to re-build the ruined world and to survive in a struggle against demon lords and their minions, mankind needs the power of the Northern Star. You take control of Kenshirou, the hero of the series, and his friends, in a quest to save the humanity and to defeat the evil.
Roaming the wasteland, visiting towns and dangerous dungeons, Kenshirou and his friends will encounter various enemies whom they will have to defeat in turn-based battles. The battle screen shows both parties as animé-style pictures. In boss battles Kenshirou will have to defeat his foes one-on-one.
game.image: ./media/images/Hokuto no Ken 3 - Shin Seiki Souzou Seiken Restuden (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Hokuto no Ken 3 - Shin Seiki Souzou Seiken Restuden (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Hokuto no Ken 3 - Shin Seiki Souzou Seiken Restuden (J).mp4

game.path: ./Hokuto no Ken 4 - Shichisei Haken Den - Hokuto Shinken no Kanata he (J).7z
game.name: Hokuto no Ken 4 : Shichisei Haken Den, Hokuto Shinken no Kanata e
game.desc:
This is a RPG set in the universe of the animé series Hokuto no Ken, known outside of Japan as Fist of the North Star. You, the nameless young hero, return to your home village after a prolonged absence, only to find out that a mysterious evil has been plaguing it, and everybody need his help. He decides to investigate the matter and starts a dangerous journey, during which he teams up with some of the characters from the animé series.
The gameplay is pretty similar to Dragon Quest: you interact with things and people by choosing commands from a menu, wander around the world map and fight random enemies from first-person perspective. The enemies and your team members are shown as animé-style pictures during battles.
game.image: ./media/images/Hokuto no Ken 4 - Shichisei Haken Den - Hokuto Shinken no Kanata he (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Hokuto no Ken 4 - Shichisei Haken Den - Hokuto Shinken no Kanata he (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Hokuto no Ken 4 - Shichisei Haken Den - Hokuto Shinken no Kanata he (J).mp4

game.name: Hokuto no Ken
game.desc: Este é um Beat-'Em-Up de rolagem lateral, baseado no anime de mesmo nome. Você controla Kenshirou, o personagem principal da série, tentando resgatar sua namorada Julia. Avançando da direita para a esquerda, você notará várias portas nas quais poderá entrar. Em algumas dessas portas, você verá a imagem de Julia que indicará o caminho correto para você. Além de entrar nas portas, você estará ocupado golpeando e chutando inimigos punk que o atacam de perto ou com projéteis. O jogo apresenta animação sangrenta pela morte de seus inimigos: suas cabeças são arrancadas dos corpos e explodem.

game.name: Holy Diver
game.desc:
Randy, the Holy Diver, is setting out to retrieve the five emblem seals belonging to the King Crimson Family in order to expel the greatest evil, the Black Slayer, back into another dimension.
Holy Diver is an action game much in the vein of Castlevania. The player controls the Diver as he uses magic powers such as shooting energy balls and freezing time to traverse the game's eight levels. Enemies throughout the levels respawn and there are destroyable objects in your path. At the end of each level a tougher boss character must be beaten. Once defeated a power-up spell becomes available to the player. To use these spells the player must pause the game and select it from the inventory menu. The player has the ability to shoot horizontally as well as up. Difficult paths may sometimes be crossed by the combination of the right spell at the right time such as the freezing spell that freezes quicksand.
Though scheduled for release in North America, the game never went beyond its release in Japan.

game.name: Honoo no Toukyuuji : Dodge Danpei 2
game.desc: Dodge Danpei 2 is a Nintendo NES console sport game. Second part of the series, the developers have added some improvement over its predecessor. The first game only playable with a card system is maintained, but we see appear a game mode against a friend or the actual dodge ball computer (ball to the prisoner).

game.name: Honoo no Toukyuuji : Dodge Danpei
game.desc:
Danpei Ichigeki is a young boy who loves dodgeball. Danpei's father was a famous dodgeball player when he was still alive, and he joins the Dodgeball Club at his elementary school. However, these kids are very serious about their dodgeball, and the road ahead isn't going to be easy for Danpei.
Dodge Danpei is a team dodgeball game, one of several based on the anime and manga created by Tetsuhiro Koshita, which plays strikingly similar to the well-known Super Dodge Ball. Each team has four main players and three support players, and attempts to knock out the opposing team's main members by throwing the ball at them in various ways. Apart from normal throws, the player can also pass to teammates, and execute special power throws which are harder to dodge or catch.

game.name: Honshougi : Naitou 9 Dan Shougi Hiden
game.desc: This game lets players play the Japanese board game Shogi. Shogi is a game that is played in a similar way as chess. Players take turns moving their pieces in a strategic manner with the main goal of capturing their opponents pieces.

game.name: Hook
game.desc:
Nesta adaptação de videogame do filme de Steven Spielberg, Hook, o jogador assume o papel de Peter Pan adulto, cujos filhos foram sequestrados pelo capitão Hook. Tinker Bell leva Peter de volta a Neverland, onde ele deve novamente se tornar Pan e recuperar seus filhos.
Essa interpretação em particular é um jogo de ação com rolagem lateral, no qual os jogadores devem abrir caminho pelos habitantes de Hook por 11 níveis. Isso inclui florestas, regiões geladas e cidades pelas quais Peter terá que pular, escalar e nadar. Itens mágicos como maçãs e pó de duende podem ser coletados para poderes especiais. Quando os inimigos são atacados, eles simplesmente levantam as mãos em sinal de rendição, em vez de morrer, de modo a tornar o jogo mais amigável para as crianças.

game.path: ./Hoshi no Kirby - Yume no Izumi no Monogatari (J).7z
game.name: Hoshi no Kirby : Yume no Izumi no Monogatari
game.desc: Kirby's Adventure é um jogo de ação/plataforma de rolagem horizontal. Nele, você controla a bolinha rosa Kirby, explorando numerosas e coloridas terras com uma variedade de inimigos para derrotar. Para ajudar em sua aventura, Kirby possui a habilidade de engolir inimigos e cuspi-los como projéteis. Além disso, certos inimigos podem ser engolidos e ter a sua habilidade absorvida (por exemplo, Kirby pode ganhar uma espada, disparar lasers ou até mesmo voar pelas fases). Existem sete localidades diferentes, cada uma dividida em múltiplas fases e, algumas vezes, contendo alguns minijogos bônus. O jogo possui opção de salvar o seu progresso, dispensando o uso de passwords.
game.image: ./media/images/Hoshi no Kirby - Yume no Izumi no Monogatari (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Hoshi no Kirby - Yume no Izumi no Monogatari (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Hoshi no Kirby - Yume no Izumi no Monogatari (J).mp4

game.name: Hoshi o Miru Hito
game.desc:
In the far future, the apocalypse has come and gone. Now people leave peacefully in rural cities making the best of the advanced technology that survives and trying to win back the world day by day. Ark City, the crown jewel of technological advances, has managed to put back into operation a super computer capable of taking control of every aspect of civilization, right down to weather and mind control. This does not bode well for the people of the world, so you as an ESP-gifted warrior take it upon yourself to journey to Ark City and get rid of this threat.
Hoshi wo Miru Hito is a classic NES-era RPG, in which you navigate your party (composed of you and 3 other ESP-wielding heroes you can find) in a top-down world map, chat with NPCs in towns, buy weapons and armor, and finally journey into dungeons to gain clues that help you in your journey.
Combat whisks you away from the top-down perspective to a battle view in which you see your opponents and heroes in a first-person perspective, and assign actions in turns, with the ESP powers taking the place of magic spells.

game.name: Hostages : The Embassy Mission
game.desc: Os terroristas invadiram uma embaixada e mantêm o povo como reféns. Você controla seis contra-terroristas cuja missão é eliminar os terroristas. Na primeira parte do jogo, você deve colocar três homens em posição para que possam atacar o prédio. A segunda parte envolve entrar no prédio com os outros três homens para matar os terroristas e resgatar os reféns. Dependendo de quão bem você posicionou seus atiradores, você pode usá-los para ajudá-lo nessa missão.

game.name: Hototogisu
game.desc: Hototogisu es un juego de simulación de guerra desarrollado por Tamtex para Famicom y publicado por Irem en 1988. El juego se desarrolla en los Estados Combatientes de la era del Japón feudal, también conocido como el periodo Sengoku, el mismo período histórico en el que muchos otros juegos de simulación de guerra japonés se desarrollan, como Koei's Nobunaga's Ambition. El juego lleva el nombre de un ave nativa de Japón, el Cuco Menor. El objetivo es equilibrar los deberes de uno como daimyo (señor feudal) con la expansión y el aumento de los territorios a través de la guerra y la diplomacia. Hototogisu sería seguido muchos años después en 2008 con Sengoku Efuda Yuugi: Hototogisu Ran para PSP, que utiliza la estructura básica de su antepasado de Famicom, pero también introduce un elemento de juego de cartas coleccionables en la estrategia.

game.name: Hottarman no Chitei Tanken
game.desc: Players get to dig up dirt beneath the surface, find keys behind four doors, and then find the door to the next level. The most obvious game to compare it to is Dig Dug, but without the boulders and with various devices like teleporting doors, speed, dynamite, and a wet suit. There are 15 levels in the entire game; which repeat themselves after the 15th level is finished. Lava can spew out at a vertical direction towards the player and kill him; it does not reset itself even after the players loses a life (but it does reset itself after a game over) Passwords are activated by pressing a certain button combination on the password screen. Several passwords results in cheat codes that does certain things; such as deactivating the lava in all levels of the game. Certain type of blocks are worth different points once they are dug up; ranging from common dirt to destructible blocks. The game features an instant death clause where players die in a single hit. Killed enemies reappear at the same location where they were killed the first time.

game.name: Hudson Hawk
game.desc: Hudson Hawk, um ladrão de gatos, tem uma missão: roubar três obras de arte de Da Vinci, que incluem um cavalo de balanço conhecido como "The Sforza", seu caderno de esboços que ele chamou de "The Codex" e um cristal precioso. A missão o levará por uma mansão, castelos, telhados, metrôs e pelo Vaticano. Obviamente, obter todos esses itens não será tão fácil quanto parece. Hawk não apenas enfrenta guardas de segurança, cães de guarda e outros, mas também deve evitar disparar alarmes. Para ajudá-lo, Hawk pode dar um soco nos inimigos ou jogar uma bola neles.

game.name: Hyakkiyagyou
game.desc: Hyakki Yagyou is named after the Night Parade of the 100 Demons of Japanese folklore, when various youkai and other Japanese demons come out of hiding for a single night to scare people. The game is otherwise a fairly traditional 8-bit RPG, though it does feature uncommon aspects such as being able to see enemies while walking around (as opposed to the then-usual random encounters) and a regularly-proportioned adult protagonist. There is also no overworld map - both the towns and monster-infested wilderness are directly connected.

game.path: ./Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari - The Tales on a Watery Wilderness (J).7z
game.name: Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari : The Tales on a Watery Wilderness
game.desc: This Famicom title by ASK combines the mechanics of a tabletop board game with the battle style and character progression of a role-playing game to create an interesting hybrid. One to two players can embark on a great adventure to explore the realm of Yukiria and complete quests for its inhabitants, with multiple endings possible!
game.image: ./media/images/Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari - The Tales on a Watery Wilderness (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari - The Tales on a Watery Wilderness (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Hyaku no Sekai no Monogatari - The Tales on a Watery Wilderness (J).mp4

game.name: Hydlide 3 : Yami kara no Houmonsha
game.desc:
After the evil dragon lord Varalys tried to enchant the princess Ann, he was thought to be defeated by a brave warrior. But evil can never be defeated once and for all - once again, a curse has fallen upon the land, and you, a nameless young boy, is the only one who can save it. Equipped with your magical sword, you must roam the land of Hydlide and defeat the evil once again.
This is the second NES game of Hydlide series ("Hydlide 2" was only available for the MSX platform). You can choose one of the four character classes to start the game with, and also upgrade your class during the game. The combat is action-based: you can either attack your enemies by ramming them with your weapons, or cast magical spells. In towns there are equipment and items to buy.

game.name: Hydlide Special
game.desc:
Um demônio do mal chamado Varalys lança uma maldição sobre a princesa Ann, transformando-a em três fadas. Você controla Sir Jim e sai em busca das fadas, e depois mata Varalys. Somente derrotando Varalys a maldição pode ser levantada. Depois que a princesa for restaurada, o reino será salvo.
A luta é um pouco mais profunda do que hack and slash. Você pode lutar com uma postura defensiva ou ofensiva, ou pode usar feitiços mágicos.

game.name: Hyokkori Hyoutan-jima : Nazo no Kaizokusen
game.desc: Hyokkori Hyoutan-jima - Nazo No Kaizokusen que acompaña al juego no debería dar miedo; de hecho, todo está extremadamente claro aquí. Los niveles del juego son una especie de laberintos, y para el pasarlos necesitas conectar con un poco de ingenio rápido. En algún lugar, mueva el cañón al lugar correcto, en algún lugar para disparar la palanca, en algún lugar para encontrar el teletransportador deseado, etc. Para completar el nivel, generalmente necesitas encontrar y abrir un cofre pirata.

game.name: Hyper Olympic
game.desc:
O Track & Field é um jogo esportivo que permite ao jogador ter uma experiência baseada nos Jogos Olímpicos de Verão. É baseado em um jogo de arcade com o mesmo nome. Os eventos incluem corrida de 100 metros, arremesso de martelo, salto em distância e obstáculos de 110 metros.
A versão MSX substitui os obstáculos por um traço de 400 metros.
A versão NES adiciona tiro ao alvo, salto triplo, lançamento de dardo, salto em altura e tiro com arco como eventos, mas perde o evento de lançamento do martelo. A versão NES também mantém os obstáculos de 110 metros e renuncia ao traço de 400 metros.

game.name: Hyper Olympic
game.desc:
O Track & Field é um jogo esportivo que permite ao jogador ter uma experiência baseada nos Jogos Olímpicos de Verão. É baseado em um jogo de arcade com o mesmo nome. Os eventos incluem corrida de 100 metros, arremesso de martelo, salto em distância e obstáculos de 110 metros.
A versão MSX substitui os obstáculos por um traço de 400 metros.
A versão NES adiciona tiro ao alvo, salto triplo, lançamento de dardo, salto em altura e tiro com arco como eventos, mas perde o evento de lançamento do martelo. A versão NES também mantém os obstáculos de 110 metros e renuncia ao traço de 400 metros.

game.name: Hyper Sports
game.desc: Seis eventos difíceis aguardam neste jogo de ação que combina manoplas. A sequência completa de eventos é - natação, tiro ao alvo, ginástica, tiro com arco, salto triplo e levantamento de peso. Você deve completar cada evento para poder entrar no próximo.

game.name: I Love Softball
game.desc:
Games end after seven innings unless the two teams have an identical score (tie game). The object is to win the championship using female softball players. Players must choose between the six major high schools from all of the regions of Japan. The artificial intelligence of the game is strong, causing even strong human-controlled teams to frequently lose to the computer. It is possible to throw an underhanded pitch in this game up to 120 kilometres per hour (75 mph).
After winning the Japanese high school championship, the player must take on the American women's softball team before becoming a professional softball player.The game looks similar to a video game that belongs to the Family Stadium baseball video game franchise. Players play their high school games at Hanshin KÅ shien Stadium.
If the player loses one game, play starts over unless the player uses a password to return to the previous round. The game's password feature allows games to be replayed and maintains total memory of which teams have already been defeated. However, the passwords and long and very difficult to remember.
Pachio-kun, an anime-like pachinko ball that is famous for starring in the game American Dream (which was made by the same company as I Love Softball), announces the team that will be batting for three outs.

game.name: Ide Yousuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong II
game.desc: It is the sequel to the third of a trio of third party Mahjong games developed for the Nintendo Famicom within two months during 1987 including Mahjong Kazoku by Irem and Family Mahjong by Namco. It is the most unique for two reasons. The first is that it ships with a unique controller explicitly designed for Mahjong games. The second is that it does not play the traditional mahjong game, but rather a variation of the game known as "Reach Mahjong" or "Attack Mahjong".

game.name: Ide Yousuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong
game.desc: Ide Yosuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong is a mahjong game developed and published by Capcom. The game shipped with a unique controller that was explicitly designed for Mahjong games and resembles a keyboard. The game is unplayable without it. Ide Yosuke Meijin no Jissen Mahjong does not play the traditional mahjong game, but rather a variation of the game known as "Reach Mahjong" or "Attack Mahjong".

game.name: Idol Hakkenden
game.desc:
Japan-exclusive text adventure video game developed by Natsume and published by Towa Chiki in 1989 for the Family Computer.
Erika, an aspiring musician and pop idol, must foil a plot that could ruin her music career. As a Japanese adventure game, players must select through menus of dialogue in order to determine her future. Friends (and sometimes rivals) of Erika give her advice on what to do next.
There are six songs in the game; all of them belonging to the J-pop genre. Erika must master them all in order to become the greatest idol in all of Japan. Lyrics are not sung by a voice actor; they are shown on the bottom of the screen instead.

game.name: Idol Shisen Mahjong
game.desc: In Tiles Of Fate the object of the game is to clear the screen of all the tiles within the given time limit. This is done by selecting two tiles with matching symbols which will cause them to disappear due to the force of symmetry. However, the force of symmetry can only make two right angles at most, and can not pass through other tiles. To clear all the tiles, you will need to plan your moves carefully. To help out, you may discover one of three forces of fate under a tile which can be saved and used when you're stuck. The forces are The Flash of Chance (allows symmetry to affect any matching tiles on the board, even those surrounded by other tiles), The Force of Balance (will eliminate brick walls that block the path of symmetry) and The Flag of Knowledge (this will make your next move for you in case you can't spot what the best move is.) Also included is a level editor which lets you create your own tile challenges!

game.name: Igo : Kyuu Roban Taikyoku
game.desc:
Igo: Kyuu Roban Taikyoku is the first real attempt to bring the Japanese board game Go to a home console, namely the Famicom. The game was designed by Henk Rogers, a Dutch programmer who would play games of Go against the CEO (at the time) of Nintendo, Hiroshi Yamauchi. It was during one such game that the prospect of developing such a title for the Famicom was discussed. It was later converted from disk format to cartridge and release in August 1987.
Prior to the release of this game, Nintendo had released a game which was played on the Go board in 1983, known as Gomoku Narabe Renju, but the play mechanics were more akin to "Connect Four" (or five, as it were). The real game of Go is traditionally played on a 19 Ã— 19 grid, but the permutations of possibilities would take too long for the Famicom's processor to consider, so the board size has been significantly reduced to a 9 Ã— 9 grid, which allows for a smoother single player experience. The game also features a lesson mode, in which ninjas appear to teach the player about the rules and strategy of the game.

game.name: Igo Meikan
game.desc:
Get the game going with the A button or START.
The Main Menu has four options: 1. Watch Mode (1) Automatic 2. Watch Mode (2) Manual 3. Pick Correctly Mode (1) 5 Choices 4. Pick Correctly Mode (2) No Help
Speed: 1-5 (Slow-Fast). Only asked for the Watch Mode.
Blue boxes at the top left and right are the players for white and black. They have ranks, one being the Challenger (挑戦者) and one just a ranked player. Underneath the player is the handicap he or she is using, if applicable. The red box is the game number, which doesn't really affect anything. The small pots are the pieces that were removed during play for each player at their side. The main grid is, of course, the Go board, and the small text box at the bottom is for messages and other important information such as commentary.

game.name: Igo Shinan '91
game.desc: Igo Shinan ("Go Lessons") is a simulation of the popular board game Go from Hect. True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn. Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.

game.name: Igo Shinan '92
game.desc: Igo Shinan ("Go Lessons") is a simulation of the popular board game Go from Hect. True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn. Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.nn

game.name: Igo Shinan '93
game.desc: Igo Shinan ("Go Lessons") is a simulation of the popular board game Go from Hect. True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn. Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.

game.name: Igo Shinan '94
game.desc: This game is the final updated iteration of the Igo Shinan (or Igo Meikan) puzzle board game series.

game.name: Igo Shinan
game.desc:
Igo Shinan ("Go Lessons") is a simulation of the popular board game Go from Hect. True to its name, it teaches players at both novice and expert level how to improve their Go game and provides some challenging computer opponents to play against. The player can set how much guidance the game will offer, including presenting possible moves for the player to take (generally, one is more favorable than the others) and allowing the computer to take over their turn.
Hect would follow up Igo Shinan with four sequels, each referring to the year in which they were released: Igo Shinan '91, Igo Shinan '92, Igo Shinan '93, and Igo Shinan '94. Igo Shinan, and all its sequels, were only released in Japan. This was and continues to remain standard practice for most video games based on Go or Mahjong, as both board games are far less popular outside of Asia.

game.name: Ikari II : Dogosoken
game.desc: Pesados em ação, os Ikari Warriors se tornaram os favoritos nos fliperamas e nos consoles domésticos. Para alimentar esse frenesi, a SNK e a Tradewest se uniram novamente para uma sequência, Victory Road, lançada no final do mesmo ano.nnnnDesta vez, os guerreiros Ikari enfrentam inimigos mais cósmicos, combatendo bestas com cabeça de pedra, homens verdes de um olho e outras criaturas estranhas.

game.name: Ikari III
game.desc: É o fim do século XX. Uma recessão econômica mundial causa estragos na nação e no planeta. A ameaça iminente da anarquia deu origem a uma organização secreta chamada "Crime Ghost". Perigosamente preparado para dominar o mundo com sua estratégia diabólica, "Crime Ghost" se infiltrou em todos os países simultaneamente. Há um presidente que iniciou um plano para acabar com a associação, mas agora sua casa foi atacada e sua filha Elise sequestrada. Chegou uma carta exigindo que ele renunciasse à sua poderosa posição dentro de alguns dias; caso contrário, sua bela Elise será executada da maneira mais desagradável. A carta está assinada como "Faust", o notório mentor do Crime Ghost. O presidente sabe a quem ele deve recorrer. Ele convocou dois homens, Paul e Vince, os incríveis guerreiros Ikari. Agora você se torna Paul e Vince! Você deve ir ao esconderijo do inimigo, resgatar a adorável Elise, combater o Crime Ghost e destruir todos eles!

game.name: Ikari Warriors
game.desc: Uma conversão do jogo de arcade, Ikari Warriors é um jogo de ação com rolagem vertical. Um ou dois jogadores abrem caminho por uma variedade de terrenos, como florestas, rios e ruínas. Ao longo do caminho, diferentes armas podem ser encontradas, incluindo metralhadoras, granadas e lançadores de foguetes.

game.path: ./Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu - Subette Koronde Dai Rantou (J).7z
game.name: Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu : Subette Koronde Dai
game.desc: Hey there, this is the Nekketsu High School Paper. Our own Kunio has become famous as a leader. With him we won both the dodge ball and soccer championships. They competed and won at the world stage, it is truly amazing. But did you know, Nekketsu High also has an ice hockey club? Sadly, our team is very weak... We probably won't even make the playoffs in the next national championship. Perhaps Kunio can lead our ice hockey team to victory as well. With him, would it become a successful team, or still be in the minor leagues? Passionate ice hockey spirit! Good luck everyone!
game.image: ./media/images/Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu - Subette Koronde Dai Rantou (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu - Subette Koronde Dai Rantou (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Ike Ike! Nekketsu Hockey Bu - Subette Koronde Dai Rantou (J).mp4

game.name: Ikinari Musician
game.desc:
Ikinari Musician provides a piano-like keyboard, a treble clef on the staff to show note location, a 5-channel Backing track, 4 timbre choices, and controllers to manipulate common synthesizer parameters such as release and attack, LFO, etc. It also provides recording and play back function.
The player has many choices of styles of the backing track, from popular styles such as Rock, Techno, and Jazz, to various ethnic flavors such as Bossa, Rio, Japan, India, Arabia, etc.
The backing tracks representing the styles use familiar elements to make the game more accessible to the general audience. For example, in the Scotland style Cadence to Arms, a familiar bagpipes tune, is used.
Most backing tracks loop around one or two chords, allowing an open improvisation on the main keyboard. Once the style is chosen, the main keyboard is masked in the way that only the scale that easily fits into the style is available, e.g. blues scale, pentatonic scale, etc.
The keyboard is controlled by the UP-DOWN or LEFT-RIGHT d-pads on the game controller so there is no way to play leaps in the scale.
Due to the hardware limitation, the sound produced is the typical 8-bit chiptune music.

game.name: Ikki
game.desc: The game is set in medieval Japan, where a poor farming village is planning an insurrection to overthrow their feudal overlord. However, the only participants in the revolt are the player's character, Gonbe, and the optional second-player character, Tago (??), and the player battles against an army of ninjas instead of samurai and foot soldiers. The game displays text in the vertical direction, which was very unusual for a game of the period, and all in-game messages use speech reminiscent of jidaigeki films. The game consists of four different levels, with the fifth level being an alternate version of the first, the sixth being an alternate version of the second, and so on. The difficulty gradually increases as the game progresses, and the game levels loop infinitely. There is no ending screen for the game, and completion of level 99 brings the player to level 00, which is an alternate version of the fourth level. The player returns to level 01 after completing level 00. A "secret letter" appears on-screen after each of the first 8 levels in the Famicom version. The secret letters displayed are E, R, A, W, T, F, O, S, in order, and if the letters are read backwards as indicated in the game's instruction manual, they form the word "SOFTWARE." This code word was required for the gift campaign that was conducted during the game's initial release.

game.name: Image Fight
game.desc:
Uma misteriosa forma de vida alienígena está se espalhando por toda a galáxia, tentando conquistar o mundo. Ele assumiu o controle da base da lua e está ameaçando descer na Terra. Os humanos enviaram o caça mais avançado para se opor aos alienígenas: o OF-1. O OF-1 tem a capacidade de alterar a velocidade a qualquer momento e equipar diferentes armas e pods.
