Magical Taruruuto-kun is a Japanese manga series by Tatsuya Egawa, published in Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump from 1988 to 1992, spanning a 21-volume collected edition. It was adapted into an anime television series that lasted 87 episodes and three feature films from 1990 through 1992.

game.name: Magical Taruruuto-kun 2 : Mahou Daibouken
game.desc: Second release in the Magical Taruruuto-kun inspired action games on the Famicom, developed by TOSE and published by Bandai, which was released in Japan in 1992. This time our hero fights with his hands, unlike the first act in which he fought the enemy with his tongue. Travel through many worlds with many levels trying not to be touched by the many enemies that occupy them.Magical Taruruuto-kun is a Japanese manga series by Tatsuya Egawa, published in Shueisha's Weekly Shonen Jump from 1988 to 1992, spanning a 21-volume collected edition. It was adapted into an anime television series that lasted 87 episodes and three feature films from 1990 through 1992.

game.name: Magmax
game.desc: Uma ameaça alienígena atacou os mundos da civilização e devastou seus planetas. No entanto, antes de ser conquistado, um grupo de cientistas conseguiu criar uma última arma e a ocultou no subsolo. O nome da arma é Mag Max e somente ela poderá derrotar os invasores alienígenas. Mag Max, no entanto, está incompleto e, por razões de segurança, suas partes componentes estão espalhadas por todo o país. Através de sua coleção, a força de Mag Max aumenta.nnnnMag Max é um jogo de tiro com rolagem lateral. No início, Mag Max é apenas uma minúscula nave de combate que pode disparar projéteis de baixa potência. Como peças componentes são encontradas; como cabeça, pernas e lança laser, o poder ofensivo de Mag Max aumenta. O acesso ao submundo pode ser concedido através de pequenas crateras escuras na paisagem. Uma vez no submundo, as armas de Mag Max variam um pouco, assim como os inimigos (não há objetos estacionários no subsolo). Incêndio ou contato inimigo em cada um dos componentes destruirá esse componente. O fogo no lutador principal destruirá o Mag Max. No final de cada nível, espera uma criatura chefe.

game.name: Magnum Kikiippatsu : Empire City, 1931
game.desc: Nesta sala de fliperama de conversão de Empire City: 1931, que se passa em 1931, você é um agente federal que precisa eliminar todas as atividades criminosas na cidade de Nova York. Você deve caçar os criminosos e matá-los um por um. Para localizar um criminoso, basta seguir a seta à esquerda ou à direita da tela. Matar criminosos é feito movendo a cruz sobre eles. Um contador regressivo começará a contagem regressiva se um criminoso começar a atirar em você. Você deve matar o criminoso antes que o cronômetro chegue a zero ou perca uma vida. Novas balas podem ser coletadas atirando nas caixas de bala que aparecem regularmente no jogo como outros objetos úteis. Os criminosos às vezes tomam reféns por proteção. Resgate esses reféns para obter pontos adicionais. Disparar sua arma é feito com o botão de disparo 1 e desviar as balas pressionando o botão de disparo 2.

game.name: Maharaja
game.desc:
Maharaja is an adventure game with RPG elements published by Sunsoft and developed by Quest.
The protagonist is a young man who recovers a mystical treasure box belonging to the Maharaja from the river Ganges. He is rewarded with a feast for recovering the item, but the princess warns him later the same night that the Maharaja's generosity is a ruse and that he is being controlled by an evil wizard and plans to kill the hero in the morning. The hero escapes the palace to look for a way to free the Maharaja and rescue the princess, acquiring the assistance of the gods along the way.
Maharaja features an adventure game interface with a small viewing window for whatever the player character is seeing as well as a list of commands on the side that the player character can try. Speech and other descriptive text appears below the picture window. In addition, the player can also find themselves embroiled in random battles which play out like other turn-based RPGs of the era. The player can find and equip new gear as well as learn new spells as the game continues.
The game was never officially localized into English nor was it ever released outside of Japan. A fan translation was created in 2009, however.

game.name: Mahjong Club Nagatachou : Sousaisen
game.desc: El juego ofrece dos modos: juego regular y torneo. En un juego normal, seleccionamos tres oponentes (todos son del mismo nivel); todos tiran dados para decidir quién camina primero. Tan pronto como el juego termina, el juego va al menú principal. En el torneo, el juego es el mismo, con la excepción de jugadores de diferentes niveles profesionales y el hecho de que se juega con puntos. El idioma es el japonés.

game.name: Mahjong RPG Dora Dora Dora
game.desc: Gamelove has the following information about the game Mahjong RPG Dora Dora Dora available on NES. Mahjong RPG Dora Dora Dora is a board game released on Nintendo NES in 90. This app offers a novelty yet unused in the famous Chinese board game Mahjong. In fact, the game offers you to play simple games against a computer or the possibility of browsing an adventure in a real RPG. It is then a question of fighting your enemies by confronting you around a table.

game.name: Mahjong Taikai
game.desc: Mahjong Taikai é um jogo de mahjong no qual o jogador compete contra personagens históricos famosos. A maioria dos oponentes são famosos senhores da guerra, como Júlio César, Zhuge Liang, Gengis Khan, Oda Nobunaga, Napoleão e outros.

game.name: Mahjong Taisen
game.desc: Juego de rol de mahjong futurista con reglas clásicas, donde caemos en una nave espacial a un planeta desconocido. Como resultado, está poblada por una población medieval completamente fantástica. Poco después del accidente, nos encontramos con un guardia, y él nos lleva al rey, que se complace en luchar contra nosotros en la primera batalla de Mahjong. El personaje tiene vidas y maná que aumentan con el nivel. Al perder, perdemos nuestras vidas, y generalmente jugamos hasta que ganamos varias veces, o seamos derrotados. El mana se gasta en acciones especiales durante las partidas de mahjong. Durante el viaje, podremos comunicarnos, interactuar con objetos y entrar en diferentes batallas. Si no quieres pelear, puedes comprar un "anillo de escape" en las tiendas (como muchos otros objetos). El juego está completamente en japonés.

game.name: Mahjong
game.desc: As the title suggests, this game let's players play a game of Mahjong. Players receive and discard tiles until they complete hands by forming groups and pairs. Players can choose to play on either a beginner, intermediate, or expert difficulty level. The expert skill level introduces a time limit to the proceedings. The game also keeps track of the score during gameplay.

game.path: ./Mahou no Princess Minky Momo - Remember Dream (J).7z
game.name: Mahou no Princess Minky Momo : Remember Dream
game.desc: Jeu d'aventure basé sur le manga "Princess Minky Momo" ("Il était une fois Gigi" en Francais)
game.image: ./media/images/Mahou no Princess Minky Momo - Remember Dream (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Mahou no Princess Minky Momo - Remember Dream (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Mahou no Princess Minky Momo - Remember Dream (J).mp4

game.name: Maison Ikkoku
game.desc: Maison Ikkoku for the NES is a roleplay game inspired from the manga of the same name. The game follows the principle of "gamebooks", and goes along with the decisions you take during the game.

game.name: Majaventure : Mahjong Senki
game.desc: Este es un juego de NES que trata con la versión original de Mahjong, un juego que se originó en Asia hace muchos siglos, pero con un toque único de estilo RPG. Mahjong es un juego adictivo que se parece mucho al póker, pero con fichas. Tiene sus propias complejidades y estar en japonés no ayuda a las audiencias de habla inglesa, pero, una vez que aprendas, ¡puedes pasar un momento increíblemente divertido con este juego!

game.name: Major League
game.desc: That best comedy Baseball movie is here translated into a family computer game! Hot fights among 14 teams from the U.S. major leagues and Japanese leagues! Any synthesizing ICâ€™s make you feel as if you were really in the stadium.

game.name: Majou Densetsu II : Daimashikyou Galious
game.desc:
The sequel to Konami's MSX game Knightmare. While the first game was an overhead, vertical scrolling shooter, The Maze of Galious is a side-view, flick-screen platform game. The player controls Popolon and Aphrodite, entering the evil priest Galious' castle to free their yet-to-be-born son Pampas from the priest's evil clutches.
Majou Densetsu II: Daimashikyou Galious is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by Konami, which was released in Japan in 1987.

game.name: Makaimura
game.desc: O cavaleiro Arthur precisa enfrentar um vasto exército de monstros, fantasmas e demônios para salvar sua princesa, aprisionada no castelo de Astaroth. Para tal, o jogador deverá correr por vários cenários repletos de seres das trevas que querem derrotá-lo. Há armaduras e armas extras durante as fases.

game.name: Maniac Mansion
game.desc: A mansão Edison sempre foi uma casa velha e assustadora nos arredores da cidade. Houve rumores de experiências estranhas acontecendo e de criaturas estranhas vivendo entre a família Edison. Há até uma história de que um meteorito caiu perto de casa há quase 20 anos. Mais imediatamente, uma garota chamada Sandy desapareceu da escola secundária local e seu namorado Dave jura que viu o Dr. Fred a seqüestrando. Dave sabe que não pode fazer isso sozinho e precisará de ajuda de outros dois estudantes, se tiver alguma esperança de se infiltrar na mansão e resgatar Sandy.

game.name: Mappy Kids
game.desc: O rato Mappy teve um filho chamado Happy. Happy cresceu e agora quer morar com uma esposa. No entanto, a garota com quem ele quer se casar não vai concordar com o casamento até que Happy prove que pode sustentar uma família. Portanto, agora cabe a Happy juntar uma pequena fortuna para agradar a sua futura esposa. Claro, o gato chefe Nyamco e sua legião de mukies impedem que isso seja fácil.

game.name: Mappy
game.desc: Você controla o Mappy, um camundongo policial cujo trabalho é coletar objetos de valor (eletrônicos de consumo) da casa de um gato. Você está sendo perseguido por uma gangue de cinco gatos cor de rosa. As portas são sua única defesa contra os gatos. Você troca de andares pulando de um dos trampolins para o outro. Os pontos são ganhos pela recuperação de bens roubados. Outras maneiras de ganhar pontos são saltando em um trampolins, colocando gatos no microondas, atingindo gatos com uma porta, atingindo gatos com um sino, recuperando tesouros do gato chefe Goro ou jogando gatos num buraco no chão.

game.name: Mappy-Land
game.desc: Mappy, o mouse, tem uma namorada chamada Mapica. A fim de agradar sua namorada, Mappy vai em uma missão para coletar presentes para o seu parceiro. Infelizmente, o gato chefe Nyamco e sua legião de gatos cor de rosa querem rastrear Mappy para que eles possam fazer uma refeição com ele. O objetivo do jogo é coletar 6 de 1 item em cada estágio sem ser comido por um gato. Os itens que você coleta (pedaços de queijo, alianças, árvores de natal ou bolas de beisebol) variam de acordo com o estágio em que você está jogando. Também existem itens específicos do estágio em segundo plano que ajudarão você a derrotar seus adversários felinos.

game.name: Mario Open Golf
game.desc: No NES Open Tournament Golf, você pode jogar uma partida de golfe em um dos três campos diferentes. Um ou dois jogadores podem jogar nos EUA, no Japão ou no Reino Unido e escolher uma tacada ou partida. A jogabilidade é de dois pontos de vista, começando com uma visão aérea, permitindo que você configure a foto e escolha um taco, depois alterne para um ponto de vista 3D. Bater na bola usa o medidor de energia comum, onde o toque no botão inicia o medidor, toque no botão uma segunda vez para selecionar a quantidade de energia na tacada e toque no botão uma terceira vez para selecionar a quantidade de fatia ou gancho. Se você não conseguir terminar uma rodada em uma jogada, o NES Open Tournament Golf apresenta um back-up de bateria, permitindo que você salve o jogo e continue mais tarde

game.name: Marusa no Onna
game.desc: Marusa no Onna is an adventure game based on the Japanese movie "A Taxing Woman". A female tax auditor, Ry?ko Itakura, inspects the accounts of various Japanese companies, uncovering hidden incomes and recovering unpaid taxes. One day she persuades her boss to let her investigate the owner of a string of love hotels who seems to be avoiding tax, but after an investigation no evidence is found. During the investigation the inspector and the inspected owner, Hideki Gond?, develop an unspoken respect for each other.

game.name: Mashin Eiyuu Den Wataru Gaiden
game.desc: In this game you travel the world trying to save Wataru from the evil antagonist Darkdar. The main overworld display is the standard top down view of most JRPG's, complete with random battles. Once you engage your enemy the perspective switches to a side view where you pilot your mech and battle against monsters. It's fast and fluid and all played out in real time, with jump and attack mapped to your A & B buttons.

game.name: Mashou
game.desc:
Você é o príncipe Myer e está prestes a se tornar o governante de seu país. Caminhando para fora pouco antes da cerimônia, você encontra uma pessoa estranha à beira do lago. Você é informado sobre um feiticeiro malvado planejando destruir a terra. Para detê-lo e cumprir uma antiga profecia, você deve viajar para a Montanha do Norte e destruir as Sete Torres do Sino.
Este é um jogo de ação e aventura com elementos de RPG. Em cada tela, há hordas de inimigos para você derrotar, jogando sua espada neles. O estilo de jogo é semelhante ao da série Zelda.

game.name: Masuzoe Youichi : Asa Made Famicom
game.desc: Masuzoe Youichi es una aventura de texto sobre el trabajo de un hombre de negocios en una oficina, donde da órdenes a la secretaria, se comunica con el jefe y los empleados y llama a los clientes. El menú de comandos se encuentra a la derecha (que es distintivo, está en los pictogramas), el texto que lo acompaña a continuación y la parte gráfica ocupa la mayor parte de la pantalla a la izquierda. El juego se divide en cuatro partes, y se insertan cuestionarios entre ellas, cuyas respuestas ayudan a avanzar en la trama.

game.name: Matendouji
game.desc:
Anos antes dos eventos do jogo, o Reino do Palácio de Cristal foi conquistado por um ser maligno chamado Zaras, que se coroou rei. Apenas Zap, um cão que serviu como Guardião do Palácio de Cristal, e Farron, o príncipe infante do reino, conseguiram escapar. Quando o jogo começa, Zap explica a um agora adolescente Farron que chegou a hora de retomar o Palácio de Cristal, dando ao príncipe um dos três cristais mágicos que concedem poderes especiais a seu usuário.
A busca de Farron o leva através de cinco reinos perigosos cheios de inimigos bizarros, com ajuda para o príncipe vindo apenas de Zap, um lojista chamado Kim que funciona como um repórter de notícias insinuante e a Princesa de Cristal sequestrada que concede o Espelho da Lua a Farron se ele consegue libertá-la.

game.name: Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku : Part II
game.desc: Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku 2 is the sequel to the original Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku and like that game is a stock trading simulator akin to something like Wall Street Kid. The player needs to keep track of which stocks are rising and falling, identify trends and invest wisely to ensure a wealthy and happy life.

game.name: Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku : Vol. 1
game.desc:
Matsumoto Tooru no Kabushiki Hisshou Gaku ("Matsumoto Tooru's Stock Success Knowledge") is a stock exchange simulation developed and published by Imagineer. The goal of the game is to make 100 million yen (approximately $1.3mil) in the stock market in the span of a single year via a series of shrewd financial decisions and listening to advice about which way a certain type of stock might turn.
The game is fronted by Matsumoto Tooru, a nationally well-known financial adviser who is often considered to have an expansive knowledge of the Japanese stock market. The game also features the song "The Entertainer" by Scott Joplin.
Though it focused on unusually complex subject matter for a video game, it sold enough copies to inspire a sequel that was released the following year.

game.name: Max Warrior : Wakusei Kaigenrei
game.desc:
Max Maverick é o último membro sobrevivente das forças especiais de seu planeta após uma invasão alienígena devastadora. Longe de ser desencorajado, Max decide eliminar a ameaça alienígena sozinho.
O Warrior isolado é um shoot-up-up ou shmup em constante movimento, em que o herói está sempre andando ou voando para a frente a partir de uma perspectiva aérea isométrica. O herói tem uma pistola a laser básica para começar, mas coleta reforços que podem permitir que a arma atire em várias direções. Ele também pode coletar bombas que podem ser lançadas em várias direções enquanto pula, bem como power-ups de escudo.

game.name: Meiji Ishin
game.desc: Meiji Isihin habla sobre la era del mismo nombre en Japón, cuando el shogunato fue derrocado y el poder oficial regresó al emperador. El juego combina una aventura de texto y algo de acción en forma de duelos y estrategia en la segunda mitad, donde lideramos a las tropas y aliados reunidos en Edo (ahora Tokio). Es una aventura de texto, en donde aparece una imagen a la izquierda, un menú a la derecha y un texto en la parte inferior.

game.name: Meikyu Jima
game.desc:
Kickle Cubicle é um jogo de quebra-cabeça deslizante do tipo Lolo, onde o Rei Mago Malvado cobriu o reino com gelo e escondeu as pessoas e palácios no fundo do gelo.
Armado com seu hálito gelado, Kickle se propõe a salvar seus amigos e tenta resgatar o reino dessa situação intrigante de inverno perpétuo.
Cada nível tem um limite de tempo fixo e inimigos que tentarão bloquear seu progresso. As quatro terras (Jardim, Frutas, Bolo e Brinquedo) têm 17 ou 18 quebra-cabeças em cada uma. Vença todos eles e há um estágio especial com mais 30 quebra-cabeças desafiadores.
Suas principais opções são mover, fazer um bloco de gelo e deslizar um bloco de gelo.

game.name: Meikyuu Kumikyoku : Milon no Daibouken
game.desc: Milon, uma criança do Reino de Hudson, deve ir em uma missão para resgatar a rainha Eliza de um mago maligno que assumiu seu castelo, bem como dos instrumentos musicais que os súditos da rainha usam para se comunicar. Milon deve recuperar os instrumentos roubados e resgatar a rainha do mago. Armado apenas com uma habilidade mágica de atirar bolhas, Milon percorre as salas do castelo encontrando itens e dinheiro que podem ajudá-lo a progredir. Este é um jogo de plataformas que combina a ação do Mario-esqe com a solução e a exploração de quebra-cabeças.

game.name: Meikyuu Kumikyoku : Milon no Daibouken
game.desc: Milon, uma criança do Reino de Hudson, deve ir em uma missão para resgatar a rainha Eliza de um mago maligno que assumiu seu castelo, bem como dos instrumentos musicais que os súditos da rainha usam para se comunicar. Milon deve recuperar os instrumentos roubados e resgatar a rainha do mago. Armado apenas com uma habilidade mágica de atirar bolhas, Milon percorre as salas do castelo encontrando itens e dinheiro que podem ajudá-lo a progredir. Este é um jogo de plataformas que combina a ação do Mario-esqe com a solução e a exploração de quebra-cabeças.

game.name: Meikyuu no Tatsujin : Daimeiro
game.desc:
In Dai Meiro: Meikyū no Tatsujin the player must navigate a 3D maze and reach the goal. Along the way, the player needs to find all the special items to open the last door. With each step, the player's POW is depleted, which can be regenerated by collecting items along the way. There are secret rooms and items that can assist the player in reaching the goal. There are also three mini-games that can be found in the maze. A mini-map can be brought up, but this will cost POW.
The game has no combat to speak of or random encounters. There are three levels of difficulty, which completely changes the layout of the mazes.

game.name: Meimon! Daisan Yakyuubu
game.desc: Meimon! Daisan Yakyuubu es un juego de béisbol para la Famicom, como habrás adivinado por el nombre. Es un juego simple; tan simple que ni siquiera puedes bucear o saltar para atrapar la pelota, tan solo la carrera estándar, el bateo y el lanzamiento sones permitidos. El juego en sí es pequeño, con solo ocho equipos jugables. Ahi esta un "Modo dramático", que es esencialmente un modo historia donde juegas béisbol para progresar. Aparte de eso, diría que este es solo otro típico juego de béisbol de Famicom, ¡así que pruébalo si eres fanático de este tipo de juegos!

game.name: Meimon! Takonishi Ouendan : Kouha 6 Nin Shuu
game.desc:
Meimon! Takonishi Ouendan (usually localized as "The West Tako Cheerleaders", but literally translates to "Prestigious School! West Tako Cheerleading Squad") is a Famicom strategy game based on the manga of the same name about a young man who joins his school's intimidating cheerleading squad. In 1987, this same property also saw a live-action movie adaptation.
The game has players moving characters around a city map and fighting rival ouendan teams for dominance. Combat occurs whenever two units meet on the map and cuts to a timing-based mini-game where the player has to input a command before their opponent's fist reaches the current character's profile. The closer the fist gets, the more likely it is that the enemy gets in their attack before the player can. Stronger attacks are listed further down the menu, increasing the risk vs. reward factor as the player scrambles to execute them in time.
After winning a map, the player's party can gain levels and acquire new special attacks, which show up in the attack menu on rare occasions and are very powerful.

game.path: ./Mei Tantei Holmes - Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken (J).7z
game.name: Meitantei Holmes : Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken
game.desc:
Meitantei Holmes: Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken ("Great Detective Holmes: Fog of London Murder Case") is a murder mystery adventure game where the player directs Sherlock Holmes around London, finding clues and interrogating witnesses and suspects. Like its many NES adventure game contemporaries, it adheres to the Portopia formula of text adventure whodunits.
It is the sequel to Towa Chiki's earlier Sherlock Holmes game (Sherlock Holmes: Hakushaku Reijou Yuukai Jiken) and received a sequel (Meitantei Holmes: M-Kara no Chousenjou). None of these games were ever released outside of Japan.
game.image: ./media/images/Mei Tantei Holmes - Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Mei Tantei Holmes - Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Mei Tantei Holmes - Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken (J).mp4

game.path: ./Mei Tantei Holmes - M Kara no Chousenjou (J).7z
game.name: Meitantei Holmes : M kara no Chousenjou
game.desc:
Meitantei Holmes: M-Kara no Chousenjou is a modern first-person adventure video game for the Family Computer that is based on the stories by Arthur Conan Doyle. It is the sequel to Sherlock Holmes: Hakushaku ReijÅ YÅ«kai Jiken and Meitantei Holmes: Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken, the latter having been released on May 13, 1988. In Kiri no London Satsujin Jiken, the player takes control of Holmes and Watson in the streets of London. The player can collect clues and also shillings in order to pay for things such as a coach fare, which allows them to travel London faster. All of these video games were released exclusively in Japan.
As the fictional detective, the player must go through places like France, Austria, and Germany to solve the mystery. Players can choose to start a new adventure or continue an old one by using a password of Japanese characters.
Players can expect challenges from Professor Moriarty; the classic nemesis of Sherlock Holmes. There are also ten other characters to interact with.
game.image: ./media/images/Mei Tantei Holmes - M Kara no Chousenjou (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Mei Tantei Holmes - M Kara no Chousenjou (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Mei Tantei Holmes - M Kara no Chousenjou (J).mp4

game.name: Metal Flame Psybuster
game.desc: Você controla o piloto de um veículo MetalMech (que se parece com o ED-209 das licenças Robocop) que pode se mover pela tela para a esquerda ou direita, com ou sem o mech, e disparar em qualquer direção, exceto para baixo. O Mech é melhor blindado, mas também é um alvo maior e muito grande para subir escadas, para que você se encontre tanto fora quanto dentro. Seu objetivo é atravessar cada nível cheio de inimigos gerando aleatoriamente e alcançar o próximo. Os power-ups estão ocultos em vários contêineres e em vários lugares.

game.name: Metal Gear
game.desc: Perto do final do século 20, uma pequena nação fortificada chamada Outer Heaven (fundada por um misterioso herói de guerra cujo nome e identidade estão envoltos em segredo) está ameaçando as nações do "Ocidente" com o desenvolvimento de um novo protótipo de arma chamado Metal Gear, um tanque ambulante capaz de lançar ogivas nucleares de qualquer lugar do mundo. Como o mais novo recruta da FOX-HOUND (uma unidade de elite de operações negras), usando o codinome de Solid Snake, sua missão é se infiltrar no Outer Heaven e resgatar seu camarada desaparecido, Gray Fox (que foi capturado após uma falha na infiltração), enquanto obtém informações no Metal Gear.

game.name: Metal Max
game.desc:
"Metal Max" is a RPG set in a futuristic world, where monsters and mechanical creatures roam the land and where many people live in huge underground caves. You play the role of a young boy who lives in a town with his father and his older sister. Your biggest dream is to become a "hunter" - to kill the monsters that are roaming outside, and to receive rewards for that. Your father doesn't approve of your dream, but you nevertheless decide to explore the underground caves surrounding your town, to learn more about the world you live in, and eventually become a true hunter and help to overthrow the evil that threatens the world.
The game is a console-style RPG with random encounters and turn-based combat viewed from third-person perspective, like in Final Fantasy. You can also pilot various vehicles. You can participate in battles while riding those vehicles, performing various special techniques. You also upgrade the vehicles and get equipment for them.

game.name: Metal Slader Glory
game.desc: Metal Slader Glory is a graphic adventure game where the player interacts with the protagonist's surrounding via a menu-based commands. The commands the player can choose varies between context, which usually ranges from talking to supporting characters to investigating the surrounding. The player must explore every possible option in order for new choices to appear. However, if the player makes a wrong selection, the game will end and the player must restart the game from where they left off. The player can quit at any point of the game and continue later via a password feature. The game takes place eight years after a great war was waged between colonies in outer space, and peace has finally settled back onto the Earth. The main character, a 17-year-old war orphan named Tadashi Himukai, purchases a used worker-mech in order to start a construction business with his girlfriend, Elina Furfa. However, when he first activates it, the worker-mech disguise falls away, revealing a combat model Metal Slader, which were all supposedly dismantled after the war, and an enigmatic message is displayed in the cockpit: "EARTH IN PERIL... SEEK THE CREATOR". Prompted by this warning, Tadashi, his sister Azusa, and Elina head out into space to find the answers behind it. It was the final game released by HAL Laboratory as an independent third-party developer before their buy-out by Nintendo. The game's story and character designs were done by manga artist Yoshimiru Hoshi, who loosely based the game on his 1984 manga Akûtensô Fixallia

game.name: Metro-Cross
game.desc:
Jogo simples de rolagem lateral, onde você joga um skatista que precisa passar por um conjunto de obstáculos para chegar ao fim do nível.
Você pode andar de skate na tela, ou até pular, para se proteger dos canos que encontrar no caminho. À medida que o jogo avança, os obstáculos são mais frequentes e mais desafiadores, mas a essência é a mesma. O tempo é tudo neste jogo.

game.name: Mezase Pachi Pro : Pachio-kun
game.desc:
The first game to feature Pachio-kun, the mascot for a series of pachinko-themed games by Coconuts Japan, Mezase Pachi Pro: Pachio-kun ("Aiming For Pachinko Pro: Pachio-kun") is simply a virtual pachinko hall with 72 different machines on which the player may try their luck.
The game rewards attentive pachinko veterans by having several of the machines possess quirks, such as the frequency of payouts, certain pins being bent that will favor a ball's route to the bottom and the like. Pachio-kun simply has to lean in to examine the machines closer to ascertain how to make the machine pay out. The overall goal is to keep playing each machine, winning either through a determined strategy or simple perseverance, until all the machines have been emptied of their contents. Doing so will win the game.

game.path: ./Mezase Top Pro - Green ni Kakeru Yume (J).7z
game.name: Mezase Top Pro : Green ni Kakeru Yume
game.desc:
Mezase! Top Pro: Green ni Kakeru Yume is Jaleco's first golf game, released exclusively in Japan in 1993. It was developed by TOSE and published by Jaleco.
There are four modes in the game: stroke, course, challenge and train. When the game start, one can change the club then the golf stance. After these choices are done, a screen with the golf player swinging the club is shown, and the player must press the button A at an exact time to select the force that the club will impact the ball. There is also a caddy menu that can be accessed with the button B. In this menu, one can get hints for the current hole, ask for and mulligan and even can be consoled by the caddy if the player misses many strokes. As the player progress in the challenge mode, he can use the money won to buy new clubs and hire new caddies.
The game simulates many terrains, such as grass and sand, and also takes account the effect of the wind, which velocity and direction is shown to the player before his making the stroke. Besides that, the game has also a two player mode, where each player takes a turn to stroke.
game.image: ./media/images/Mezase Top Pro - Green ni Kakeru Yume (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Mezase Top Pro - Green ni Kakeru Yume (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Mezase Top Pro - Green ni Kakeru Yume (J).mp4

game.name: Mickey Mouse : Fushigi no Kuni no Daibouken
game.desc: Um dos amigos de Mickey está com problemas, e Mickey e Minnie Mouse estão em uma missão de resgate! Mickey Mousecapade é um jogo de plataforma e ação. Para alcançar seu objetivo (e descobrir qual dos amigos de Mickey está com problemas), você precisará pular e subir por vários níveis que ocorrem em diferentes locais (incluindo uma casa de diversão, um mar traiçoeiro, um navio pirata e um castelo).

game.name: Mickey Mouse III : Yume Fuusen
game.desc: Mickey Mouse está presente no meio do leilão para comprar um presente para Minnie, que tem como aniversário alguns dias de distância. Ele permite notícias de Pluto que Minnie não acorda. Ele sai para visitar-la, apenas para descobrir que ela está presente em um pesadelo. Ágora, Mickey deve viajar na mente de Minnie, um fim de libertá-la do pesadelo.

game.name: Might and Magic : Book One, Secret of the Inner Sanctum
game.desc:
Em Might and Magic, o jogador controla um grupo de aventureiros em um mundo medieval chamado Varn. Em pouco tempo, os heróis percebem que um dos quatro reis que governam os países de Varn é de fato um impostor, uma criatura do espaço sideral. Sua tarefa é encontrar o rei real e, finalmente, parar a invasão alienígena em Varn.
Este é o primeiro jogo da série Might and Magic e um dos protótipos de RPG em geral. O jogo inteiro é visto da perspectiva da primeira pessoa. O jogador cria um grupo de seis aventureiros, com classes tradicionais para escolher (lutador, clérigo, etc.).

game.name: Mighty Bomb Jack
game.desc:
A sequência do Bomb Jack original, Mighty Bombjack, traz a rolagem lateral para a série e a aproxima de um jogo de plataforma, em vez da aparência de arcada / quebra-cabeça do primeiro.
Mais uma vez você joga como o super-herói com fome de bomba. Colete as bombas para ganhar pontos e evite ser tocado pelos diferentes monstros que aparecem em caixotes e coisas do gênero.
O jogo agora apresenta novos cenários, como nuvens e florestas, bem como os cenários usuais de esfinge e pirâmides do título original.

game.name: Mighty Final Fight
game.desc: O único porto de 8 bits da série Final Fight da Capcom, o Mighty Final Fight segue a história e os personagens do primeiro jogo Final Fight. O prefeito de Metro City, Mike Haggar, seu amigo ninja Guy e o namorado de sua filha, Cody descobre que a filha de Haggar, Jessica, foi sequestrada pela Mad Gear Gang, cujo líder se apaixonou por ela, e também quer que o intrometido Mike Haggar saia. Cidade. Agora é pessoal! Escolhendo um dos três lutadores, o jogador embarca em uma missão espancada pelas ruas de Metro City.

game.name: Millipede : Kyodai Konchuu no Gyakushuu
game.desc:
Millipedes, cousins of the Centipede, are all over the garden. This will ruin anything trying to grow there unless they are stopped. But there are other insects as well; spiders, bees, dragonflies and earwigs. Nature is dangerous. Luckily, there's a bug zapper that can shoot arrows at these insects and destroy them.
Millipede is the sequel to Centipede, and features similar gameplay, but with a new swarm of insects! The goal is to destroy the multi-segmented millipede as it traverses its way through the mushroom forest towards the bottom of the screen. When all millipede segments have been destroyed, the player will progress to the next, more difficult level. Millipedes and other creatures are all worth a different amount of points. Occasionally dynamite will appear on the screen, which will explode if shot by the bug zapper. With a well timed shot, numerous millipede segments (and other insects as well) can be taken out as they pass by.

game.name: Mindseeker
game.desc: Mindseeker is an adventure game from Namco that tests the player's extra sensory perception and latent psychic ability. It features Japanese TV psychic Masuaki Kiyota, who is best known in his native land for a spoon-bending act similar to that of Israeli psychic Uri Geller. The player can explore the world using two commands: Feel and Exit. Exit will simply move the player character to a new area, while Feel is how the player interacts with the various objects and people in the world; for the purposes of the game, the term "feel" is analogous to "sense". The player is also able to input their own name upon starting the game. As well as the adventure game elements, much of the game involves playing mini-games designed to test the player's psychic ability, such as a card game where the player must guess which symbol will appear next.

game.name: Minelvaton Saga : Ragon no Fukkatsu
game.desc: Minelvaton Saga: Ragon no Fukkatsu is a Role Playing Game first in the Minelvaton series, being followed by Silva Saga and ending with Silva Saga II: The Legend of Light and Darkness. Minelvaton Saga takes place on the world Minelvaton, in the area known as Southern Ofelia. In the kingdom of Palmeccia both the King and Queen have been murdered by the hands of a servant of Ragon, son of the Zuhl. The player takes control of the Prince of Palmeccia in a quest for revenge and to kill the evil Ragon. Fundamentally, the game plays and looks like Dragon Quest. The player is given control of a single character and can explore a number of towns, dungeons, and the world map itself. However, once the player receives the ship for sailing, the game becomes non-linear as the player can explore almost anywhere that can be reached. Another unique feature is the battle system. Like a typical RPG, there are random battles, but actual combat resembles a sort of action RPG. In battle, the player starts at the bottom of the screen facing the enemies that are at the top. In order to defeat enemies, the player must run into one in order to exchange blows. The closest analog to this unusual system is the MMORPG, or the MMORPG-ish single player game Final Fantasy XII. Beyond that, the basic plot and some of the battle system concept seems to have been co-opted by Sega's Sword of Vermilion.

game.name: Mini Putt
game.desc:
Mini Putt is a miniature golf game that offers 4 courses, Deluxe, Classic, Traditional and Challenge. Up to 4 players can either play a game or practice any hole on any course. Each course offers its own difficulty level. Deluxe and Challenge have difficult hills and course layouts. The Challenge being the more difficult course. The Classic offers animated bridges and other obstacles. The traditional is your standard miniature golf course which requires well placed bank shots.
To make a shot, using the joystick, move the crosshair in the approximate direction and distance where you wish the ball to go. When you are ready to shoot, hit the fire button. You will notice the level rise in the power bar. When the bar reaches the desired distance, press the fire button again. When you release the fire button, the bar starts to move back down. The mark where you stopped the bar moving indicates the power with which you hit the ball. When the bar reaches the bottom of the power bar, it moves horizontally on the accuracy bar. In the middle of the accuracy bar is the center line. Too much to the left of center, it pulls to the left. Too much to the right of center, it pulls to the right. Press the fire button at the right moment to hit the ball. If the course proves to be too tough, visit the Practice course option. Not all of us can be a pro.

game.path: ./Minna no Taabou no Nakayoshi Dai Sakusen (J).7z
game.name: Minna no Taabou no Nakayoshi Daisakusen
game.desc: Minna no Taabou no Nakayoshi Daisakusen is a puzzle game released in Japan on the 8-bit Nintendo NES console. It's actually an improved memory game. You play as a man in a tray where his present a number of cards. Your goal is simple: find the pairs. There are enemies around you, and you'll have to be careful not to touch them. As you progress through the levels, the number of cards and enemies increases, and bricks appear to create a labyrinth and force you to take paths a little more delicate.
game.image: ./media/images/Minna no Taabou no Nakayoshi Dai Sakusen (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Minna no Taabou no Nakayoshi Dai Sakusen (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Minna no Taabou no Nakayoshi Dai Sakusen (J).mp4

game.name: Miracle Ropit's : 2100 Nen no Daibouken
game.desc: A girl in the year 2100 uses a robot suit. If the player is hit once, then the suit is lost and the player must play as the little girl. One more hit and the player loses a life. Although the game was only released in Japan for the Nintendo Famicom, the game's text is in English and is completely playable by English speakers. This game must be played through twice in order to see the true ending, just like in "Ghosts 'n Goblins".

game.name: Mirai Senshi Lios
game.desc: Future Wars: Lios is a turn-based strategy game developed and published by Pack-In-Video, the same developers who brought us Die Hard (NES). In this game, you play as Cecilia and her army of robots. You must make it to Goinkia's castle and stop him from taking over. To do this, you must travel the overworld and select a location. Once you do, you must take out the enemy's commander robot and then the enemy's base. Then you will win and will be allowed to progress. Sometimes defeating enemies unlocks new weapons.

game.name: Mirai Shinwa Jarvas
game.desc:
Mirai Shinwa Jarvas (lit. Future Legend Jarvas) is a RPG developed and published by Taito. It is about a man named Jarvas who travels back in time from the future to conquer the world of the past and become the leader. You must get people to join your side and take over enemy castles.
This game is generally considered pretty bad by most. When you begin the game, you are given no information about where you are and where you should attempt to go. Once you find a town, you must join a guild. You can only increase your level by returning to the guild once you have accumulated enough experience.

game.name: Mississippi Satsujin Jiken
game.desc: Murder on the Mississippi, fully titled as Murder on the Mississippi: The Adventures of Sir Charles Foxworth, is a 1986 detective adventure game developed and published by Activision for the Commodore 64, Commodore 128 and the Apple II computers. It was also licensed for release exclusively in Japan by Jaleco, who ported the game to the Nintendo Famicom and the MSX2 as Mississippi Satsujin Jiken. It is an adventure game in which the player must solve a murder mystery on the luxury ship "Delta Princess". While heading to New Orleans from St. Louis on the ship "Delta Princess", detective Sir Charles and Watson are caught up in the midst of a murder case by chance, that they must solve.

game.name: Mito Koumon II: Sekai Manyuu Ki
game.desc: Mito Koumon II: Sekai Manyuuki (lit. Mito Koumon's World Tour Chronicle) is an adventure game. It is the sequel to Tenka no Goikenban: Mito Koumon and is very similar in appearance and gameplay. As in that game, the player controls one of Mitsukini Tokugawa's retainers as they gather clues and evidence of crimes in the area while either avoiding or fighting off hostile NPCs. Unlike the first game, which was set entirely within Japan, Tokugawa crosses the world solving problems instead. The first stage is America (specifically the Wild West, as would be chronologically accurate for the 17th century) though there are plenty of other locations to visit across the world as well, including Transylvania.

game.name: Mitsume ga Tooru
game.desc:
Mitsume ga Tooru (translates to The Three-Eyed One) is based on the manga and anime of the same name. You control Hosuke Sharaku - a boy with a third eye on his forehead and of terrifying power. This power is unleashed when his third eye is open so he is wearing a bandage to seal his power and remove any memories of his true nature.
In the game, another three-eyed man with great powers appears and attacks a city. He also kidnaps Sharaku’s friend Wato who watches unable to do anything. Sharaku then, with the bandage removed, begins his quest to save Wato from this man.
The character you control can fire shots of energy from his forehead eye to attack the enemies that inhabit the 5 stages of the game. He can also summon the Red Condor – a harpoon that can be used for attacking or reaching higher places. Along the way you will find places where you can buy extra lives, different weapons and an improved version of the Red Condor. Money can be gained from defeating enemies or by shooting invisible chickens that can be found in certain levels. You can also increase the value of a coin that is left behind by an enemy if you shoot it multiple times.

game.name: Mizushima Shinji no Daikoushien
game.desc: Mizushima Shinji no Daikoushien is a baseball simulation NES game based on Shinji Mizushima's manga Daikoushien. It was released in 1990.

game.name: Moai-kun
game.desc:
Moai Kun is a platform puzzle game where you play as Moai, the Easter Island statue, that has appeared in many other Konami games.
The goal of the game is to collect other Moai-like statues and reach the door leading to the next level before the time runs out. In order to make your way to the statues and finally to the exit you have to move and destroy the rocks blocking your way and avoid getting killed by enemies.

game.name: Moe Pro! : Saikyou Hen
game.desc:
Bases Loaded 4 foi a última lançamento de 8 bits da Jaleco na série de beisebol de longa duração. O jogo apresentava animações um pouco mais elaboradas do que seu antecessor, e jogadores de campo muito maiores. Foi removido o objetivo de jogar um jogo invictos; em vez disso, o jogo apresentava modos mais tradicionais, incluindo jogos de exibição e jogos de temporada completa.
Mais voltado para a jogabilidade arcade do que para a simulação, o Bases Loaded 4 não foi licenciado pela Major League Baseball ou pela Major League Baseball Players 'Association. Portanto, ele não apresentava equipes ou jogadores reais americanos (ou japoneses).

game.name: Moe Pro! '90 : Kandou Hen
game.desc: Bases Loaded 3 was Jaleco's latest entry into the popular baseball series in 1991. Changes over the previous title included slightly more detailed fielders, a new field perspective (home plate at the top of the screen, center field at the bottom), an editable team, and a new goal: to play the perfect game of baseball against the computer. Simply winning the game was no longer enough; the gamer now had to avoid common baseball missteps such as making an error and striking out, in order to earn a perfect rating. Against the very clever computer pitching, this could prove quite difficult.

game.name: Moero TwinBee : Cinnamon Hakase o Sukue!
game.desc:
Salve o professor Cinnamon! Quando alienígenas do planeta Attackon sequestram o inventor durante a invasão da Terra, dois jatos TwinBee Stinger (armados com luvas de boxe) são liberados para resgatar a Canela antes que os alienígenas transformem a Terra em uma bola gigante de algodão doce!
Neste jogo de rolagem vertical e horizontal, destrua criaturas incomuns e chefes ainda mais bizarros, enquanto coleciona power-ups e super armas. Ao disparar repetidamente sinos que saem das nuvens, esses sinos mudam de cor, cada cor dando uma habilidade diferente. Ser abatido libera um fantasma de Stinger, que pode ser lembrado para recuperar os poderes do jato.

game.name: Moero!! Junior Basket : Two on Two
game.desc: Ratos de academia, cuidado! O HOOPS leva você para o asfalto, onde o basquete é um jogo de meia quadra de mãos rápidas, jogadas mais rápidas e dunks de slam-jam-obrigado-você-Sam! As lendas do Playground estão aqui: Sr. Doc, Jammer, Pernas, Bombardeiro, Wiz, oito jogadores no total. Você pode colocá-los um a um ou dois a dois. Você escolhe o tribunal - oriental ou ocidental - e também escolhe as regras. Você pode jogar contra o computador ou outro jogador. Ou você pode até se juntar a outro jogador contra o computador. Você pode bloquear tiros, fazer roubadas de bola, enganar-se ou se esforçar ao máximo - na verdade, você controla quase tudo nesta versão ultra-realista do jogo infantil. Exceto, é claro, a pontuação final. Mas ganhe ou perca, você sabe que entrou em um jogo depois de jogar HOOPS!

game.name: Moero!! Juudou Warriors
game.desc: An Olympic judo tournament is being held which will have the best judo practitioners competing against each other. Before being able to qualify to compete at the Olympics, players must travel the globe and defeat several different opponents. When the player finally makes it to the Olympics, the player will have to face nine different opponents, each the best representative of their home country. If the player performs well enough at the Olympics, they can go back home with either a bronze, silver, or even a gold medal. When fighting in the Judo matches, the goal is to throw your opponent to the ground for a takedown. When in a fight, there are meters that the player has to be aware of. They are the power meter which measures the fighters current strength and the chance meter which measures the likelihood the player will be able to throw down their opponent. After each match, the player can choose whether to build up their character's strength, technique, or stamina.

game.name: Moero!! Pro Tennis
game.desc: No Racket Attack, você escolhe entre dois modos diferentes de jogo. O tênis para um jogador leva você até o meio de um torneio nacional de tênis. Vença sete partidas cada vez mais difíceis e levará para casa o troféu do campeonato. O tênis Two Plater coloca você em lados opostos da rede, atingindo-o em ação individual.nnnnDepois de selecionar seu modo de jogo, decida entre o tênis masculino e feminino e escolha entre oito jogadores em cada categoria. cada um dos oito jogadores diferentes de homens e mulheres tem diferentes pontos fortes e fracos.nnnnDepois de escolher seu jogador, é hora de selecionar a superfície da quadra. O jogo apresenta quadras duras, de barro e grama. Então é hora de servir. O jogo segue as regras regulares do tênis. Vença sua partida vencendo dois dos três sets.

game.name: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu '88 : Ketteiban
game.desc:
In this version of Bases Loaded you coach your team through a 130-game season in either an Eastern or western division of a professional baseball league. Win the pennant and you're off to the World Series! You can also play head-to-head with a friend.
Choose from six teams in each division. Once you take your place in the dugout you're the manager, juggling your own lineup and battling order. You'll also have to somewhat of a psychologists as you learn to interpret the Player Performance Ratings. This unique feature of Bases Loaded II rates each player in three categories: physical, sensitivity, and intellectual. Each rating is like a biorhythm, going up and down, just like in real life. The Player Performance Ratings simulate what players really go through - streaks and slumps. Bases Loaded II also features similar realistic on-field action that was present in the first game of the series.

game.name: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu
game.desc: Arremesse, rebata e corra como um profissional! Aqui estão voz, ação e gráficos tão reais que você vai acreditar que está na linha. Os personagens parecem jogadores de beisebol de verdade, não desenhos animados. A ação se move no mesmo ritmo de um jogo real. Também parece real! O estalo do bastão, os chamados do árbitro, o rugido da multidão quando você marca. Jogue contra o computador ou um amigo. Escolha sua equipe entre 12 escalações diferentes. É duro. Cada equipe tem 30 jogadores - 12 arremessadores e 18 defensores. Cada jogador tem seu próprio estilo. O truque: aprenda todos os 360 jogadores! Controle e jogue em qualquer posição. Seja lançando ou rebatendo, controle todos os aspectos do jogo. Jogue uma bola rápida, alta fora ou um controle deslizante. Balance para as cercas. Acerte e corra, bunt, roube ou chame um rebatedor. Ganhe a flâmula armazenando suas vitórias e derrotas. Dê autógrafos mais tarde.

game.name: Moero!! Pro Yakyuu
game.desc: Arremesse, rebata e corra como um profissional! Aqui estão voz, ação e gráficos tão reais que você vai acreditar que está na linha. Os personagens parecem jogadores de beisebol de verdade, não desenhos animados. A ação se move no mesmo ritmo de um jogo real. Também parece real! O estalo do bastão, os chamados do árbitro, o rugido da multidão quando você marca. Jogue contra o computador ou um amigo. Escolha sua equipe entre 12 escalações diferentes. É duro. Cada equipe tem 30 jogadores - 12 arremessadores e 18 defensores. Cada jogador tem seu próprio estilo. O truque: aprenda todos os 360 jogadores! Controle e jogue em qualquer posição. Seja lançando ou rebatendo, controle todos os aspectos do jogo. Jogue uma bola rápida, alta fora ou um controle deslizante. Balance para as cercas. Acerte e corra, bunt, roube ou chame um rebatedor. Ganhe a flâmula armazenando suas vitórias e derrotas. Dê autógrafos mais tarde.

game.name: Moeru! Oniisan
game.desc:
A boy named Tim and his little sister Judy go to a circus. They want to buy tickets to enter the circus, but they only have money for one ticket, so only Judy goes in. After the show, the boy is at the exit to meet Judy when she comes out, but when she doesn’t the boy sneaks into the circus to rescue his sister from the ringmaster Mr. Magic who has taken her hostage.
The game is a platformer, you must get past many clowns, tight rope artists, and make it over water by jumping on top of alligators. You can also go into small tents to play mini-games.

game.name: Momotarou Densetsu Gaiden
game.desc:
The game is based on famous Japanese folk tales. Momotarou is a boy who was found in a huge peach (hence his name, "peach guy"). When he grows up, he goes to the island of demons, fights them, takes their treasure, and restores peace in its village. In this game, you don't play directly the story of Momotarou, but control three other popular characters from Japanese folklore, playing three separate stories: as Yashahime, the daughter of the Hell King Emma; Binbougami, or "poverty god", who is hated by people because he takes money from them; and Urashima, the legendary fisherman who once saved a turtle and became friends with the dragon clan. Although the original stories have nothing or little to do with each other or the story of Momotarou, the game ties the stories together by featuring Momotarou as a character in every one of them.
Despite being primarily a game for kids (the story is told in a fairy-tale fashion), this is a full-fledged console-style RPG with levels, party management, world map traveling, dungeons, towns, weapons and armors, and turn-based combat against randomly appearing enemies, viewed from first person perspective.

game.name: Momotarou Densetsu
game.desc:
The legend of Momotarou belongs to the most popular ones in Japanese and Asian folklore. The game follows the main story. An old couple, who was living peacefully in a small house, found a giant peach flowing down the river. As they wanted to eat the peach, they found inside a child. They named him "Momotarou" -"peach guy". When Momotarou grew up, he decided to rid the country of the evil demons. He must find three faithful companions - a dog, a monkey, and a pheasant, who will help him to defeat the demons.
This is a traditional Japanese RPG. You move Momotarou over the world map, visiting towns and dungeons. Defeated monsters bring experience points and raise Momotarou's level. Enemies appear randomly, and the combat is turn-based and is viewed from first person perspective.

game.name: Momotarou Dentetsu
game.desc: Momotar Dentetsu (that's right, not densetsu, "legend", but dentetsu, "train"!) is the first of the long series of board games that are loosely based on the popular Japanese folk tale of Momotarou, a boy who was found in a huge peach by an old couple, and who later became the savior of his village, defeating the evil demons and taking their treasure. The game can be played against computer AI or human opponents (up to three). It is a board game in which the players' trains are positioned on the map of Japan, divided into sections with circles that determine the amount of moves. The latter is decided by a roll of a dice. There are special circles which take you to various locations in typically Japanese style, where you can gain some bonuses before you proceed with the "train competition".

game.name: Monopoly
game.desc: Desta vez, um jogo de monopólio no seu computador, tão bom quanto ele sabe ser na sua realidade. Cada movimento seu pode ser em animação 3D ou desativado, se você não quiser ver animações. Pode haver até 6 jogadores ao mesmo tempo e pode ser jogado pela Internet. A música está no formato midi e a qualidade do som está no formato wav. Role, gire e não deixe de nos dar um sorriso.

game.name: Monster Maker : 7 Tsu no Hihou
game.desc: Monster Maker: Nanatsu no Hihou (loosely translates in "Monster Maker: The Seven Sacred Treasures") is a fantasy JRPG released only in Japan for the NES (Famicom) during 1991. In the game, players explore the world map and dungeons which are represented by a layout of playing cards that are flipped over as they progress. Battles are turn-based affairs which feature monster summoning.

game.name: Moon Crystal
game.desc:
Moon Crystal is a platform action game where you control Ricky Slater on his mission to free his kidnapped father from the evil Count Crimson. The Count is forcing his father, a great scientist, to use the power of the moon crystal to turn the dead into living and rule the world.
There are 7 stages, each ending with a boss fight. The themes of the stages follow the story closely. The player begins each stage with only small knife to defend yourself. The player can find power-ups that can extend the range of your knife, give additional health containers, allow Ricky to make double jumps etc. The player has 3 lives and also an unlimited amount of continues.
The game is notable for its fluid animations and rich graphic cut scenes which moves the story forward. It was never officially released outside of Japan, but an unofficial English translation patch exists.

game.name: Morita Shougi
game.desc: Morita Shougi is a Famicom adaption of the Japanese board game "Shougi ", which plays similar to chess. It is the second Shougi game released for the Nintendo Famicom in Japan. The game lets you choose from a couple of game modes. You can play a game against another human player or a CPU player which comes in three different difficulty levels. The game also gives you extensive editing options, giving you the opportunity to create a board setup of your liking, placing the ShÅ gi pieces wherever you want. The game also lets a player interrupt a current game and go back and forth through the moves.

game.name: Mother
game.desc:
No início dos anos 90, uma misteriosa sombra escura cobriu uma pequena cidade do interior da América rural. Um jovem casal desapareceu de casa sem deixar vestígios. O nome do homem era George, o nome da mulher era Maria. Dois anos se passaram e George voltou de repente. Ele nunca falou com ninguém sobre o que havia experimentado. Em vez disso, ele levou uma vida solitária e começou um estudo estranho, sozinho. Sua esposa nunca voltou.
Oitenta anos se passaram desde então. Você interpreta o papel de um garoto que mora em uma cidade pequena junto com seus pais e suas duas irmãs. Um dia, algo estranho acontece: a casa parece estar possuída por um poltergeist. As coisas começam a atacar os habitantes da casa. O pai do garoto o aconselha a conversar com o avô e aprender a usar poderes psíquicos para descobrir a razão por trás do estranho poltergeist. Em sua jornada, o garoto conhece três outras crianças: uma garota quieta que vive junto com sua mãe, um jovem gênio que não é aceito por seus colegas de classe e um garoto que ingressou em uma gangue, esperando vingança. Os quatro heróis explorarão o mundo e descobrirão a conexão entre os estranhos eventos de hoje e o mistério do passado.

game.name: Motocross Champion
game.desc: This is pure insanity. And to take the checkered flag, you'll need sheer intensity to throttle past hundreds of obstacles, including the Head Spinning Loop and the Sky Riding Ramp. You'll also need precision skills to refuel with Nitro Turbo Boosts that'll power you to victory! There are 8 championship tracks and 3 ultra-challenging levels (Rookie, World Class and Daredevil) to choose from. You can even race against the clock or computer.

game.name: Mottomo Abunai Deka
game.desc: Mottomo Abunai Deka is an action game for the Nintendo Entertainment System. The game is based on a Japanese TV drama show.nnnnThe game is a 2D 1-2 player side scroller. You the player control Taka or Yuuji, or both of these characters at the same time. You'll find yourself up against many enemies of the Yakuza gang, ?The Silver Stars?, and then later on leading you to corruption within the police department and to the main villain at the end. While playing the game you'll also run into three mini-games, which are a shooting gallery, a fast paced car ride and a shootout with one of the boss enemies.nnnnWhile playing the side scrolling part of this game, if you want to switch weapons, press start and then A to cycle through the selection.nnnnThe original name of the game is Mottomo Abunai Deka, which has been retitled as The Most Dangerous Detectives.nnnnAll of the text has been translated to the best of my knowledge. The main issue with the text is that there is a scrolling issue that has been worked out as best as possible for now.

game.name: Moulin Rouge Senki : Melville no Honoo
game.desc: Moulin Rouge Senki: Melville no Honoo ("Record of Moulin Rouge War: Melville's Flame") is a strategy war sim with RPG elements for the Famicom. The player controls a party of heroes with an entire army under their control, and fights other armies and random encounters with monsters. To begin the game, the player must purchase and equip their army before setting out. The game's battles play out in turn-based formations, and each formation acts separately and can target different formations on the enemy's side. For instance, the archers can aim for any of the four rows of enemy forces, though front-line melee fighters are far more limited.

game.name: Mouryou Senki Madara
game.desc:
As a baby, Madara was found floating in a river near Mount Shumi. The elder Tatara saved him, build gadgets to replace his missing body parts and raised him together with his grandchild Kirin. On Madara's 15th birthday, when most of the world had already fallen to the Moki controlled by the Emperor Miroku, Madara sets out to find his real body and save the world from the Moki.
Mouryou Senki Madara is an RPG in which players control a party consisting of up two four characters exploring towns, dungeons and a world map from a top-down perspective. Battles occur randomly and the characters move and fight autonomously, although it is possible to pause battles at any time and order characters to fight, defend, use magic or items or flee. Furthermore, a basic battle strategy (attack, defend, stop or flee) can be selected from a tactics menu, where it is also possible to change the characters' starting formation.

game.name: Mugen Senshi Valis
game.desc:
Yuko Ahso was once an ordinary high school girl. Or least her life used to be ordinary. Her friend Reiko went out on a date with a Dark King named Rogles, and has vanished. Immediately, monsters attacked her. She was almost killed...
Until a mystic sword named Valis appeared before her.
Using the sword, Yuko defended herself against the monsters, and was whisked to a strange land, where she was told that she was the chosen Valis Warrior, and she must defeat Rogles, or the human world and the dream world would both be plunged into chaos.
Go forth, brave Valis Warrior, and destroy the evil known as Rogles!

game.name: Murder Club : Honkaku Mystery Adventure
game.desc: Murder Club é um jogo de aventura com elementos de simulação. O jogador controla o detetive particular J.B. Harold, que deve investigar o assassinato de um rico empresário chamado Bill Robbins e levar o assassino ao tribunal.

game.name: Musashi no Bouken
game.desc:
The player controls a young boy called Musashi, who lives somewhere in medieval Japan in the village of Arima . He is the son of the famous swordsman Miyamoto Musashi and a skilled fighter himself. One day he hears of a rumor that the evil wizard Kojiro, his father's archenemy, has apparently reared up his ugly head once again! Kojiro's demons invade the land, and threaten death and destruction. "I shall defeat Kojiro!" - says Musashi, - "and maybe even get laid"...
Musashi no Boken can be described as Dragon Warrior set in feudal Japan, as apart from the distinct classical Japanese flavor demonstrated here, the games are very similar. Musashi travels over the world map, visits towns, buys weapons and armor, descends into dungeons, and fights enemies in turn-based combat viewed from a first-person perspective.

game.name: Musashi no Ken : Tadaima Shugyou Chuu
game.desc: Musashi no Ken - Tadaima Shugyou Chuu (lit. "Sword of Musashi - Now in the Middle of Training") is based on a Japanese sports manga series written and illustrated by Motoka Murakami that focuses on kendo, simply titled Musashi no Ken. The gameplay and design in the one-on-one fighting parts resemble Taito's other fighting game, Great Swordsman, especially its kendo mode. The game's plot is about the son of two Kendo champions named Musashi. He strives to become as great at Kendo as his parents. The entire story centers around the world of Kendo and its up-and-coming competitors. The anime is broken up into two parts. The first part follows Musashi's early years in grade school while the second part follows his high school years. In the first episode, Musashi befriends an Akita puppy who is by his side throughout the series. There are two different modes: single player and two player VS. mode. On single player mode, the player depicts Musashi in the middle of his training. He must run through several obstacle courses collecting swords and other items along the way. At the same time, his pet Akita will be running the course behind him. Musashi must not fall too far behind his dog. After completing three courses, Musashi will be entered into a 2D weapon-based versus fighting-style Kendo tournament. He must defeat five competitors to win the tournament. The swords that Musashi collects during the obstacle courses provide him with access to special strike moves if he has collected enough. If the player succeeds in winning, the game will continue from the beginning at a higher level of difficulty. After winning the championship a second time, the game is over. On two player vs. mode, each player selects from a roster of competitors, and selects them secretly by pressing different inputs on the control pad. The selections are revealed once five selections have been made. Each player then squares off in a Kendo match with each of their selections. Whoever gets three or more victories wins the game.

game.path: ./My Life My Love - Boku no Yume - Watashi no Negai (J).7z
game.name: My Life My Love : Boku no Yume, Watashi no Negai
game.desc: My Life My Love: Boku no Yume Watashi no Negai (o "My Life My Love: My Dreams My Desires") es un juego de estilo de tablero de NES / Famicom. Este es un juego de mesa para un jugador (sin oponentes humanos o informáticos). Comienzas como un ángel en el cielo. Su número se extrae al azar, lo que significa que usted es el próximo ángel en ser entregado a la Tierra para convertirse en un ser humano. Comenzará como un niño y vivirá toda su vida (muriendo a los 100 años). A lo largo del juego, harás todo lo posible para mejorar tus estadísticas en seis categorías: conocimiento, salud, amistad, amor, popularidad y riqueza. Se lo clasificará entre la población japonesa para ver qué tan bien le está yendo en seis categorías. Japón tiene una población de 130 millones. Entonces comenzará en el lugar # 130,000,000 y tratará de llegar al # 1. El recorrido completo es muy largo. Puede esperar jugarlo durante aproximadamente 50 horas, y esto siempre que gane en el primer intento. No harás esto por tu propia voluntad. Alcanzar el # 1 en el ranking no es fácil.
game.image: ./media/images/My Life My Love - Boku no Yume - Watashi no Negai (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/My Life My Love - Boku no Yume - Watashi no Negai (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/My Life My Love - Boku no Yume - Watashi no Negai (J).mp4

game.path: ./Nagagutsu wo Haita Neko - Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Dai Bouken (J).7z
game.name: Nagagutsu o Haita Neko : Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Daibouken
game.desc: Nagagutsu o Haita Neko: Sekai Issh 80 Nichi Dai Boken (lit. "Puss in Boots: An Adventure Around the World in 80 Days") is a video game based on the third film of The Wonderful World of Puss 'n Boots that was released exclusively in Japan for the Family Computer. Four years later, the game (with several modifications) was released in North America under the title Puss 'n Boots: Pero's Great Adventure. Pero has to either avoid or eliminate this cat-like enemies who stands in his way. The main character is the Puss in Boots character from the tale; a cat named Pero (Toei Animation's mascot) He is also known as 'Perrault' in the game, as that was the name of the original author of the Puss In Boots story; Charles Perrault. He is known for helping an impoverished master attain wealth through the use of trickery. Loosely based on Jules Verne's classic novel Around the World in Eighty Days tied together with a classic anime, the player has 80 days in order to travel the world; this is shown through a time limit. One day passes in the game approximately every minute, although certain items can subtract the number of remaining days, providing the player with less time to complete the game. If these 80 days elapse before the player finishes the trip, the game is over no matter how many lives the player has remaining. Places that are explored include: England, the Atlantic Ocean, Arabia, Hong Kong, the Pacific Ocean, Alaska, the North Pole, and Big Ben. The game features "death water," a video game feature where video game characters instantly die after coming into contact with a watery substance. This game also involves driving boats, cars, and balloons in addition to the standard walking through the stages.
game.genre: Plataforma-Plataforma / Corre e Pula com rolagem
game.image: ./media/images/Nagagutsu wo Haita Neko - Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Dai Bouken (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Nagagutsu wo Haita Neko - Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Dai Bouken (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Nagagutsu wo Haita Neko - Sekai Isshuu 80 Nichi Dai Bouken (J).mp4

game.name: Nakajima Satoru : F-1 Hero
game.desc: O superastro Michael Andretti o guia pessoalmente pelo mundo perigoso e emocionante do Grand Prix Racing! Quatro das mais poderosas máquinas de corrida estão ao seu comando em 16 famosos Grand Prix circuitos internacionais de todo o mundo! Aprimore suas habilidades de direção ou desafie o melhor - tudo depende de você nesta incrível simulação de corrida de Fórmula Um!

game.name: Nakajima Satoru Kanshuu : F-1 Hero 2
game.desc: Nakajima Satoru F-1 Hero 2 is Japan-exclusive Family Computer Formula One video game. It is the sequel to Japanese Family Computer game "Nakajima Satoru: F-1 Hero" (released as "Michael Andretti's World GP" in USA), and is based on the 1991 Formula One season. There are 16 rounds and only four cars to choose from.

game.name: Nakayoshi to Issho
game.desc: The villain Rakira has stolen the pens of the creators of Nakayoshi's most famous titles; Goldfish Warning, Pocket Park, MinMin, Taiou ni Smash! Kurumi-chan to Shichinin no Kobitotachi and Sailor Moon, which is the longest and most difficult. The combat is luck-based and saving the game can be difficult at times.

game.name: Namco Classic II
game.desc: Namco Classic II is a golf game released only in Japan for the Nintendo Famicom

game.name: Namco Classic
game.desc: Namco Classic is a golf game developed by Namco and published for the Famicom in 1988. The game features Round Play, which you can use to practice the course in the game or compete with friends, or Tournament mode, where you play against a computer opponent in an effort to win a large amount of prize money. The game was also released for the Game Boy in 1991. The Game Boy version features a different course but is very similar in many respects. In 1996, that version was also included in the compilation title, Namco Gallery Vol. 1.

game.name: Namco Prism Zone : Dream Master
game.desc: Dream Master is a Role-Playing game, developed by Birthday and published by Namco, which was released in Japan in 1992.

game.name: Namcot Mahjong III : Mahjong Tengoku
game.desc: Bienvenido a 'Namco Mahjong III: Mahjong Tengoku' para NES, lanzado por Namco en 1991. Este es el tercer juego de la serie después de 'Family Mahjong' y 'Family Mahjong II '. Este juego trata sobre la popular versión japonesa del antiguo juego de mesa, llamado "Reach Mahjong". Tiene muchas reglas complejas. Si conoces a Mahjong de otras nacionalidades o variedades, no es simplemente fácil cambiar a esta versión pero ayuda a saber las cosas básicas.

game.name: Nangoku Shirei!! : Spy vs Spy
game.desc:
A follow-up to the first Spy vs Spy game now sees the spies stranded on a desert island. This time, instead of the four items which allow you to leave for the airport, the spies must try to collect three pieces of a missile and escape from the island in a waiting submarine before a volcano erupts. There are a few pitfalls to avoid such as quicksand and sharks. There are also new traps (hidden pits, napalm, snares and a pistol) and hand-to-hand combat is done with swords instead of clubs.
There are seven difficulty levels which affect how much time will elapse before the volcano erupts and the size of the playing area.

game.name: Nantettatte!! Baseball
game.desc: Nantettatte !! O beisebol é um jogo de beisebol com o recurso inovador de poder atualizar as listas de equipes sem a necessidade de comprar um novo jogo de preço total. Isso é feito inserindo-se um miniconque que atualiza a lista no jogo principal.

game.name: Napoleon Senki
game.desc:
Napoleon Senki is a real-time tactics strategy video game developed by Lenar and published by Irem in March 1988 for the Family Computer. In August that same year, BrÃ¸derbund announced that it would be released for the North American NES console as The Battlefields of Napoleon; which was eventually cancelled.
This video game allows the player to re-enact the Napoleonic Wars using a bird's-eye view. Starting with earliest battles against the Holy Roman Empire to grab territory for the fledging French Republic during the French Revolutionary Wars in the year 1796, Napoleon would guide the French Revolutionary Wars until they ended in 1802. All the nations that were a participant in the Napoleonic Wars were included like Czarist Russia, Great Britain, and the Spanish Empire. Napoleon's first in-game battle would located in present-day Italy; making the battle equally important in Italian history as it was in French history. There are also battles in what would now considered to be the Arab Republic of Egypt against the Ottoman Empire along with various other conquests in Europe.

game.name: Navy Blue
game.desc: Em NavyBlue, os jogadores comandam uma frota naval com o objetivo de derrotar as forças navais adversárias e destruir sua base principal. O jogo é baseado nas regras gerais do Battleship. Pagadores são apresentados com um mapa de grade de quatro por sete.

game.name: Nekketsu Kakutou Densetsu
game.desc:
Seu outro dia na escola em Nekketsu High e o astro da série Kunio encontram uma nota em seu armário o desafiando para um torneio secreto de artes marciais. Com certeza, Kunio e seu amigo Riki aceitam o desafio e partem com a esperança de se tornar os grandes campeões da cidade.
Kakuto Densetsu é outro beat'em de rolagem lateral em 2D na série Nekketsu High, apresentando a mesma jogabilidade que envolve derrotar seus inimigos em níveis de rolagem lateral com uma combinação de socos, chutes e movimentos especiais. As diferenças neste título, no entanto, são que todo o jogo é apresentado como lutas de torneios 2 contra 2 em arenas sem rolagem, nas quais seu time deve chegar ao final da vitória e avançar para a próxima rodada. Você pode jogar com o bom e velho Kunio ou criar seu próprio personagem e melhorar suas estatísticas à medida que ele segue o padrão Nekketsu High fashion, e você pode jogar sozinho com um parceiro controlado pela IA ou com um amigo (você também pode jogar 4- jogador battle royale no modo Vs).

game.name: Nekketsu Kouha Kunio-kun
game.desc: Esta é a conversão do beat 'em up de Taito, que mais tarde produziu sequências não oficiais Target: Renegade e Renegade III: The Final Chapter. O jogo se passa nas ruas do Brooklyn, onde você deve se aventurar para conhecer sua namorada e depois resgatá-la de seus seqüestradores. Isso é dividido em cinco níveis, levando você pelo metrô e pelas docas, além de algumas ruas inóspitas. Uma grande variedade de movimentos agressivos são oferecidos, incluindo cabeçadas, chutes, socos e chutes voadores. Grande parte da violência do jogo é retratada de maneira bastante explícita, com um elemento de tentativa de humor ao longo do caminho.

game.name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu : Soccer Hen
game.desc:
This soccer game was made at the time when Nintendo introduced their four player adapter, and was probably made for the four playing purpose. This is shown clearly when you choose to play 2 or more players. Then you can choose between many different ground layers, like ice, grass and stone, which adds to the replayability.
When you play a one player game you play the world cup as one of the top soccer countries of that time, and you meet countries in a fixed order. Cameroon in the first match and the final is against West Germany. In an old-school fashion you lose when you play a draw, there's no extra time whatsoever.

game.name: Nekketsu Koukou Dodgeball-bu
game.desc:
Esta não é a escola primária e com certeza não é aula de ginástica. Este é o Super Dodge Ball. Controle seu time de seis jogadores para derrotar o time adversário e finalizá-lo usando apenas a bola e as habilidades únicas do seu time. Cada jogador tem seus próprios ataques especiais e cada equipe tem seus próprios atributos únicos.
Jogue no modo Copa do Mundo e enfrente equipes de todo o mundo para conquistar o campeonato. Você joga como o time principal dos EUA e deve trabalhar em equipes de países como Inglaterra, Islândia, Japão e muito mais para finalmente enfrentar os atuais campeões mundiais, a União Soviética.

game.name: Nekketsu! Street Basket : Ganbare Dunk Heroes
game.desc:
Another action/sports title in the Nekketsu High game series. Nekketsu Street Basket is exactly what it sounds like: a tournament of two-on-two "street" basketball matches all across the US featuring the characters of the Nekketsu High series.
The game uses the same base engine and graphics as the other games in the series, featuring super-deformed sprites moving across a side-scrolling stage trying to defeat the opposing team. You can pass the ball, shoot it, and attempt super dunks for added points. As with other Nekketsu games you can choose to play foul and beat the hell out of your opponents with your bare hands or any weapon you can find in the stages, and there are many other rule-bending features such as double and triple hoops that score extra points.

game.name: New Ghostbusters II
game.desc: O filme de sucesso mundial já está disponível no Nintendo Entertainment System! Capture o fantasma que assombrou a cidade de Nova York nesta comédia-ação-aventura. Seis estágios ao todo, incluindo um tribunal, o metrô, o museu de arte e muito mais!

game.name: New York Nyankies
game.desc: Willy é um jovem gato de jazz que atende pelo nome de "The Rockin 'Kat". Sua namorada, Jill, foi sequestrada por Mugy, o chefe do crime local.nnnnNeste jogo de rolagem lateral, você deve ajudar Rockin 'Kat Willy para salvar sua namorada através de 7 etapas. Cada estágio é um programa de TV transmitido através de diferentes canais de um aparelho de TV, e você deve escolher qual canal deseja reproduzir. Através dos canais, Willy será enviado para diferentes programas temáticos, como filmes ocidentais, filmes de gangster, etc, além de alguns canais bônus.

game.name: Nichibutsu Mahjong III : Mahjong G Men
