game.name: Super Chinese 2 : Dragon Kid
game.desc: Blu Boltar, senhor do clã Yoma, invadiu Chinaland e capturou o Imperador. Enviando uma transmissão de TV através do reino, Blu Boltar se declara o governante. Jack e Ryu são os mestres ninjas de Chinaland, treinando sob seu mentor no Monte. Epin. Tendo ouvido as notícias da captura do Imperador, eles partiram para derrotar Blu Boltar e seu Clã Yoma.

game.name: Super Chinese 3
game.desc:
Super Chinese 3 is an action RPG video game released in 1991 for the Nintendo Entertainment System. It is the last of the NES Super Chinese games and was not released outside Japan.
Similar to Little Ninja Brothers before it, Super Chinese 3 incorporates role-playing video game elements into the gameplay.

game.name: Super Chinese
game.desc: Os mestres de Kung-Fu Jacky e Lee (Lee e Loo na versão arcade) retornam ao seu reino de uma longa viagem. Eles descobrem que na sua ausência, a princesa Min-min foi sequestrada e os 10 tesouros do reino roubados. Jacky e Lee devem lutar por oito castelos diferentes para derrotar os monstros e resgatar a princesa.

game.name: Super Dyna'mix Badminton
game.desc:
Radically different from other racquet sports such as tennis, badminton uses a high-drag shuttle which gives it an irregular path. In this video game adaptation, the player controls the Japanese player in a competition against five opponents: Canada, USA, UK, South Korea and China. Each match is played on best-of-five sets, played to 15 (boys) or 11 (girls) points. Four different courts can be chosen.
Along the d-pad, two buttons are used to control the player - one to swing the racquet, and other to jump. By following the shadow of the shuttle the player can position himself correctly, and then hit it in perfect timing, giving it enough power and lift to reach the opponent's side, and then (hopefully) descend out of the opponent's reach. Jumping allows the player to hit the shuttle downwards but still over the net, reducing the reaction time for a proper return drastically.

game.name: Super Mario Bros. 3
game.desc:
Bowser está de volta e, junto com os filhos de Bowser, quer estragar o dia de Mario mais uma vez.
Desta vez, junto com a prenda da princesa, a equipe de Bowser também pegou as varinhas mágicas dos reis de cada terra e as transformou em criaturas. Cabe a Mario e Luigi recuperar as varinhas mágicas, derrotar Bowser e salvar a princesa antes do dia terminar.
Velhos e novos power-ups abundam em cada nível para os Mario Brothers, incluindo o retorno do Super Mushroom e Fire Flower, além dos novos power-ups, incluindo o traje de sapo, a flauta de dobra e o mais importante de tudo, a folha , que permite ao jogador voar e atacar inimigos com seu rabo.

game.name: Super Mario USA
game.desc:
Uma noite, Mario tem um sonho estranho, onde ele abre uma porta para outro mundo cheio de criaturas ainda mais estranhas e aterra então as de sua última aventura contra Bowser. Surpreendentemente, no dia seguinte, Mario, Luigi, Toad e a princesa tropeçam em uma caverna, o que leva ao mundo que estava no sonho de Mario.
Subcon, a terra dos sonhos, está sob um feitiço maligno graças a Wart, então Mario e sua turma precisam salvar o dia. Novas criaturas para derrotar e muitas surpresas desagradáveis ​​aguardam.

game.name: Super Mogura Tataki!! : Pokkun Mogurar
game.desc: Super Mogura Tataki!! Pokkun Mogura ("Super Mole Bash!! Pokkun Mole") is an action game for Famicom based on the classic fairground/arcade game "whac-a-mole". The goal is to hit the moles as they poke out from eight different spots on the ground before they quickly duck their heads back down. Later stages switch the moles with other animals and characters to quickly bop. The game was released with a rubber mallet and a special smaller Power Pad peripheral (known in Japan as the Family Trainer) with a grid of buttons that corresponded to the holes that the moles would emerge from. Because the Power Pad had twelve buttons, the different stages could be configured differently: for instance, the first level had a ring of eight buttons on the right side of the pad, whereas the next level included the left, right, and bottom row of buttons to form its eight around an island in a U shape.

game.name: Super Momotarou Dentetsu
game.desc:
Super Momotarou Dentetsu is a train and conveyance-based board game with financial elements that features Hudson's Momotarou character, based on the Japanese folklore hero of the same name. It is the second game in the Momotarou Dentetsu series and the first to be released on a 16-bit console - the PC Engine - hence the "Super" in the title. Several years after its PC Engine release, Super Momotarou Detetsu was also released on the Nintendo Famicom and Game Boy. It received a sequel in Super Momotarou Dentetsu II and a large number of successors.
The goal of the game is to travel the map and acquire territory through business deals, similar to Monopoly or Itadaki Street. Players have to contend with each other for limited resources, as well as CPU threats like the God of Poverty.

game.name: Super Pinball
game.desc:
Super Pinball is a NES pinball sim, providing six inter-connected tables for the player to explore and get high scores on. The overall goal of the game is to actually find and collect certain Mahjong pieces to complete a winning hand, but the Mahjong game itself has little to do with the actual gameplay besides providing a winning condition.
The game was published by Coconuts Japan, a company best known for publishing the Pachio-kun pachinko games. Pachio-kun himself makes a brief cameo on Super Pinball's title screen.

game.name: Super Pitfall
game.desc: Pitfall Harry volta a se aventurar nesta sequência “Super” de Pitfall! e Pitfall II: Cavernas Perdidas. A missão de Harry: recuperar o famoso Raj Diamond, e também resgatar sua sobrinha Rhonda e seu leal companheiro, Quickclaw.nnnnAgora armado com uma arma, Harry deve navegar por cerca de 270 telas de plataformas de ação de 8 bits. Itens valiosos serão coletados ao longo do caminho para ajudar sua missão, mas cuidado: os perigos também são abundantes, de cobras e aranhas a pedras que caem e lava fervente!

game.name: Super Real Baseball '88
game.desc:
Super Real Baseball '88 is a baseball game developed by Pax Softonica for the Famicom and published in Japan by Vap in 1988. After Namco excited the market for baseball games with the release of Pro Yakyuu Family Stadium, many other companies attempted to meet the demand for more baseball games.
This title differentiated itself from other baseball games by obtaining permission from the Professional Baseball Organization of Japan to use the official names of the 12 Japanese baseball teams and their players. This was a groundbreaking feature at the time. It was also the first game to depict an existing stadium with it's actual name, the Tokyo Dome, which had just opened shortly before the game's release. Outfielder and first baseman Warren Cromartie, formerly with the Montreal Expos, and playing for the Yomiuri Giants at the time, was chosen to help promote the game.
To further distinguish the game, the developers chose to use a more realistic approach when depicting the players on the field, as opposed to the more cartoonish look utilized by Pro Yakyuu Family Stadium and many other baseball games. Additionally, the view remains fairly close to the ball after the batter hits the ball, as opposed to zooming out to a bird's eye view of the field. Despite these changes, and efforts to promote the game, it was considered very difficult to play, as it employed rather complex controls for batting, pitching, and fielding that were not easy for many players to perform.

game.name: Super Rugby
game.desc: Super Rugby is a Sports game, developed by Zap and published by TSS, which was released in Japan in 1989.

game.name: Super Sprint
game.desc: A conversion of the arcade game, Super Sprint is a racing game for one or two players. Gameplay is from an overhead view of the racetrack. The racetracks start simple and gradually get more complicated, and may also feature obstacles ranging from traffic cones to tornadoes. Occasionally wrenches will appear in the roadway, and when collected they can be used after a race to power up your car with better tires, better acceleration or a higher top speed.

game.name: Super Star Force
game.desc:
In the Almanac dimension, the year 2010 brought in the final destruction of the evil planet Gordess by the space patroller Final Star. However, this doesn't bring closure of what happened in the past and how the planet Gordess came into existence. So now it's up to Commander Ralph to travel in time through six distinct time periods in the Neo Final Star space patroller and finally figure what exactly caused Gordess to come into existence.
Gameplay involves flying in a vertically scrolling shooter defeating various enemies in order to collect time pieces. Time pieces can be spent at teleporters so that the player can travel to different time periods and also these time pieces can be spent at shops in order to buy equipment.
The player can also find buildings to enter into. The game turns from being a vertical scrolling shoot-'em-up to an isometric dungeon exploration shooter. The main objective in these areas is to locate one of the seven time stones.

game.name: Super Xevious : Gump no Nazo
game.desc:
Super Xevious is a 2D shoot 'm up by Namco and is part of the Xevious series. Xevious is known as one of the hardest and fastest shooters around and Super Xevious is even harder and faster!
The enemies of the first Xevious game are back! But this time they are not alone. No, the brought some nasty friends with them! It is your job, as a fighter pilot, to blast them away! Destroy everything in sight!
Some ground structures that must be destroyed are hidden and are called Sol Citadels. To locate these hidden structures you must keep an eye on the target-sight that will flash when it goes over the structures.
Super Xevious takes all the great elements of the original Xevious and has also some improvements. Some examples of improvements are, for instance, the shield option and the upgrade option. The shield protects you from immediately death if you got hit during an attack. The upgrade option gives you the possibility to upgrade your bombs, lasers and shields.

game.name: Superman
game.desc:
Neste Jump'n Run, você assume o papel de Homem de Aço e deve libertar Metropolis de criminosos em várias missões.
Você começa o jogo como Clark Kent, mas contanto que tenha energia suficiente, você pode se transformar em Super-Homem. Além de pular e socar, Superman também pode usar super poderes diferentes, como Heat Vision, X-Ray Vision (torna certos inimigos visíveis), dois tipos de Super Breaths (um que congela certos inimigos) e Super Flight, que o leva a diferentes locais .

game.name: Superstar Pro Wrestling
game.desc: WCW: World Championship Wrestling é um jogo de luta isométrica da National Wrestling Alliance. Os jogadores podem optar por participar de partidas de um ou dois jogadores como lutas individuais a 1vs1 ou equipes de tag 2vs2. Ao selecionar um modo, os jogadores escolhem seus personagens dentre os doze lutadores da liga da NWA. Os personagens licenciados incluem: Rick Flair ("Nature Boy"), Sting, Lex Luger ("Pacote Total"), Mike Rotunda, Road Warrior Hawk, Road Warrior Animal, Steve Williams ("Dr. Morte"), Kevin Sullivan (" Gamemaster "), Ricky Steamboat (" O Dragão "), Ric Steiner (" Dogface Gremlin "), Eddie Gilbert (" Hotstuff ") e Michael PS Hayes. Cada lutador tem habilidades únicas não compartilhadas pelos outros, incluindo movimentos de finalização e arremesso de corda.

game.name: SWAT : Special Weapons and Tactics
game.desc:
SWAT: Special Weapons and Tactics is a role-playing game developed by Shouei and published by Toei Animation. This game was only ever released in Japan for the Famicom and was never translated from the original Japanese language.
The player takes control of a five member team of special anti-terrorist agents as they break into a building where a hostage situation is taking place. Their goal is to take out the villains and free the hostages. Battles with gunmen take place in a traditional RPG style turn-based battle. Players enter the commands for each surviving member of the team, including what weapon to attack with, and which target to attack. When not in battle, the player views the building in a traditional 3D dungeon perspective, moving through the hallways, choosing which rooms to investigate, which traps to disarm, and how to proceed to the end of the game within a given time limit.

game.name: Sweet Home
game.desc:
"Sweet Home" segue as façanhas de cinco membros de um grupo de investigação: Kazuo, Akiko, Taro, Asuka e Emi. O famoso pintor Mamiya Ichirou viveu muitos anos em uma mansão isolada, e há rumores de que há alguns afrescos valiosos para encontrar lá dentro. Nossos investigadores decidem tirar algumas fotos dos afrescos. No entanto, ao entrar na mansão, uma figura fantasmagórica de Mamiya aparece e ameaça-os. Depois disso, eles se encontram presos na mansão. Os heróis devem agora encontrar uma saída, sem esquecer os afrescos para os quais vieram e o destino de um grupo de investigação anterior que desapareceu em circunstâncias misteriosas.
"Sweet Home" é talvez o primeiro exemplo conhecido de gênero survival horror, criado pela mesma empresa que mais tarde fez o famoso Resident Evil. No entanto, "Sweet Home" também é um RPG estilo console: personagens lutam contra monstros aleatórios em batalhas por turnos, equipam várias armas e sobem de nível. Você pode (e deve) formar equipes diferentes dos cinco personagens disponíveis, tanto para batalhas quanto para resolver quebra-cabeças. Cada personagem tem sua própria habilidade baseada em itens: Taro pode tirar fotos, Emi pode destravar quase qualquer porta, Kazuo tem um isqueiro, Akiko usa um aspirador para remover poeira e outros obstáculos, e Asuka tem kits médicos.
O jogo nunca foi lançado fora do Japão.

game.name: Sword Master
game.desc:
O Mestre das Espadas estabelece o conto de um mago maligno associado a um demônio monstruoso que ousou sequestrar uma donzela. O Mestre das Espadas é um cavaleiro que procura resgatar a bela dama e destruir as pessoas e criaturas más do castelo em que habitam.
É um jogo de ação com rolagem lateral paralaxe no qual o jogador deve usar espada e escudo para lutar por 7 níveis de jogo, da floresta a uma cidade amaldiçoada, a vários níveis do covil do castelo do vilão. O jogador encontrará morcegos gigantes, lobos, guerreiros esqueletos, cavaleiros do mal, magos, homens lagartos, gárgulas e outros inimigos ferozes em sua missão. O Mestre das Espadas pode balançar sua espada, defender-se com seu escudo e reunir poderes que lhe permitem mudar de forma; por exemplo, o Mestre da Espada pode se transformar em um usuário mágico e lançar feitiços ofensivos.

game.name: Tag Team Pro-Wrestling
game.desc: Tu és desafiado superar a incrível habilidade de seus oponentes ... a ganhar o título no Super Campeonato Mundial de Tag Team Wrestling. Trabalho em equipa e resistência são as chaves, enquanto tu e teu parceiro disputam os jogos de título em sua busca pelo cinturão. Ataca os teus oponentes com empurrões, biqueiros , um parte costas, vou-os de cabeça, ou mesmo atirando os oponentes para fora do ringue! Para ganhar. Nada pode igualar a emoção quando a multidão aplaude os teus golpes no tapete. Prepara-te para o Tag Team Wrestling! A "Data East" trás-te o realismo das Maquinas Arcade em casa!

game.name: Taito Basketball
game.desc:
In Ultimate Basketball, the player can choose one of seven fictional teams that each have different skills such as having tight defense or a phenomenal passing game. Each team also has their own players who are given ratings on their quickness, shooting and defensive ability.
The point of view is horizontal for the most part. Occasionally, a close-up action scene is shown on plays such as slam dunks and free throws. There are also two different play modes, "Tournament" and "One Game." Players can play alone, against a friend, or with a friend against the computer. Their is also a "Watch" mode where to spectate games fully being played by the computer.

game.name: Taito Chase H.Q.
game.desc: Como agente disfarçado da sede da Chase, seu trabalho é patrulhar as ruas e rastrear cinco criminosos. Antes de começar, você recebe um resumo da missão, que fornece informações sobre o suspeito e qual carro ele dirige. Então você atravessa a cidade sem colidir com outros carros e alcança o carro do criminoso. Para prender os suspeitos, você deve continuar esbarrando no carro deles até que não funcione mais. E você tem que fazer isso dentro de um prazo estrito. Você não pode se dar ao luxo de colidir com carros ou edifícios ou perder tempo entrando na estrada novamente.

game.name: Taito Grand Prix : Eikou e no License
game.desc:
Taito Grand Prix: Eikou e no License is a 1987 Formula One racing video game for the Japan-exclusive Famicom. This video game takes the player through randomized street racing circuits in addition to the various circuits of the 1987 Formula One season. There are over fifteen stock car tracks and eight Formula One tracks. Open mode allows the player to practice each course individually without any pressure from anything besides the time limit. Normal mode is more restrictive; the game forces the player to roam from city to city until they end their career by winning a full season of Formula One.
There are three kinds of music (playing from a pretend cassette tape) and a blank soundtrack. The instrumental songs played in the game were: Offside Way, Crushing Light, and Faraway Dream. On the promotional flyer for this video game, a Formula One racing vehicle was shown with the Ford logo shown on the vehicle. However, there are no actual Ford Motor Company vehicles used in the entire game.

game.name: Taiyou no Shinden
game.desc:
Enquanto explora a América Central, o professor Ime desapareceu. Ele era conhecido pela última vez por estar indo para o túmulo maia de Chichen Iza. Você lidera duas crianças na busca pelo professor.
Este é uma aventura de apontar e clicar. Os botões direcionais movem um ponteiro na tela. Você poderá interagir com itens e opções depois de escolher em uma lista de palavras-chave, como: procurar, usar e obter. O recurso de salvar usa senhas para continuar seu progresso.

game.name: Taiyou no Yuusha : Fighbird
game.desc:
Some evil dude tries to start a war by stealing all the oil. Choose between pilots Kesota or Katori to stop him in this vertical scrolling shooter. The player can switch between different vehicles during play. Tank, drill, rocket, bomber, jet. Eventually the Fire Bird mech is added to the list. Each vehicle has multiple weapons that can be switched during play.
titled after episode 2 of the Brave series, The Brave Fighter of Sun Fighbird. The Brave series was animated by Sunrise and distributed by Nagoya TV. Apparently "Fighbird" really is the correct spelling in Japan.

game.name: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima II
game.desc: Em Adventure Island II, o jogador assume o papel de Master Higgins, que tem que salvar sua garota de alienígenas que também querem dominar a Terra. Os elementos básicos do jogo são os mesmos do seu antecessor: Master Higgins percorre os níveis enquanto luta contra vários inimigos. Ser atingido uma vez resulta em sua morte, a menos que ele esteja carregando um dos vários power-ups, por ex. armas ou um skate que melhora sua velocidade. Ele também precisa coletar comida para encher a barra de fome que vai diminuindo durante o jogo. Quando chega a zero, o herói morre.

game.name: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima IV
game.desc: Takahashi Meijin no B?ken Jima IV (Adventure Island IV) é um jogo de plataforma lançado em 1994 pela Hudson Soft para Family Computer, trata-se do 4º e último jogo da franquia Adventure Island. Diferencia-se dos anteriores por se passar em uma unica ilha e por conter senhas para voltar a jogar de onde se parou. O objetivo do jogo é resgatar seus 5 amigos dinossauros e na fase 6 sua namorada tina.

game.name: Takahashi Meijin no Bouken-jima
game.desc:
No Pacífico Sul, Master Higgins vivia em paz vestindo apenas uma saia de grama e um boné até que o Evil Witch Doctor decide capturar a princesa Leilani. Cabe ao Master Higgins coletar machados, bolas de fogo e skates para ajudar sua nobre busca.
Sendo um jogo de plataforma com rolagem lateral, Master Higgins se move pela tela da esquerda para a direita e encontra power-ups em ovos gigantes, como por exemplo um skate que resulta em um grande aumento na velocidade. Ao ser atingido, Master Higgins perde seu poder. Se ele não está em um skate, ser atingido significa morte instantânea. Outra mecânica do jogo é a fome, que é indicada através de um medidor que diminui constantemente. Se chegar a zero, o herói morre e a única maneira de preenchê-lo é coletando comida no caminho. Chefes esperam por ele no final dos níveis, até o próprio Evil Witch Doctor.

game.name: Takahashi Meijin no Bugutte Honey
game.desc: Based upon an anime of the same name, which features a cast of characters that includes Takahashi Meijin, the main character and hero of the Adventure Island series, as well as redesign of the honeygirl fairy known as Bug-tte Honey (pronounced Bugute). In the anime, Takahashi and Honey get into various adventures along with three ordinary school children from Earth. While the game draws inspiration from the anime (which itself drew inspiration from Adventure Island) the game does not necessarily follow any of the episodes of the show. Instead, the game consists of four stages. In the first stage, you control Bug-tte Honey, who has the ability to fly about the screen. At the end of the first stage, Honey rescues Takahashi by smashing the cage he is being held captive in. From that point forward, the player controls Takahashi (Called Master Higgins in the US/EU version)

game.name: Takeda Shingen 2
game.desc: Shingen Takeda foi um dos senhores da guerra mais poderosos do Japão medival. Você está em duas cidades pequenas e tenta conquistar o país como Shingen fez no século XVI. Controle todos os aspectos de seus territórios do social, econômico e militar, na tentativa de espalhar sua influência. Se você é bom o suficiente, pode fazê-lo mais rapidamente do que o verdadeiro Shingen!

game.name: Takeda Shingen
game.desc: Takeda Shingen es un juego histórico de estrategia por turnos, desarrollado para Famicom por Another y publicado por HOT-B, fue lanzado en Japón en 1988. Como Nobunaga's Ambition, que fue lanzado para Famicom solo unas semanas antes, pero de hecho es mucho más antiguo, es un juego sobre unificar los feudos en guerra de Japón bajo un solo gobierno. En este caso, la ambición de unir Japón pertenece a Takeda Shingen, quien fue un daimyo preeminente en el Japón feudal con un prestigio militar excepcional en la última etapa del período Sengoku (a mediados del siglo XVI).

game.name: Takeshi no Chousenjou
game.desc: On the surface Takeshi no Ch?senj? is a side-scrolling adventure game, where the player character can wander the streets and buildings of Tokyo, and later the islands of the South Pacific. Various people and shop-owners can be spoken with, and frequently attacked if the player so chooses.nnnnKitano incorporated many of his unique and controversial ideas into the game. For instance, the player can beat up a yakuza gangster at a pachinko gambling establishment, and take the yakuza's money to exchange for prizes. The player can use a hang-glider to fly over into a strange land called the "Red Country" (an amalgam between the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany). The player can gain access to the Red Country if they pass over the four other islands, but a huge mountain blocks the way into the country, and the player will be forced to crash into either the mountain or the ground, resulting in an automatic game over screen. There is also a choice on the password-entry screen ("Punch the old man") which results in an automatic game over, even when the player has not even started the game. Other in-game events include: a game over screen where the player's character is given a funeral, singing karaoke at a pub (using the second-controller's built-in microphone), the main character divorcing his wife and paying a settlement, beating up yakuza, or even punching the main character's wife and children (presumably to death).nnnnThe game's plot, where a despondent salaryman seeks to find a hidden treasure on an island, is introduced as having been created by Kitano while he was drunk at a bar; however, Kitano himself explains that the plot was solely the result of an hour-long talk at a café near his production company

game.name: Takeshi no Chousenjou
game.desc: On the surface Takeshi no Ch?senj? is a side-scrolling adventure game, where the player character can wander the streets and buildings of Tokyo, and later the islands of the South Pacific. Various people and shop-owners can be spoken with, and frequently attacked if the player so chooses.nnnnKitano incorporated many of his unique and controversial ideas into the game. For instance, the player can beat up a yakuza gangster at a pachinko gambling establishment, and take the yakuza's money to exchange for prizes. The player can use a hang-glider to fly over into a strange land called the "Red Country" (an amalgam between the Soviet Union and Nazi Germany). The player can gain access to the Red Country if they pass over the four other islands, but a huge mountain blocks the way into the country, and the player will be forced to crash into either the mountain or the ground, resulting in an automatic game over screen. There is also a choice on the password-entry screen ("Punch the old man") which results in an automatic game over, even when the player has not even started the game. Other in-game events include: a game over screen where the player's character is given a funeral, singing karaoke at a pub (using the second-controller's built-in microphone), the main character divorcing his wife and paying a settlement, beating up yakuza, or even punching the main character's wife and children (presumably to death).nnnnThe game's plot, where a despondent salaryman seeks to find a hidden treasure on an island, is introduced as having been created by Kitano while he was drunk at a bar; however, Kitano himself explains that the plot was solely the result of an hour-long talk at a café near his production company

game.name: Takeshi no Sengoku Fuuunji
game.desc: is a board game simulation developed for the Famicom by Taito and released near the end of 1988. It stars Japanese comedian-turned-actor "Beat" Takeshi Kitano, who first appeared on the Famicom in the parody game Takeshi no Chousenjou. Similar to the Game of Life, players move around a board earning money and occasionally encountering events such as a minigame - in which the player can increase their wealth should they succeed - or a penalty. The game has a Sengoku era theme running throughout, from its samurai characters to the tattooed gambler that rolls a dice for determining how many places a player can move around the board that turn.

game.name: Tamura Koushou Mahjong Seminar
game.desc: Also known as 'Mahjong Seminar by Tamura Mitsuaki' A Mahjong game endorsed by Mahjong player Tamura Mitsuaki.

game.name: Tanigawa Kouji no Shougi Shinan III
game.desc: Shogi es un juego muy similar a lo que llamamos Ajedrez. Hay muchas similitudes, pero también hay algunas diferencias notables. Mientras que el ajedrez se juega en un tablero de 8x8, Shogi se juega en un tablero de 9x9. En el ajedrez, hay 16 piezas para cada jugador; Shogi te da 20. El juego va paso a paso, es decir, después de que un jugador hace un movimiento, el otro lo hace, y así sucesivamente. Hay dos colores, blanco y negro, con el negro siempre primero. Usa el botón A para seleccionar una pieza, el D-pad para moverla y luego A nuevamente para finalizar. Presionar B cancela cualquier cosa a mitad del turno. B cambia el cursor a la tabla de piezas derrotadas. Si presionas INICIO, el juego reinicia el tablero.

game.path: ./Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni (J).7z
game.name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou : Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni...
game.desc: The fourth game in the Jake Hunter/Tantei JingÅ«ji SaburÅ series, the second on a regular Famicom cartridge, and the last for the Famicom. There is a burglary at a mansion, which Jake goes to investigate. He sends his assistant Yulia Marks to search for
game.image: ./media/images/Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Toki no Sugiyuku Mama ni (J).mp4

game.path: ./Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Yokohamakou Renzoku Satsujin Jiken (J).7z
game.name: Tantei Jinguuji Saburou : Yokohamakou Renzoku Satsujin Jiken
game.desc: The second game in the Jake Hunter/Tantei JingÅ«ji SaburÅ series, this time on a regular Famicom cartridge. A girlfriend goes missing, and the search for her reveals that she was hiding guns. Police suspect a link between the case and an underground traf
game.image: ./media/images/Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Yokohamakou Renzoku Satsujin Jiken (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Yokohamakou Renzoku Satsujin Jiken (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Tantei Jinguuji Saburou - Yokohamakou Renzoku Satsujin Jiken (J).mp4

game.name: Tao
game.desc:
Tao (??, lit. "Road") is an adventure video game for the Nintendo Family Computer about living the life of a nomad seeking spiritual enlightenment.
On the way to enlightenment, the player roams from town to town solving quests for various non-player characters during the year 1999.
Along the way, the red-headed character develops an alter ego named Tao (which can be summoned by rubbing on a special piece of stone), they must prevent the apocalypse from occurring by accomplishing the necessary quests. Players also have to visit cities that are made out of gold in order to complete the game.
There are elders and common folk outside the village that give out advice when leaving the town by walking on the railroad tracks. A Buddhist temple can be explored near the player's starting point.

game.name: Tashiro Masashi no Princess ga Ippai
game.desc:
Tashiro Masashi no Princess ga Ippai is a Japanese video game for the Nintendo Famicom (NES) by former comedian Masashi Tashiro released in time for October, 1989.
The story is about the hero Masashi Tashiro who has to rescue the four princesses in distress. One happy ending and four unhappy endings were used in the game; becoming one of the first video games to have multiple endings. The game was not very successful, but it started appearing frequently and getting high prices on online auction sites like Yahoo! after 2000, when Masashi Tashiro was arrested and convicted several times in connection with voyeurism and drug abuse.

game.name: Tatakae! Chou Robot Seimeitai Transformers : Convoy no Nazo
game.desc:
Probably the first game to be based on the Transformers toys, Convoy no nazo pits the player as Ultra Magnus, who must find out the secret of Convoy (known as Optimus Prime in most of the world). To find it out, Ultra Magnus must travel through a set of platform-style worlds and fight a range of bosses, ranging from the Megatron, through the combiner series to a flying Decepticon emblem(!).
Ultra Magnus starts out in robot mode, where he can jump far but his shots travel only halfway across the screen. Press down, and Magnus transforms into a trailer. In trailer mode, he can pass below the planes as well as shoot upwards. When a plane is shot down, it transforms into a robot, which must be killed with the forward-pointing shot. Later on, the game becomes more platform-oriented.

game.name: Tatakae!! Rahmen Man : Sakuretsu Choujin 102 Gei
game.desc:
Tatakae!! Ramen-Man: Sakuretsu Choujin 102 Gei is an adventure game developed by Human Entertainment for the Famicom and published by Bandai in 1988. It is based off the Tatakae!! Ramenman series, which itself is a spin-off of the Kinnikuman series, known in the US as M.U.S.C.L.E.. Ramenman is a popular character in the Kinnikuman universe.
The game follows the eponymous warrior Ramenman as he attempts to track down his father's killers and bring them to justice with his many years of martial arts training. Notably, this game is the first true point-and-click adventure game for the system. While there had been many adventure games made for the NES, such as Portopia Renzoku Satsujin Jiken or Princess Tomato in the Salad Kingdom, they are largely driven by menus. Ramenman is directed by using the cursor to select an area to walk to or interact with instead much like classic Sierra adventure games such as King's Quest.

game.name: Tatakai no Banka
game.desc: O mundo é governado por um cruel guerreiro chamado Achiless e seus capangas. Você é Ryu, o mestre das artes marciais e do combate com espadas, que decidiu que um confronto com Aquiles é para trazer a paz e a ordem de volta ao mundo. Seu personagem está equipado com uma espada (por ofensa) e um escudo (por defesa). Você passará por seis etapas, começando em uma cidade em ruínas, cada uma com dois personagens chefes (no meio e no final). Alguns inimigos são tão poderosos que você morre no instante em que não consegue bloquear. Você também precisa correr contra o tempo, o que torna o jogo muito mais difícil.

game.name: Tecmo Bowl
game.desc:
The most popular American football game to hit the NES console, Tecmo Bowl pits the player vs. the computer in 11 game single-elimination playoff action, or you can go head-to-head with a human opponent in action or coach mode. There are 12 teams of real NFL players (circa 1988) to choose from, but don't look for official NFL team logos or mascots like Bears or Dolphins--Tecmo Bowl has the NFLPA but not the NFL license.
The play perspective is top-down and the screen scrolls horizontally. Player graphics are large and colorful, which is made possible by limiting the number of players to nine per team. Animated cut-scenes are shown following touchdowns and at half-time, and crowds are shown filling the endzone seats.
There are four plays to choose from on offense--usually two runs and two passes. The player takes control of the quarterback before the snap and then either hands off to the running back or works through his receiver progression from the top to the bottom of the screen. Defense consists of trying to guess which offensive play the opponent will select and then taking control of one of the defensive players before the snap. A very simple power meter system is used for kicking field goals, extra points, and punts.
There are no game or season stats and there is no way to save your season, but there is a password feature allowing you to resume tournament play where you left off.

game.name: Tecmo Super Bowl
game.desc:
Tecmo Super Bowl é a continuação do jogo de arcade / simulação de futebol do NES Tecmo Bowl. Embora a jogabilidade básica do original esteja intacta, uma série de novos recursos e melhorias foram adicionados.
Os recursos incluem: 28 times / mascotes reais da NFL com jogadores reais da NFL (por volta de 1991), 11 jogadores em campo por equipe, substituições de jogadores, fumbles, controle aprimorado sobre chutes e punts, oito jogadas para escolher durante os jogos, playbooks personalizáveis, fliperama / treinador / opções de simulação de computador para um ou dois jogadores, pré-temporada / temporada regular / jogos Pro-Bowl, classificação e classificação das equipes na temporada regular, estatísticas e classificações dos jogadores na temporada regular, boxscores no final do jogo e 12 times playoff seguindo o formato da NFL.

game.name: Tecmo World Cup Soccer
game.desc: Tecmo World Cup Soccer é um jogo de futebol simples, com uma visão aérea. Apenas um modo (Copa do Mundo) está disponível, jogável por um jogador contra a IA do computador ou dois jogadores um contra o outro. Qualquer uma das dezesseis equipes nacionais disponíveis pode ser selecionada

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles II : The Manhattan Project
game.desc:
Este foi o último jogo de Tartarugas Ninja para a NES. Ele seguiu o aclamado Turtles II mais de um ano depois e, ao contrário de seu antecessor, não tem um equivalente no Arcade.
O terceiro jogo da série é basicamente o mesmo que o segundo. A história e os estágios são diferentes, é claro, mas isso realmente não importa. Escolha sua tartaruga favorita e mate o maior número possível de soldados do Foot Clan, lute contra os chefes e alcance Shredder em um jogo no estilo Double Dragon.
Os gráficos e jogabilidade foram melhorados. E, se a escolha da tartaruga dependesse apenas do gosto pessoal no segundo jogo (como eram iguais, em cores diferentes), nesse terceiro episódio, eles ganharam movimentos especiais individuais.

game.name: Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles
game.desc:
April O'Neil, a amiga repórter das Tartarugas Ninja, é sequestrada pelo vilão Destruidor e seus dois capangas, Bebop e Rocksteady. As quatro tartarugas ninjas: Rafael, Michelangelo, Donatello e Leonardo abrem caminho por hordas de soldados de infantaria para resgatar April. Eles enfrentam inimigos conhecidos, como o cientista louco Baxter Stockman, o general Traag de Dimension X e o cérebro alienígena do mal Krang, até o confronto final com o próprio Destruidor.
Teenage Mutant Ninja Turtles: The Arcade Game é portado do popular jogo de arcade feito pela Konami durante o auge da popularidade da série de desenhos animados. Dependendo da versão do jogo, até dois, três ou quatro jogadores podem participar da ação. O jogo parece como um Double Dragon simplificado. Enquanto a maioria dos inimigos padrão do Foot Soldier são facilmente despachados, alguns atacam com facas ou armas de raios e, portanto, são mais perigosos. No final de cada nível, os jogadores encontram um chefe (ou, em certos casos, dois chefes trabalhando em conjunto, como Bebop e Rocksteady).

game.name: Tenchi o Kurau II : Shokatsu Koumei Den
game.desc:
The game is based on the comic "Tenchi o kurau" by Hiroshi Motomiya, itself based on the novel "Romance of the Three Kingdoms" by Luó Guànzhong and follows the main plot of historical events.
You start the game as Liú Bèi, the one of greatest Chinese heroes, in the mission to restore the power of Han Dynasty. The imperial seal was stolen from Luòyáng's ashes and Yuán Shù claimed the throne. You must bring him to justice. Serving the Emperor of Han Dynasty and Cáo Cao, you complete quests not forgetting your brotherhood with Guan Yu and Zhang Fei. Travelling through China, you may add heroes to your group and meet different opponents, where combat is flowing. The power of group members is estimated in thousands of people.

game.name: Tenchi o Kurau
game.desc: Um jogo de RPG para o NES ambientado no mito Romance of the Three Kingdoms que gerou jogos em quase todas as plataformas imagináveis. Um grupo é formado pela seleção de até cinco oficiais de um grande grupo, muitos dos quais só se juntariam a você depois de serem subornados ou derrotados em combate. Oficiais, por sua vez, cada um tinha uma certa quantidade de soldados, que atuavam essencialmente como pontos de vida (ou seja, Si Ma Ye lidera 40.000 homens e quando é atingido por Zhang Bao, ele perde 5.000 homens, então sua força de trabalho está agora em 35.000). Um dos primeiros jogos no NES a tentar simular um combate em larga escala entre diferentes forças, embora obviamente de uma forma muito limitada.

game.name: Tenka no Goikenban : Mito Koumon
game.desc: It revolves around the historical Japanese figure Mito Koumon who, as a retired governor, traveled across Japan to observe other districts. Where ever he investigated, he found local inhabitants who were experiencing some problem, or observing some corruption in the local government. Mito Koumon would then investigate the situation, disguised as a commoner, only to expose both the corruption and his true identity when the mystery was completely solved. In doing so, he would improve the lives of the local inhabitants, and then move on to another district to look for more problems. The game was only released in Japan, and never translated into English. It had one sequel: Mito Koumon II: Sekai Manyuuki.

game.name: Tenkaichi Bushi : Keru Naguuru
game.desc:
Tenkaichi Bushi is a one-on-one martial arts fighting game set in ancient China.
Using 2D side-scrolling graphics with a distinct cartoony design, the player takes control of a single fighter as he attempts to defeat his opponent in single-round fights. Combat is controlled with a single attack button which can unleash all sorts of moves when pressed in conjunction with the directional arrows. These moves vary among each fighter, as players can choose from 15 different fighters, each with their own stats and moves, and then compete against the others to see who gets the honor of becoming grandmaster.
Additionally the game includes a story mode in which players can take control of a single martial artist and roam the countryside looking for challengers (the later done from a top-down map view). Starting abilities and health are minimal, but successfully defeating opponents will increase the player's health and allow the fighter to learn new moves and turn into the ultimate combatant.

game.name: Terao no Dosukoi Oozumou
game.desc: Terao no Dosukoi Oozumou ("Terao's Big Thud Sumo") is a sumo game for the Famicom endorsed by professional sumo wrestler Terao Tsunefumi, who had reached the sekiwake rank (the third highest) the same year that this game was released. Players name their own sumo wrestler and compete in a series of matches, their station either improving or dropping depending on their win/lose record. The story mode involves walking around a world map, talking to NPCs and getting into random encounters with other wrestlers, leading to impromptu matches.

game.name: Terminator 2: Judgment Day
game.desc:
Terminator 2: Judgment Day is based on the movie of the same name. The player takes the role of the T-800 Terminator and has to protect John Connor from being terminated by the T-1000 Terminator.
The game is set over five levels with the following goals:
1. Level 1: Acquire a weapon. Level 2: An isometric racing course on a motorcycle in which the player needs to out-run a tanker truck that is chasing them. This stage was omitted from the Game Gear version. Level 3: Locate and rescue Sarah Connor from the Pescadero asylum. Level 4: Plant explosive charges to destroy the Cyberdyne building. Level 5: Defeat the T-1000 within the steel mill.

game.name: Terra Cresta
game.desc: In the follow-up to Moon Cresta, a well-guarded planet is being invaded. You will have to make a succession of passes over the landscape, shooting out ground turrets and aliens. Numbered bases release power-ups when shot - these can either be used in combination or (by pressing the space bar) in Formation Mode, covering a wider range of shooting positions. Each pass over the planet ends with a boss; the third and final one with a boss who can only be killed if you are at maximum power. Death puts you back to the start of the world.

game.name: Tetrastar : The Fighter
game.desc: Tetrastar The Fighter is a 3D shooter by Home Data and published by Taito. In the year 2089, humanity forms an alliance with the intergalactic Baal empire but soon Earth finds out about the alien's true intentions. A group of resistance assembles the project Tetrastar to prepare for the potential upcoming threat. But the project lead by the general Nelson is soon put on hold and a short lived peace settles in. But the whole thing was nothing more than a hostile invasion and the Baal empire finally breaks the alliance and attacks Earth. The player's first mission is to prevent New York to be destroyed and then to retrieve Omega, the faithful robot navigator, to warp to the alien's mother world. The Tetrastar super fighter can move around the screen and fire a standard Vulcan gun. Special weapons become available later in the game from Bombs (WID), Homing Missiles (AAM), Napalm Bombs (NAP) and the powerful Bio Cannon (BIO) - they are accessible via the Select button and triggered by pressing A. They all come in limited quantities and must be refilled by picking up power-pods along the way. Tetrastar features nice stages and cutscenes between them unfold the game's episodic story.

game.name: Tetris 2 + Bombliss
game.desc:
Tetris 2 + BomBliss is one of the many versions of the famous soviet puzzle game. There are, naturally, two variations featured on this cartridge: regular Tetris with several modes, as well as a new game called BomBliss. Also included is a two-player battle version of regular Tetris.
Tetris mode includes three game types. First is A-Type, which is a standard endless mode that continually increases pace until the player loses. Next is B-Type, which is a race to 25 lines under increasingly tough conditions. Last is C-Type, which is similar to A-Type, but adds a continually-rising stack of garbage appearing from the bottom of the well.
BomBliss is slightly different from regular Tetris. In each stage, the well is filled with a preset pattern of blocks and bombs. Completing a line will, unlike Tetris, not clear it. It will, however, activate any bombs within the completed line, which can then destroy the blocks. The goal is to clear the entire well of blocks.
BomBliss also includes three different modes of play. Contest mode tasks the player with clearing out a preset field in as few blocks as possible; the top three scores for each stage are saved. Puzzle mode tasks the player with clearing a preset field with a preset sequence of pieces. Last, there is Construction mode, which allows the player to build their own puzzle stages.

game.name: Tetris Flash
game.desc: Ao contrário do Tetris original, o Tetris 2 permite limpar o campo de blocos de uma maneira diferente. Cada campo de jogo começa com pontos coloridos diferentes (neste caso, preto, cinza e branco), com uma de cada cor piscando. Os blocos são compostos das mesmas três cores e, combinando blocos da mesma cor por cima ou ao lado do ponto, o ponto e esses blocos serão apagados da tela. Se você apagar um ponto piscante, todos os pontos correspondentes da mesma cor serão apagados. Para completar a rodada, limpe os pontos, não os blocos.

game.name: Tetris
game.desc: Esta versão do Tetris é uma das muitas conversões do famoso jogo de empilhamento de blocos, bem como a versão mais conhecida (mas não a única) no primeiro console doméstico da Nintendo. O objetivo é colocar peças compostas de quatro peças em um poço de dez por vinte, organizando-as em fileiras completas, que desaparecem. À medida que as linhas são limpas, o ritmo do jogo aumenta e o jogo termina se a pilha chegar ao topo do poço.

game.name: Tetsudou Ou : Famicom Boardgame
game.desc:
This is a board-game title in which 4 players play as rail road cars. The goal of the game is to acquire the most assets and cross the destination points as much as possible in competition with your other players.
Here is a full English translation for the game, Tetsudou Ou: Famicom Boardgame for the famicom system!
Now you can enjoy this fun little board-game where up to 4 players compete against each other to own the most railroads, have the most money, and get to your destinations!
In conjunction with RG-Soft's work we were able to complete this project and get 98% if the game completed. Only a few names on the board map will appear glitched due to code issues but it will in no way hinder the game play. We hope you enjoy this!

game.name: Tetsuwan Atom
game.desc: Tetsuwan Atom (é‰„è…•ã‚¢ãƒˆãƒ ?) is an action game developed by Home Data and published by Konami for the Famicom in Japan early on in 1988. The game stars Tetsuwan Atom, a popular early anime character who is better known as Astro Boy outside of Japan. Tetsuwan Atom was originally created in 1951 by Osamu Tezuka. The successful series started as a comic strip and was turned into a black and white animated series in 1963. It was one of the first (if not the first) animated TV series produced in Japan, and has influenced countless Japanese animated series that followed. The little robot-boy is one of Japan's most recognizable character. The story takes place in the future, at a time where humans and robots live together in harmony. The powerful robot-boy Atom lives with Professor Ochanomizu, an old scientist who takes good care of the little robot, and helps him fight crime and injustice. One day, burglars break into Professor Ochanomizu's lab and steal all of his money. It is now Atom's duty to recover the stolen loot.

game.path: ./Bard's Tale - Tales of the Unknown, The (J).7z
game.name: The Bard's Tale
game.desc: O texto a seguir da capa da caixa resume a premissa: Há muito tempo, quando a magia ainda prevalecia, o malvado mago Mangar the Dark ameaçou uma cidade pequena, mas harmoniosa, chamada Skara Brae. Criaturas malignas escorreram para Skara Brae e se juntaram ao seu domínio sombrio. Mangar congelou as terras vizinhas com um feitiço de Inverno Eterno, isolando totalmente Skara Brae de qualquer ajuda possível. Então, uma noite, todos os milicianos da cidade desapareceram. O futuro de Skara Brae estava na balança. E quem foi deixado para resistir? Apenas um punhado de jovens guerreiros não comprovados, usuários juniores de magia, alguns bardos mal tinham idade para beber e alguns Rogues sem trabalho. Você está aí. Você é o líder desse grupo de combatentes da liberdade. Felizmente, você tem um bardo com você para cantar suas glórias, se você sobreviver. Pois este é o material das lendas. E assim a história começa ...
game.image: ./media/images/Bard's Tale - Tales of the Unknown, The (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Bard's Tale - Tales of the Unknown, The (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Bard's Tale - Tales of the Unknown, The (J).mp4

game.name: The Black Bass II
game.desc: O boato é verdade de que eles abrirão o Torneio Internacional de Pesca de Pescadores com 200 pescadores profissionais selecionados no seu NES. A sombra do peixe aparece das profundezas do lago. Este é um jogo de simulação real entre homem e peixe. O BLACK BASS torna realidade uma competição de sonhos de fantasia. O Black Bass vai pular e tentar se esconder no fundo das árvores nos quatro lagos diferentes. Agora o torneio está pronto para começar!

game.name: The Black Bass
game.desc: The objective is for the player to catch as many black bass as possible from sunrise to sunset. The player may select a beginner's game or ranking game. A ranking game requires a password. From here, a player may select a location on the lake to start at and begin fishing. Simply tossing a lure out with the desired power will start the process. A fish can be lured in by moving the lure around and if it bites, then the player can try reeling it in. Too much constant reeling leads to the line breaking and the loss of both the fish and the lure. Between casting rounds, the player can make certain selections. Among the selections available is the option to change the type and or color of lure being used.

game.name: The Blue Marlin
game.desc:
O Blue Marlin é um peixe grande, forte, rápido e com um nariz comprido. Pegar um peixe assim é o sonho de qualquer pescador. Uma grande competição de pesca começa neste verão na Flórida e no Havaí. Você está convidado a participar dela. Você será capaz de demonstrar suas habilidades de pescador e vencer a competição?
"The Blue Marlin" é uma simulação de pesca. Você começa na Flórida e passa por vários estágios de pesca na Flórida e no Havaí. Cada estágio contém três locais diferentes. Você navega no barco de cima para baixo, escolhe um local apropriado e começa a pescar. Você pode escolher o comprimento da linha, a profundidade que você coloca na água, que isca você usa, etc. Quanto mais você pesca, e quanto melhor você pesca, melhores estatísticas você ganha.

game.path: ./Flintstones - The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy, The (J).7z
game.name: The Flintstones : The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy
game.desc: The Flintstones and the Rubbles were enjoying a fine day when suddenly, someone from the future called Dr. Butler arrived and stole their pets, Dino and Hoppy! Butler plans to feature the pets in his intergalactic zoo, and what's worse, he's destroyed the Great Gazoo's time machine so that no-one could stop him! It's up to everyone's favourite caveman, Fred Flintstone, to find the pieces to the time machine and repair it, so that they can travel to the future and confront Dr. Butler once and for all!
game.image: ./media/images/Flintstones - The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy, The (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Flintstones - The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy, The (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Flintstones - The Rescue of Dino & Hoppy, The (J).mp4

game.name: The Golf '92
game.desc: The Golf '92 is a Family Computer video game that involves golfing with popular Japanese golf pros. There are three difficulty levels and the game is almost completely in Japanese. There are also three modes: leaderboard (similar to major PGA events), tournament (using a format found in most sports playoffs), and stroke play. Players have a crowd to play their round of golf into front of. In the hardest difficulty levels, players are confronted with wind levels approaching that of a hurricane while the wind is almost stagnant in the easiest difficulty level.[3] One of the drawbacks of the game is that the player must determine the angle of their flight separately from the strength of their swing and the type of golf club that they will use.

game.name: The Gorilla Man
game.desc: The Gorilla Man is a Miscellaneous game, developed by Pixel and published by Yonezawa PR21, which was released in Japan in 1993.

game.name: The Lord of King
game.desc:
Você é Astyanax, um garoto de dezesseis anos que tem o mesmo sonho noite após noite: uma princesa pedindo ajuda. Uma tarde, você é convocado para o mundo de Remnia por Cutie, uma duende, para salvar a princesa do reino. Você é o escolhido mencionado pelas profecias deles!
Sim, este é o seu cenário típico de história de fantasia. Você deve salvar o reino da horda maligna de Blackhorn! Ao longo do caminho, você encontrará poderes que o tornarão mais fortes e atualizarão sua arma; e você também pode desencadear ataques mágicos que atingem todos os inimigos na tela.

game.name: The Magic Candle
game.desc:
A Vela Mágica é melhor descrita como um clone Ultima. É um RPG de cima para baixo, multijogador e voltado para festas.
A trama gira em torno de você (Lukas) e seu grupo de intrépidos aventureiros, cuja tarefa é selar o demônio Dreax dentro da Vela Mágica (que está queimando e, quando isso acontece, ele é libertado).
O jogo tem 3 níveis de dificuldade (alterando o número de 'dias' em que você começa a completar o jogo) Muitas viagens, rastreamento de masmorras, exploração de cidades e, principalmente, muita conversa com os NPCs.

game.name: The Money Game II : Kabutochou no Kiseki
game.desc:
Seu tio distante faleceu, deixando você, seu herdeiro, com uma fortuna de bilhões de dólares. A pegada? A família Benedict tem padrões extremamente altos, e você precisa provar que pode aumentar ainda mais essa fortuna na bolsa de valores antes que ela lhe seja dada. Além disso, você deve exercitar-se regularmente para manter-se saudável e manter sua namorada feliz, mimando-a frequentemente com presentes.
O jogo apresenta um mecanismo de negociação de ações que é bastante simples de entrar. Compre ações como achar melhor e termine o dia. Na manhã seguinte, você descobrirá se seus ativos cresceram ou não. Caso contrário, você provavelmente precisará investir em outra coisa.

game.name: The Money Game
game.desc: The Money Game gives the player a chance to try their luck at making money by investing in the stock market.Gameplay takes place in an office room. Players can interact with items in the room. Players can choose to read the newspaper's financial column, t

game.name: The Pennant League : Home Run Nighter '90
game.desc: The Pennant League: Home Run Nighter '90 is a baseball game similar to Pro Yakyuu Family Stadium (Japan) and R.B.I. Baseball (USA).

game.name: The Triathron
game.desc: Compete in cycling, swimming and running, but on a video game so it's less hard and not good for you.

game.name: The Untouchables
game.desc: Enfrente a turba! As últimas seis excitantes sequências de ação colocam você no controle do esquadrão de elite de criminosos de Elliot Ness. Os tiroteios no beco, o ataque à fronteira, o confronto com a estação ferroviária e o busto de Warehouse, culminando no empolgante desfecho de um duelo no último piso enquanto você revive a existência de Ness em sua luta contra a retribuição de Capone! Os Intocáveis - viva uma lenda americana!

game.name: Thexder
game.desc: Originalmente lançado em 1985 para a plataforma NEC PC-8801 no Japão, a Game Arts licenciou Thexder para a Square, a fim de desenvolver uma conversão para o Nintendo Entertainment System (NES). Em 1987. Thexder é um clássico jogo de ação com um robô gigante que pode se transformar em um jato. Preso dentro de uma instalação misteriosa, o objetivo é navegar 16 níveis de labirinto e permanecer vivo por tempo suficiente para destruir o computador central.

game.name: Thunderbirds
game.desc: Um alienígena do mal chamado Hood quer que os Thunderbirds entreguem todos os seus veículos para ele dentro de um período de 60 dias, ou Hood bombardeará a Terra com meteoros. Os Thunderbirds calculam que ele precisa de 60 dias para se preparar para enfrentar sua ameaça, então eles decidem procurar lugares que possam conter suas fontes de energia para seu poder.

game.name: Tiger-Heli
game.desc: Tiger Heli é o nome do seu helicóptero, de acordo com a caixa resultante de um projeto de defesa de bilhões de dólares e forjado a partir de ébano e cromo brilhante. Seu objetivo é derrotar o país de Cantun, que é administrado por terroristas e tornou-se completamente sedento de poder, com o objetivo de dominar o mundo inteiro.

game.name: Time Zone
game.desc:
Oh, no! On the way to meet your girlfriend Haruka, our intrepid little hero has gotten ambushed by that nefarious, time-traveling villain, Professor Time. Now it's time to join him as he crosses time and space to save her from his evil clutches.
In this run and jump action game, you'll find yourself flung anywhere from prehistoric times to the far future and back again, defeating anything from dinosaurs to samurai to aliens just to get her back.
Your main weapon — your ever-sturdy baseball cap. Just toss it forward and let it simply boomerang back or jump as it boomerangs back to let it fly around you for a short amount of time. And if you're lucky enough to collect enough chimes, you'll get to witness the awesome destructive power and invincibility of the skateboard.
Combined that with a host of hazardous obstacles so prevalent in platformers and you've got yourself into quite a pickle trying to tackle Professor Time. Pursue and flog him with your cap so that the hero and Haruka can live happily ever after.

game.name: Times of Lore
game.desc: Um RPG de ação simples após as aventuras de um jovem guerreiro (bárbaro forte, cavaleiro blindado ou valquíria rápida) para ajudar um reino enfraquecido por várias ameaças e recuperar Artefatos especiais que uma vez tornaram o reino forte.nnnnA jogabilidade consiste em mover seu personagem em tempo real por vários terrenos, como florestas, cidades e masmorras. O jogador reúne itens básicos, como saúde e poções mágicas, e armas cada vez mais poderosas à medida que avança na história. As conversas são tratadas através de frases-chave. O combate também é em tempo real, contra alguns tipos de criaturas (esqueletos, orcs, malandros) dos quais pode haver vários odores.

game.path: ./Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana Land he Youkoso (J).7z
game.name: Tiny Toon Adventures 2 : Montana Land e Youkoso
game.desc:
Pernalonga recebe um convite para um parque de diversões recém-inaugurado. Ele aceita de bom grado, sem saber que esse convite é uma armadilha. Agora ele e seus amigos precisam superar todos os obstáculos e sobreviver na Wackyland ...
"Trouble in Wackyland" consiste em vários mini-jogos que você pode concluir em qualquer ordem. Você precisa alcançar o motor de um trem em um jogo de plataforma com rolagem lateral padrão, manter o equilíbrio em uma prancha de madeira enquanto mergulha em cachoeiras perigosas, competir em torneios de carros de brinquedo etc. Depois de ganhar bilhetes suficientes, você pode acessar o Castelo que está atrás do parque de diversões.
game.image: ./media/images/Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana Land he Youkoso (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana Land he Youkoso (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Tiny Toon Adventures 2 - Montana Land he Youkoso (J).mp4

game.name: Tiny Toon Adventures
game.desc: These Tiny Toons have big problems. That's right. The arch enemy of Acme Acres, Montana Max, has kidnapped the ever-so-popular Babs Bunny. Now the furry female's fate rests in the paws of Buster Bunny and his crime fighting pals - Dizzy Devil, Furrball and Plucky Duck. Four kooky buddies with their own special talent. Buster can bounce over bad guys with the best of them. Furrball uses his feline claws to climb walls. Dizzy Devil prefers to spin through them. And Plucky can glide through the air and swim like a fish. Choose which partner you want at the beginning of each level before you face-off against time and goofballs gone bad in 6 zany wonderlands. So you better get jumping or it will be curtains for our playful pals!

game.name: Titan
game.desc: Titan is a 2D arcade game / puzzle game hybrid.For some reason, mad professors of the future tend to invent strange entertainment games in which every participant dies.

game.name: TM Network : Live in Power Bowl
game.desc: TM Network: Live in Power Bowl is a Japanese-only Nintendo Family Computer game featuring the J-Pop group TM Network. The song used as the background music is "Come On Everybody" from their album Carol -A Day In a Girl's Life 1991- (using the 8-bit sound chip of the Family Computer). Interestingly, the game uses Atlus NES sound engine by Tsukasa Masuko.

game.name: Toki no Tabibito: Time Stranger
game.desc: Toshito Kutajima is a Time Patrol Officer. He uses his COI (ConstableOfficial Intercepter), a time traveling space vehicle, to travel to the past in order to track down fugitives.The game involves traveling through time (between the sixteenth century to 1

game.name: Tokkyuu Shirei Solbrain
game.desc:
Shatterhand é um jogo de ação com rolagem em oito direções. Você controla Shatterhand em sua busca para encontrar e derrotar o General Grover, líder do Comando Metal. Durante o jogo, você encontrará todos os tipos de criaturas mecânicas e biomecânicas. A arma principal de Shatterhand são seus punhos cibernéticos e, portanto, a maioria dos inimigos deve ser derrotada por um soco.
Ajuda adicional pode ser fornecida por qualquer um dos oito robôs satélites, cada um com sua própria arma que dispara automaticamente quando Shatterhand dá um soco. Esses robôs de satélite podem ser obtidos coletando combinações de letras alfa-beta que aparecem quando você perfura algumas caixas brancas espalhadas por cada estágio.

game.path: ./Tokoro San no Mamoru mo Semeru mo (J).7z
game.name: Tokoro-san no Mamoru mo Semeru mo
game.desc: Featuring Japanese celebrity "Tokoro-san" as its protagonist, this is a run-of-the-mill jump and run game. In order to save a baby, Tokoro-san must traverse Tokyo, armed only with a water pistol. Cute nasties which look like fantasy creatures run at him and must be shot down. Others come out of holes in the ground beneath collapsing platforms, and certain monsters will, when shot, run away from Tokoro-san and run down all monsters in their path. Shooting the pistol will use up the water reserve, which will decrease the range of the shots. Leaving enemies alone when possible is therefor a good strategy. When Tokoro-san enters a house, a boss battle must be run through before he can choose a path to other districts in the town. When the player is hit too many times by monsters, or the water pistol runs out of water, the game is over.
game.image: ./media/images/Tokoro San no Mamoru mo Semeru mo (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Tokoro San no Mamoru mo Semeru mo (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Tokoro San no Mamoru mo Semeru mo (J).mp4

game.name: Tom & Jerry
game.desc:
Este jogo é muito parecido com o Rescue Rangers da Chip & Dale.
Tom deu um cochilo no sobrinho de Jerry, Tuffy, e o trancou em um baú no sótão. Você e seu amiguinho peludo Jerry devem correr, pular e subir do porão por todos os níveis da casa para resgatá-lo a tempo.
A principal defesa de Jerry é seu suprimento ilimitado de bolas de gude. Pegue outros itens como chiclete, cutelo, copos de água, bolas de mariposa, martelo, tinta invisível e broca para superar os inimigos e obstáculos no seu caminho. Certifique-se de enganar Tom sempre que ele aparecer.
Procure power-ups de queijo e estágios de bônus no buraco do mouse ao longo do caminho.

game.name: Tom Sawyer no Bouken
game.desc:
As famosas façanhas literárias de Tom Sawyer ganham vida nesta aventura em que você joga Tom Sawyer (ou Huck Finn em um jogo para 2 jogadores). A aventura começa no sonho de Tom enquanto ele dorme na escola.
O controle neste jogo de plataforma típico consiste em pular e atirar pedras. Evite muitos obstáculos, como barris rolantes; derrote inimigos persistentes como piratas, ratos e até um polvo gigante. Ajude Tom a navegar pelo rio Mississippi, por florestas, casas assombradas e o céu acima.

game.name: Top Gun : Dual Fighters
game.desc: Assim como no primeiro jogo, você pilota um Tomcat F-14 em combate contra o inimigo equipado com equipamento soviético, embora não haja referência direta à União Soviética em nenhum lugar. O único enredo deste jogo é destruir tudo o que você vê, excluindo o porta-aviões no qual você deve pousar no final de cada nível.

game.name: Top Gun
game.desc: Top Gun é baseado levemente no filme. É um jogo de acção no qual o jogador controla um caça Tomcat F-14 através de quatro missões. A acção é vista de uma visão em primeira pessoa do cockpit. Dependendo da missão, diferentes tipos de alvos devem ser destruídos. Sempre existem aeronaves inimigas, mas algumas missões também incluem alvos marítimos e terrestres. Duas armas estão disponíveis: metralhadoras (com munição ilimitada) e mísseis. O jogador pode escolher entre três tipos de mísseis antes de uma missão: os mais poderosos só podem ser transportados em quantidades menores.

game.name: Top Rider
game.desc: Top Racer is a motorcycle racing game from a behind-the-bike perspective. The player can choose from two modes: Grand Prix, in which the player partakes in several consecutive races and Touring, in which the player can choose one of four courses for a single race. The game is notable for its unusual peripheral: An inflatable motorcycle with a special handlebar controller built-in. The player can sit on the peripheral once fully inflated and use the handlebars to control the on-screen bike.

game.name: Top Striker
game.desc: Being the only title based on the TV Anime Moero! Top Striker, the game is played on a left-right perspective. Unlike in any other common soccer games of its time, it is only possible to control a single soccer player (star player) who possesses a special shot. The teams are based on soccer teams from Italy. These includes Napoli and Milan, for example. There are also national teams like England, Germany and Italy.

game.name: Totsuzen! Macchoman
game.desc: Amagon, o fuzileiro naval mais condecorado, recebeu uma missão de seu comandante para investigar uma estranha ilha do Pacífico Sul, infestada de monstros, da qual nenhum homem jamais retornou vivo. Com uma metralhadora como sua única arma, ele decolou de avião e aterrissou na beira da praia da ilha.nnAmagon, com sua habilidade única de se transformar no imenso Megagon, começa sua missão de se tornar o primeiro a conquistar a ilha. Veja e experimente as incríveis aventuras de nosso herói, Amagon! Seu navio de resgate está esperando do outro lado da ilha. Boa sorte!

game.name: Touch Down Fever
game.desc:
Touchdown Fever is an arcade football game from SNK. Go head-to-head against the computer or a human opponent, or team up with another human player vs. the computer. Choose five, ten, or fifteen minute quarters for either league match (single game) or tournament play.
There are 12 teams from NFL cities to play with (six East, six West), although there is no NFL license and no real NFL players. Offensive plays can be run from five basic formations: long pass, short pass, quarterback sneak, running backs, and field goal kick/punt. There are no formations or plays on defense, but there are two possible players (A or B button) to take control of before the snap. The player perspective is top-down and vertical-scrolling. Standard football scoring rules: most points after four quarters wins!

game.name: Touhou Kenbun Roku
game.desc: The game is a command selection adventure game, common at the time, which allows you to switch characters throughout the story. The package of the game bills it as a "New wave psychedelic adventure" and the story of the game is considered quite bizarre, in which a character is transported back in time to the year 1275 where he encounters Marco Polo, and generally interferes with Polo's efforts to establish trade between Asia and Europe. The game is intended to be comedic and even parodies several game design elements which were common at the time. It has never been released outside of Japan or translated from the original Japanese.

game.name: Toukon Club
game.desc:
Select one person of eight wrestler, and fight your way to the top. A wide range of attacks and conditions are at your disposal.
A unique dynamic angle system shows the wrestling action in a brand new and spectacular way, allowing for actions in all corners of the ring!

game.name: Toukyou Pachi-Slot Adventure
game.desc: The video game Tokyo Pachi-Slot Adventure is an adventure that combines the entertainment value of pachinko and slot machines; and is followed by two sequels called Pachi-Slot Adventure 2 and Pachi-Slot Adventure 3. Developed by the same company who made American Dream (not to be confused with the unlicensed video game company Color Dreams), this game features the player starting out in a pachinko parlor while trying to win balls to continue his adventure.

game.name: Tsuppari Oozumou
game.desc: Tsuppari Oozumou is a sumo wrestling game. The goal is to wrestle the opponent out of the ring. The opponents get harder as the game progresses. Different moves can be performed depending on button and directional combinations.

game.name: Tsuppari Wars
game.desc: Tsuppari Wars ("Delinquent Wars") is an action video game for the Family Computer. The object is to acquire all of the enemies' territory and defeat the evil gang leaders. Even though this game was only released in Japan, the gangsters fight without any weapons and the violence level is mild compared to later gang-related games. Its spiritual descendant is Grand Theft Auto: San Andreas due to its simulation of gang warfare. Once the main gang leader is defeated in either Tsuppari Wars or Tsuppari Suku mode, the remaining members of the gang switch membership to become a gray-colored gang that does not have a leader. Consequently, all territory that belonged to leader that was killed in combat becomes neutral territory with a number describing the strength of the "neutral gangs." These "neutral gangs" will attempt to defend their turf. In order for a gang with colors (red, blue, or green) to use the land as their own, they must eliminate all the gangsters in that territory. However, invasions can be canceled before they can begin by saying "no" when asked to fight ("Struggle").

game.name: Tsuri Kichi Sanpei : Blue Marlin Hen
game.desc: Tsurikichi Sanpei: Blue Marlin Hen (lit. Fishing Maniac Sanpei: Blue Marlin Chaper) is a fishing simulation. It was published in Japan for both the Famicom and the MSX home computer in 1988. It is based upon the Japanese manga Tsurikichi Sanpei, which was written and illustrated by Takao Yaguchi. The manga was serialised in Kodansha's Weekly Sh?nen Magazine from 1973 to 1983. The series is about a boy who discovers that he has a talent and a huge passion for fishing, and tries to to maximize his potential by entering into different fishing contests. He encounters all kinds of rivals and companions who help him increase his skill. As he faces various challenges, he learns to solve difficult problems and learns from his mistakes to the extent that he is able to fish anything out of the water. In the game, Sanpei is competing for the top prize in the "1988 Famicom International Billfish Tournament" by capturing the largest Blue Marlin possible.

game.path: ./Tsuru Pika Hagemaru - Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi (J).7z
game.name: Tsuru Pika Hagemaru : Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi
game.desc: Um jogo muito peculiar e inusitado que é praticamente inédito nos EUA, mesmo entre os jogadores que participam regularmente de jogos Famicom exclusivos do Japão. Baseado em uma longa série de mangás e animes, segue um garotinho careca (seu nome significa "Bald Circle") tentando livrar o mundo de seus problemas em uma missão para provar que é digno do título "Bald Cheapskate King".
game.image: ./media/images/Tsuru Pika Hagemaru - Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi (J).png
game.thumbnail: ./media/wheel/Tsuru Pika Hagemaru - Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi (J).png
game.video: ./media/videos/Tsuru Pika Hagemaru - Mezase! Tsuru Seko no Akashi (J).mp4

game.name: Twin Eagle
game.desc: Twin Eagle is a vertically scrolling arcade style shooter. You control a helicopter, and need to earn points by shooting or bombing the various (and numerous!) enemies you'll encounter. Planes, helicopters, tanks, anti-aircraft guns, foot soldiers, and more will all be trying to bring your mission to an abrupt end! Occasionally, you may find hostages when a building is destroyed; try to rescue as many of the hostages as you can to earn extra points. Your helicopter has the ability to pick up extra weapons. After destroying certain enemies, a power up will be left behind which can give you one of four different types of firepower (the regular machine gun, canon, two way fire, or missiles). Other power ups that can be found include bombs (which can be used to destroy everything on the screen), extra speed, and weapon power up (increases the capabilities of whatever type of weapon you currently have).

game.name: TwinBee 3 : Poko Poko Daimaou
game.desc:
Terceiro jogo da série Twinbee de fofos surreais de rolagem vertical. Mais uma vez, você assume o papel de Twinbee ou Winbee (Gwinbee foi sequestrado pelo chefe final) enquanto eles voam pelo reino da fantasia, disparando o inferno fora de seus ... uhm ... inimigos, ou sejam eles quais forem.
Como em outros jogos da série, você pode ganhar poderes depois de derrotar certas quantidades de inimigos, disparando nos sinos mágicos que eles deixam para trás, dependendo da quantidade de vezes que você os dispara, eles mudam de cor e, portanto, dão poderes diferentes, como várias fotos, opções etc.
Se energizado corretamente, os dois navios podem se unir para executar um ataque de limpeza de tela, e você pode escolher seu estágio inicial entre qualquer um dos quatro primeiros estágios (o quinto e o último restante bloqueado até que você limpe todos os outros).

game.name: TwinBee
U.S. Championship V'Ball
game.desc: Baseado no jogo de moedas menos conhecido do V'Ball, o Super Spike V'Ball desafia os jogadores a baterem, acertarem e chegarem a um campeonato de vôlei de praia. Equipes de dois viajam pelos EUA e pelo mundo, visitando locais como Chicago, Los Angeles, Havaí e Austrália. Este jogo pode ser jogado por 1-4 jogadores simultaneamente, embora um dispositivo NES Satellite ou NES Four Score (e controladores extras) sejam necessários para três ou quatro jogadores.

game.name: Uchuu Keibitai SDF
game.desc: Space Defence Force SDF is a vertically scrolling space shooter. Though it scrolls vertically, you are granted some movement horizontal movement as well. The action isn't frantic, but the game is still somewhat difficult due to tight enemy attack waves and the possibility of being shot in the back. For this reason, you should not let enemies pass unscathed, since they may shoot back at you from off-screen. At some points, power up capsules will materialize in space. They will grant you not only greater firepower, but also serve as a reconfigurable armor, which is SDF's main selling point. The armor may be moved from your front to your back, and while it is moved in a large arc, it will destroy any enemies it happens to ram. When fastened to your rear, it will also grant a small speed boost. Learning to use the armor is the key to surviving in this game.

game.name: Uchuusen Cosmo Carrier
game.desc:
It is the year 1999. Invading aliens are slowly forcing our orbiting moon towards Earth. In one hundred hours all life on Earth will be destroyed. Your mission is to travel from planet to planet in our solar system and intercept the alien fleet.
Uchuusen: Cosmo Carrier is an action strategy game where you pilot the titular Cosmo Carrier and combat aliens while gaining intelligence on the solar system, the planets and its moons. Information you gather from satellites with your deployable Mechs will help you find the alien force and destroy them. Once deployed your Mechs walk around the surface and fight turrets and find items/clues.
Your viewscreen is where you target alien space-craft, astronauts, moons, and planets and interact with them. The interactions allowed are: Missile, Beam, Shiled(SIC), Move, Communicate, Computer, Parts, and State. Missile launches a rocket with adjustable strength at your target. Beam shoots a laser weapon at your target. The misspelled Shield function lets you decide if you want your shields on or not. Move button has two different sub selections; Warp and Land. Warp lets you travel from planet to planet while Land lets you deploy one of your Mechs on to the surface of a satellite or enemy cruiser. Communicate lets you do just that, communicate with planets and other vehicles. Computer gives you read-outs on targeted planets and vehicles. The Computer also is where you perform repairs on your ship or Mechs. Parts lets you see what weapons you have loaded. Finally, State, gives you detailed information pertaining to shields, weapons etc of your Cosmo Carrier and three Mechs; Gravity, Blizzard and Field.

game.name: Ultima : Exodus
game.desc:
Ultima: Exodus é o primeiro lançamento para o Nintendo Entertainment System da popular série. Não espere ser capaz de seguir as histórias da série original para computador; esta versão é completamente diferente e pretende ser um jogo independente. No início do jogo, você pode formar seu grupo a partir de uma randomização gerada por computador ou criar seus próprios personagens, se tiver tempo e talento para fazê-lo (há uma tonelada de opções diferentes para personagens).
O malvado Êxodo surgiu dos mares para fazer seu novo lar em uma ilha de fogo perto do Reino de Britannia.
